¿Gi ge munanshichkotni wa nkamrutanru wa nalukyawaka gita wa gitanuya? ¿Waka ksotanuygalegolyi gi rixanu kiglerno gita?’
“Wane rixanna muchichachine. Wannapni gapkatatachinpatka. Ga wa gapkatatachine, wannapni wa muchichachinpatka. Gi rixanu gixolunni wa tomgakalune, ga wa gi gixpotna wa tsomitkalune.”
Gerosale kanikinpatka Geso, pamole gepi yimaklene kegnetetamnugapo ranikna. Wane chinna,
“Xani Gerosale wkanikanutka, ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookalurpatkano tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi, ga wa yonchikgapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa.
Payineko yegi samyokannona yenetyapnona, kochipjetyapnona, koroshishkita rutakyapnona. Seyni mapgogne chininri nyotunkaako.”
Giyagni tyayegitlu Sewereyo wgenene ginro twugeneneyma. Tyoptsojityegitlu. Pagixanu tagjitlu.
Wale wane chinro, “¿Klu paluka?” Wala wane chinru, “Wane pchinanu tuplatinripna nyi gepi nwugenene satu potuklesretate ga wa satu pkegnetesretate pogirewatyawakaya.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?” Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.”
Wane chinna, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa. Seyni wa tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni Nuru chinanu.”
Wa pamole yijnakotinri, rumtuwnana wa gepi moletkakachine chinanu.
Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune payineko yegi towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu.
Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixyegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa.
Girukokta gixyegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni gwayegrerupa.
Gita pixka wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu ruspakinripna gixolune yine.”
Geriko yamtyatkana. Gixolune yine gomkagitlu.
Gepi maygalene gatnugapostsi tuplatachine, wa yijnakotinitkana wa Geso giknoginritka, wane china sapletna, “Gitsrukaachi, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
Gixolune yine chigetjetna pochke rixinripna, seyni wanepnute saplewjetna, “Gitsrukaachi Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanunwu.”
Wa Geso tunwata. Tomgana maygalene. Wane chinna, “¿Klu galukatka wa nixyapgi?”
Wane chinruna, “Gitsrukachi, Wumrekgatinripa.”
Giyagni Geso getwamonutna. Kamrukaygaletna. Wanekluyakawa retatkana. Romkagitatkaluna.
Kayegikatkaluna Gerosale. Wetpage yana, Goliwa Magkateya. Giyagni Geso yokanatna gepi yimaklene.
Wale wane chinna, “Tujra pokchi wunaple gyanu. Wane gikshikinro mporo kwugenero tsatkaluro, twugeneyma. Gkoshpirokanro. Ganikyegitanno.
Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanu gkoshpiroklo?’ Wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galukna. Waneklutka satkakjixanna mporone.’ ”
Ptowruko wa tye wane gixkalurni wa poyagkakikolupa wa tokanchi geneklewatachri chinyawaka. Wane china:
Wane pchinanro Gerosale, wa Siyo nshicho, Petanru Pogire punyegitjeru. Mayogotu, mporotji tuplatachri, ga wa mporo wgenetji. Walenwa prachi kgitjiklero wgene.
Ga wa yimaklene wane ya. Wa Geso china towutyawakpotukna rixna.
Rawpatkalona wa mporo ga wa twugene. Sapowakatjitatkalona gimkaluyma. Wanna gogo tuplamta.
Gixolune yine potu gikwekamkata gatnugapoya. Pimrine gistaklu gagmunasurkaka. Rukwekluna gatnugapo
Gixolune kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumta. Wane chinananumtna: “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha! ¡Gimalwutkaluru ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya! ¡Wuya tengognepotuya!”
Wa Gerosale rapokamtinitka, psolu pokchi gajeneko gimyeka. Wane chinna, “¿Katni wa tye?”
Ga wa gixolune wane china, “Tyenwa Geso, Nasare Kalilesreta giyakatyachri, tokanchi geneklewatachri.”
Geso jiglokamta kpashiwakapji Goyakalunu. Ruknokna pejnuruneko kgishanrewaklerunni gagjijetachinni kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachinni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa.
Wane chinna, “Yonatkalurni: Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni. Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu gitawakapna kachowgurune gwiyawakapna.”
Giyagni kpashiwakapji runyegityaluna maygalene, ga wa myankane. Rutuukakna.
Tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yonchikgapine getlu giglajrukaka Wale kamrutanru. Ga wa mturune retna saplewjetachine kpashiwakapjiya, wane chinachine, “¡Wuya, Tawiklopisha!” Rumtuwnana.
Wane chinruna, “¿Gi ge pjemna wane chinyawakna?” Geso wane china, “Gigi. ¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu: Wa mturunenamaya ga wa gashichachinenamaya puglepotutlu gimalwuru?”
Ruknokamtna. Tsru pokchi ruyakatya. Wetaniya ya. Wane rawamta.
Goyechnokawpotuko tsru pokchi satokatka. Nachneru.
Retlo satopje gikera gatnugapostsi gwachro. Yayegitlo. Gike rukshikyalo. Tosurepjeni. Wane chinro, “Gi pagogneko kajpatkayi.” Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni.
Yimaklene getlo. Ruglajitna. Wane chinna, “¡Ge! ¡Wanekluyakawa tuprigamtanatka gikerni!”
Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi, wa kalixlegi gixinipa, gi wa gnutanshinikanutini, gi wa tyepjeni wa gikerapirana wane gixanu, seyni koxa wa tye magka wane nchininiplu gixa, ‘Puxrikanu. Tsru wenu puknokinwa,’ wane rixanu.
Wa gagjigognetinipa pejnuruko girukokta gagjita galixinri, gyoptotanru.”
Wa kpashiwakapji yinitka, wa runkaklewanatini, rapyegitluna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene. Wane chinruna, “¿Katu gitakyi tyeya?”
Giyagni Geso gigitna. Wane chinna, “Gita koxa gepomgangi satu tokanchiya. Wa ginkakinipno Gita koxa ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.
Wa Gwa katlewle ¿ginaka giyakatyachrini? ¿Tengogne waka yinyegiyakla?” Giyagni wannananuko gishinikanuwata. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka: Tengogne giyakatyachrini, wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’
Wa wane wchininipmaka: Yine yegi giyakatyachrini, gixolune yine wpikanuna. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu Gwa tokanchi geneklewatachri Goyakalunu rixinri.”
Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.” Wale koxa wane chinna, “Gi Gitako ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
“Seyni ¿gi pixka getle gixlu gixa? Gepi wgenru satu jeji. Tsru gituru rapyegita. Wane chinru, ‘Wiwi, nusanate nowashate pyanu. Tyegogne wane pkamrurewatini.’
“Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gi jmerno.’ Seyni gowukshini renshinikanuta. Wane yatka.
“Gapkatatachri rapyegitatnaka. Waneko pixka chinatnaklu wale. Wale gigita. Wane china, ‘Gitapni, papa.’ Seyni gi wane ya.
“¿Giru wa nyi gepi ruru gishinikanru kamruta?” Wanna wane china, “Tsru gituru.” Geso wane chinna, “Galikakni wane nchingi wa gijgawenutachinni, kapoklewaklerone gixa pnute jiglokanna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
Gwa ginyegitgi poyagkaklewlugapoya. Gi wa galixlu. Ga wa gijgawenutachine ga wa kapoklewaklerone galixlu. Ga wa gixa getinri gi wa waneklu genshinikanuta wa galixyaplu.”
“Gyijnakotanru satu yapkaklu. Waneru satu jeji kgisanateru. Wale gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka wajra.
Tjirgikolustsitka wayegrene yokanyegitna sana girukotachine yegi rawapyapluna sana gwiyachritka.
“Ga wa sana girukotachine kashichna wayegrene. Satu kochipjetna, ga wa satu ruylatna, ga wa satu sotlujetna.
Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene muchichachine pnute. Waneko pixka rixkanna wannani.
Gapkatatachri potu gituru yokanyegitna. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’
Wa sana girukotachine retinitkaluna gituru, wane chinkakna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripa. Wuya. Wuylaganru. Waneyapwu wa yoptotanrupmaka.’
“Kashichanruna. Gowasha ruknokyanruna. Wane ruylatyanruna.
“Giyagni wa kgisanateru gininitka, ¿gi rixanutkana wa wanna sana girukotachine?”
Wane chinruna, “Wa gektune ruylapotutanna. Pimrine girukotachine renekamtanutnaklu sana. Wanna genekanru sana gwiyachritka topapko gapokinitka.”
Geso wane chinna, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluruya? Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita. Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye. Rakaglajiygaletwu.
“Giyagni wane nchingi, wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka konkalurupni gixyegiya. Panerune reneeko wa pogirewatyawaka kamrure kamrutachinepa.
Katupnikta tye sotlu gitspetanuna rumlokpotutanuna, ramgapotutanuna. Ga wa tye sotlu gijrukgogotanrunapa ramgapotutanuna.”
Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinitkalu yapkaklukaka Wale chinyawaka, rumatluna wannapirana china yanumsaletinri.
Rujgaluna gi rixpoko kashretyapluna, seyni gixolune yine pikna, gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachri kagwakyaluna.
Rugita Geso. Yapkaklu runkakyatnakna. Wane china,
“Tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa pogirchi. Kashimyolu kamrutyalu gituru.
Wayegrene yokanata tomgiyapna chanixkalune kashimyolu yegi. Seyni gi raluka ginretna.
“Rumepe yokanretatnakna pimrine wayegrene. Wane china, ‘Ginkakapanna chanixkalune, “¡Getanru xani! Ralixatka nnijitu nwakate jejine ga wa nuxowaakakanune giylatkalunetka. Pejnuruko galpokotkalurutkani. Ginanu kashimyolu yegi.” ’
“Wanna gi jemlu, seyni ralimtna. Satu rusanate ya. Ga wa satu marnewjetyawaka ya.
Pimrine kashwayegretanruna wale wayegrene. Rektutetkanna ga wa ruylatkanna.
Ga wa pogirchi yijnakotinri wa tyepirana, jigekanuwata. Yokanatna solalotene. Ruylajixanna wa nyi kgiylalewaklerunni. Yochpikpokchitanna.
“Giyagni wane chinna wayegrene, ‘Wa kashimyolu galikaka galpokotkalurni, seyni wa chanixkalune gi wa rumuklunina.
Giyagni gajewa. Rutspalgapotyawaka gyanu. Nchanixanna ginnakokta gikshikanune, kashimyolu yegi yinripna.’
Yatkana wanna wayegrechine. Wa gatnugapkaka yana. Rapatjemtkana pejnuruneko rukshikanunna mugleneymananuko ga wa kiglerune. Ga wa kashimyolu yegi yomitna nachnewatachine.
“Jiglokamta pogirchi retyapna wa nachnewatachine. Wane retyalu satu jeji kashimyolu getachinemkalu mutaakatu.
Wane chinru, ‘Nomole, ¿gi pixpoko jigloklemta gewi wa kashimyolu getachrimkalu mutaakatyi?’ “Seyni wale pochke.
Giyagni pogirchi wane chinna wa kamrurewyegitjene, ‘Gostujixitanru, ga wa gostumyotanru. Maleka giknokaganru mapshagawaka.’ Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
“Gi rixanu gi gepikna chanixkalune, ga wa gi gixna tsomitkalune.”
Giyagni wane yana Gwariseyone. Jemanshinikankakna wa kashtokanutyapluna.
Yimaklenna yokanyegitluna Giroreyoneyma. Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletu. Galikaka potu punkaklewata Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana. Gike pkagwakpirata, gi rixanu gi putakyagokna jejine.
Giyagni punkakanwu. ¿Gi pixka getle pixlu Pixa? ¿Wa munanshichkotnige Goteyone genekyaplu wenrukaka wa Pogirchi Susa waka gike?”
Seyni Geso gimatlu wanna muglenu. Wane china, “Sanowashatachingi, ¿klu chinanu gimlukanutno?
Gekakgitanno wa sroschiproji Susa wenutikolupa.” Ranikyegitluna paproji.
Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katunni wa tye yaglu ga wa toyonga?”
Wane chinruna, “Susa yagluni ga wa Susa yongani.” Giyagni wane chinna, “Giyagni genekanru Susa Susanni, ga wa Goyakalu Goyakalunu.”
Yijnakotinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Kaspukamtatkaluna. Yatkana.
Walegogne rapyegitluna Sariseyone, wane chinachine maleshlu yotunrupa gipnachineya. Repomgaluna.
Wane chinna, “Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi wane china: Mwugenetniko gipninina satu, wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewnakakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanupa.
Wixa yegi wanena payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Waleni gipnanuna muknokawgenetkatniko. Repuru gwatnaklo.
Waneko pixka rixana gapkatatachrini, ga wa mapa rixinrini, ga wa payokgiprepotunanniko.
Pejnurunniko gipnanatka. Tapkata gipukatanatka suxni.
Giyagni wa yotunruklupa ¿giru gnunropni wa payokgiprenni gnunronanni? Gi rixanu pejnurunenniko gnunronanni.”
Giyagni rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Gixa pupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa tokanchi yonatkaluru gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko.
Gi rixanu yotunruklupa gi wa jejineko gnunrowatanu. Gi wa suxoneko gnuruwatanu, seyni tengogne gajene Goyakalutowrerune pixka rixanutkana.
Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlu wa tokanchi Goyakalu chinyawakgi?
‘Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalute.’ Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute.”
Wa yijnakotinitkaluna gixolune yine, ruglajitna wa runkakyana.
Giyagni wa Gwariseyone yijnakotinri Wale kochrokna Sariseyone, rapatjetna wanna mkoje.
Satu wannanyi yonchikgapine gepomgalu. Rumlukanutyaplu, repomgalu. Wane chinru,
“Yimaklewatachri, ¿girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya, psolpotuyako pushinikanutletanruya.
Tyenwa tsru potu ga wa muchinanu yokanru.
Ga wa gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka.
Wa tye gepi yokanru chinanni pejnuruko Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru ga wa tokanchi geneklewatachine chinyawaka.”
Rapatanatinna Gwariseyone, Geso gepomganna.
Wane chinna, “¿Gi nchina gixa wa Kristoya? ¿Katuklopishni?” Wane chinruna, “Tawinu.”
Wane chinna Wale, “Giyagni ¿gi rixa Tawi wa Giwekikaluruya wane chinru Gitsrukaachi? Wane china:
Gitsrukaachi wane chinru Nutsrukate, ‘Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, wa nutakinpotukna Pixa kamnixjene pujixipta rapukote.’
Giyagni waleko Tawi wane chininri Gitsrukaachi, ¿gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?”
Gi satuna gimkata gigletokanutlu. Walegognekakayakawa gi satuna tserpiranawata gepomgaletlu wanepnute.
Giyagni gixolune yine yanumyegita Geso, ga wa yimaklene koxa.
Wane chinna, “Moysisi tuplapijere tuplatna yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone.
Giyagni pejnuruko chinyawakgina gkamrutyaplu, wale gkamrutanu. Seyni gi wa kamrutyawakna gkamrutanu gixa. Gi rixanu wane chinna, seyni gi wane rixa kamruretluna.
Gi rixanu rumlutluna ginolu, kyapre ganikolu. Wale rutjikaakana yine. Seyni wannako gi wa gimyojiyakna raluka komyekletyaluna.
“Ga wa pejnuruko kamrurna wane rixna wa retikolupa yineya. Gi rixanu tserutamtapotutlona yoptoyegitjerna yonchimta. Tserutluna gimkaluptostsimta gwachri.
Ralukluna tsrukakalune tuplapijere meyiwluya, ga wa tsrune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapji gajerkaka.
Ralukluna giputuya ralukikolna, ga wa yine wane chinyapna, ‘Rawii, Rawii.’
“Ga wa gixa gi wa ‘Rawi’ nchinko, gi rixanu satupjeru gyimakjeru wa Kristo ga wa pejnurunekgi gixa moletkakachingi.
Gi satuna gixa ‘nuru’ nchinanu tye chijiya, gi rixanu satupjeru Giru tengogne Gajeru.
Gi wa kgiykolewaklerune nchinko gi rixanu satupjeru giykotjeru. Walenwa Kristo.
Wa tsru potu gixa yegi gajeru, gipxakjerupni wale.
Gi rixanu girukokta tsru potu gixnawa, walepni wa mturupotupa. Girukokta walenanuko mturu potu gixnawa walepni wa tsru gitaako.
“¡Gi waneni gixa yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gixni wa gishyatlu wa tengogne pogirewatyawaka yinyegiya. Gi rixanu gi wa gixako jigloka. Gi koxa gichi jiglookakletna jiglokachinmaka.
¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi, ga wa gixa Gwariseyone sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu gkonapjijetanna gipnagnurutachronni. Gixashleya gogagjirgognerkakgi. Giyagni giklukanuwnapotutanuna.
“¡Gi waneni yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyone, sanowashatachingi! Gi rixanu tsru wenu ga wa popriwaka chiji gyotaljeta gixa, satupje Goteyo gitaknachriwa gixkakyapa. Ga wa wane rixkoklunu, wane gixkaklu Gigena xirnachri gajeru pixkalutu gixa pnute gepi kata rixanu.
“¡Gi waneni gixa! Maygalenekgi kosekachingi. Wane chinachingi, ‘Girukokta wa kpashiwakpotugruko kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni girukokta wa kpashiwaka potu gajero kori kawchinanu koschekachri walenwa giklukanuwnachrini.’
¡Seprolokachingi ga wa maygalengi! Gi rixanu ¿girni wa tsrupotu? ¿Waka kori waka kpashiwaka potu wa kori kpashiri rixikowaka?
Ga wa, Girukokta gima wa genekashlu yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gike rixa. Seyni gima girukokta wale gogo gwachri genekashlu kawchinanu koschekachri, walenwa giklukanuwnachrini.
Maygalengi, ¿girni wa tsru potu: genekashlu waka yochpikjetikowakakwa wa genekashlu kpashiri rixikowaka?
Wa yochpikjetikowakakwa kawchinanu koschekachri, gikwa kawchinanu koscheka ga wa waleymananuko pejnuruko walekwa gwachri kawchinanu.
Kpashiwakapji kawchinanu koschekachri, walepji kawchinanu koscheka ga wa walepji Gwachri kawchinanu.
Tengogne kawchinanu koschekachri, Goyakalu tuplapijere kawchinanu koscheka ga wa wale gogo Tuplatachri kawchinanu.
“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Gi rixanu pamolete gwenutyalu pgamlusureru, ga wa ganisiji, ga wa kominoji, ga wa gkaspuklu wa tsru potu yokanru Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi chinyawaka. Walenwa poyagkaklewlu, getwamonrewlu, ga wa galixlewlu. Tyekaka gimkata kamrureta. Gi wa pimri koxa gkaspuka kamruretanu.
¡Maygalenekgi kosekachingi! ¡Yosla gixirikachine pixkagi gixa, ga wa kameyo gnikloka!
“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi, Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu mpowratlu kolpeto rogote ga wa kajpapago rogote, seyni gitokoya katsepoylu chowguchi ga wa makotnachinwa.
Gwariseyo maygaletyi, muchinanu gapka powratanru kolpeto gitokote ga wa kajpapago gitokote, wa rogo gajeru koxa powra rixinripa.
“¡Gi wanengi gixa yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowashatachingi. Gi rixanu wane pixka gixachingi, yomlechkaka galatawnachri. Maleka galikaka retika kiglepotlu. Ga wa gitoko katseplu gipnachrigapu ga wa pejnuruko kapcholu.
Waneko pixka gixa gixa koxa. Maleka galikaka yine getyawakgi poyagkakachinepgutgi. Seyni wa gitokoteya katsepoygi nsanowashle ga wa gmukochire.
“¡Gi wanengi gixa, yonchikgapingi ga wa Gwariseyongi! Sanowachatachingi. Gi rixanu gixa kamrutlu wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni kapnatikowaka. Gigletlu poyagkakachinni yomle.
Wane chinachingi, ‘Wutsrukatenniklu gawkamka koxa wixa, gi wa wupxakmakna Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatchinni giylatikolu.’
Wane gixa gipgujtaletnawa wa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachineklopishangi.
Gixa koxa poyagkakanru gitsrukatenni yaglu.
“¡Gimnu pixkalungi! ¿Gi gixpoko gasukletinri Gigena xirnachri giklukanuwnayegjixikolupa?
Giyagni Gita yokanyegitgi Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine, ga wa kgimatkalerune, ga wa yonchikgapine. Pimrine wanna giylatanu gixa. Koroshishkita gitakanna. Pimrine wanna gkochipjetanu ginkaklewawaklepjiya. Papokchimnunanuka gkojwakinna.
Wa gixa giklukanuwninripa pejnuruneko poyagkakachinegraga, chiji gipkaakalurugraga, wa Gawili poyagkakachrigragakluyakawa Sakariygragaklupotunanuko, Warachi wgene, wa gixa giylatanruna kpashiwakpotugruko ga wa yochpikikowakakwa ganikajiteswa.
Galikaka wane nchingi, wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine giklukanuwna pejnuruko tyekakaya.
“¡Gerosale, Gerosale! Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachinni giylatachriyi. Ga wa pyokanyegitikolunni sotlujetachriyi. ¡Gi pejnu katananukta naluka gapatjewgenretyi, gaxawripa pixka tapatjewgeneta! Tomejimpuko tutakna. Ga wa pixa Gesosale gajengi gi galuklu.
Gwiyawakapjikaka giknokamtanuna gixapni.
Gi rixanu wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi getanutkanno wa gixa wane chininpotunanuko: Giglenshinikanyegitkalurni Gitsrukaachi giwaka ginyachri.”
Kpashiwakapji rushpakamtya Geso. Yatka. Rapyegitluna yimaklene, rekakgityapluna kpashiwakapjikaka.
Geso wane chinna. “¿Getluge tyekaka? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa rutukanuna sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujroleekatunpakni.”
Goliwa Magkate tuplata. Yayegitluna yinaklene wanna mkoje. Wane chinruna, “Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa puninipa ga wa yoptukgognetyawakapa?”
Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi.
Gi rixanu gixo ginanu ngiwakaya. Wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristo.’ Gixopni yokwitanna.
Gyijnakotanutkalu giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana. Gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi.
Gi rixanu yotunyegkakanna pachijne gajene pachijne gajene yegi ruylakakinripna. Ga wa pogirewatyawaka gajene yotunyegkakanna pogirewatyawaka gajene. Waneplu nachlukaka ga wa giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya.
Tyekakapni pejnuruko muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
“Wanepnute gixapni samyokalunenapgi nsaletikolupa ga wa giylatikolupa. Ga wa gayegixko payinemnunanukoya Gita giwaka chinanu.
Giyagni gixopni gitspekaakona. Samyookakanna. Rayegixkakanna.
Rupgujewnanna wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Yokwitanunna gixoni.
Mukochri gixolewnakalu chinanupa, gixopni masata galuklewletannatka.
Seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakapotunanuko wale gognetkaako.
Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana. Waneklupatkani yoptukyawakapa.
“Giyagni getinpatkalu gagnanutkaluru gimtuklewatachri potu, Ntanyili, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri chinyawaka, kpashiwakapji rawanatini,
(Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru), waneklu Gote gwachinepni gasukanuna. Magkakaka yanna.
Panchi gogoshrichi gwanatachripa gi gijrukanuna ranikyaplu gipji gajeru.
Wa sana gwachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu.
¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni wa gashichakachinepni wale gognekakpatka!
Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktalu, gi wa gapnanutikalurgogneko.
Gi rixanu wanepatkalu tsru salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu reyinuwakletinitkalu tye psolchijneko ga wa xanigognenanu salewakchi. Gi wane rixanu.
Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenupnikmaka gishatkapkona, seyni tsomitkalune chinanu sustaklu walegognekaka.
Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘Gewru Kristo,’ ga wa wane chininipgi, ‘Ga ga waneru,’ gi wa galixanu.
Gi rixanu rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, ga wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna tsru getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta.
Xani nunkakatkagi ma mapookanuwa.
“Giygani girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘Wane rawa, yineru mwiyawakanumka,’ Gi wane gyanu. Ga wa ‘Gitokogruko rawa,’ gi galixanru.
Gi rixanu, wa rawrakle pixka rixanu, tkachi gishpatyawakasreta rawrakini pixka ga wa rumxityawakasretpotunanuko pokamlata, wane pixka nixa ginretanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno nuninipa.
Gi rixanu ginakakokta rawmanetanu gipnachri, wane rapatjetinna klatatalune.
“Wa ruknoginitka tyegogne gajeru salewakchi, waneklu: Ruchpokanu tkachi. Ga wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu. Ga wa tengogne tujirotini katagirkaka. Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko
“Wanepnute tengogne rupgujewninitka Gita Yineru Wgenno yigapkakle. Giyagni kegeknanuwatanna payinerumnunanuko tye psolchijne gajeruko. Retinpatkanona Gita Yineru Wgenno ginachripatkano. Tengogne gajeru kyachgapererumko numunanu. Tsru nuyakle, tsru noyaknu numunanu.
Nyokanatanna notowrene. Tsro pogimnupotuplo kowgimayma nyokanatanna. Wanna gapatjetanna ntsomitanune gepkoxamkojesretayako, yoptukyawakapotunanuko tengogne ga wa pasreta yoptukyawakpotunanuko.
“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani.
Waneko pixka gixanu gigognepirana. Getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu.
Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa.
Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko, gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata.
Gi rixanu Nowgogneklu pixka nixa gapokletanu Gita Yineru Wgenno.
Gi rixanu wa gonnewlu ma mapookanuwagognekaka wane rixa nikletna, rurna, ganunrowatna, ga wa ganuruwatna wa Nowe jiglokingognepotunanuklo pumlekwa.
Gi rumatna rapokinipotunanuko gonnewlu ga wa ranikanna pejnurunniko. Wane pixka rixanu napokinipa Gita Yineru Wgenno.
Giyagni gepi jejine sana gwanatanu. Satu ganiika ga wa satupni giknokamtkona.
Gepi suxone ginripagita satu ginripiya. Sato ganiika. Satopni giknokamtkona.
“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata girugogne runanu Gitsrukate.
Ga wa gimatanru wa tye. Wa kwangixlerupji gimatkamka girpapko runinripa kachowguru, ruyokanmaka. Gi retashatanmaklu kotamgiyaplu gipji.
Giyagni galpokotinwa gixa koxa, gi rixanu gi gimata gixa girpapko nunanu Gita Yineru Wgenno.
“Giyagni ¿girupni wa wayegrechri gaponshinikanutkaluru ga wa kshinikanuru? Wale rutakamta rutsrukate gipji gajene chinanu, wale geneka nikletyapna nikjetinnapapko.
Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru wale wayegrechri wa runini rutsrukate rukshikyaplu wane gixanatachri.
Galikaka wane nchingi pejnuruko wane rixle chinanu rutakanru.
Ga wa gektutu wayegrechri wane chinanutka rajiya, ‘Ramga ginreta Nutsrukate,’
Yinuwaka giylakletletna ruwayegretkone. Nika, ga wa rura gimetachineyma.
Wale wayegrechri gitsrukate ginanu. Ma kagwakgognetinitgogne, runanu. Ma mumatinpapko runanu.
Kochipjepotutanru. Sanowashatachineyma rutakanru walenupa. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.
“Giyagni tengogne pogirewatyawaka pamole maklojine pixka rixanu. Wanna koscheklo yochpiikalurkaka wannanuko. Rushpakamtna yoptotapyapatkaluna gnunrowatachripa.
Pamyona manshinikanurone, ga wa pamyo koxa kanshinikanurone.
Giyagni wa manshinikanurone koscheklo yochpikjetanrona, seyni gi ranikluna ringi.
Seyni wa kanshinikanurone ganiklu ringi pastonoya yochpikjetkaluroyma.
Ramganatinikopshini gnunrowatachripa ruxapnewanatna, rutnonatna pejnuroneko. Rumkanatna.
“Ganikajyechno jemka saplechi wane chinachri, ‘¡Tyepatkani! Gnunrowatachripatkani. Gishpakanu. Gyoptotapanru.’
“Giyagni pejnuroneko maklojine yotunota. Ruglepokotlona yochpikjetanrona.
Giyagni manshinikanurone wane chinna kanshinikanurone, ‘Psoji genekanunwu gringite. Wa wyochpikjetanro giwniyanatkawu.’
“Seyni wa kanshinikanurone gigitna. Wane chinna, ‘Gike. Gi getko poyagotanu wixa chinanupa ga wa gixa chinanu koxa. Seyni gagjitapangonuklu gixanupa wa ragjijetikowakaya.’
“Ragjitapakopshinruna rapokatka gnunrowatachripa. Ga wa galpokonatachinetka jiglokamtatkaluna kashimyolu yegi. Rushyatkatka gipgyapto.
“Gowukshini pimrone gina maklojine. Wane chinna, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gitsrukaachi, pkotpukyegitanunwu.’
“Rugita wale. Wane china, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi numatgi.’
“Giyagni giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimatlu gigogne, gi wa gipapkoko.
“Gi rixanu tengogne pogirewatyawaka satu jeji pixka rixa wajra yachri. Tomgana wayegrene. Renekamtna wane rixle.
Satu reneka satu pacha waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji, ga wa satu gepmole waragkaproji. Satkaka rumkatyawaka renekna. Wajra yatka.
Wa satu pacha waragka yoptotachri ralimta. Marnewatatka. Walaya satu pacha waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka.
Waneko pixka rixa wa gepkoxamkojemole waragkaproji waneyalutu. Gepkoxamkojmole waragkatnaka yoptotatnaka.
Ga wa gepmole waragkaproji yoptotachri ralimta. Jitotlu chiji. Yogimatatkalo rutsrukate serojiprojite.
“Gowukshini potu runa wanna wayegrechine gitsrukate. Ruglepokotluna kwentatna.
Rapoka satu pacha waragkaproji yoptotachri. Raniklo pimro satu pacha waragkaprojitnaka. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, satu pacha waragka penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro satu pacha waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
“Rapoka koxa gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji penekamtno. Petanu. Pimro gepkoxamkojmole waragkaproji nyoptotatnaka walaya.’
“Rutsrukate wane chinru, ‘Poyagnu, wayegrechri kigleryi ga wa poyagkakachriyi. Psotsotaji putakika poyagkakachriyi. Gixo potu chinanu nutakinyi. Putsrukate gimuwatyawaka pjiglokanu.’
“Rapoka koxa gepimole waragkaproji yoptotachri. Wane china, ‘Gitsrukaachi, numatyi jeji shiko gajiryi. Pma mutaklewatyawakanu pjirgiya. Pma muknokajityawakanu papatjetya.
Npika. Nalimta. Nyogimatlo pserojiprojite chiji gitokote, wa gepmole waragkaproji. Waneyyi wa pixanu.’
“Rugita rutsrukate. Wane chinru, ‘Wayegrechri mugletyi ga wa ma mernuwatachriyi. ¿Pumatmakge wa nma mutaklewatyawakanu njirgiya, nma muknokajityawakanu napatjetya?
Giyagni pumkata gitakletlo nserojiprojite kgipekoklerune yegi, wa napokini nyoptotanmaklo gitanuko ga wa gixolewnachroymananuko.’
“ ‘Giyagni gkonanro waleya gepimole waragkaproji. Wa satu pacha waragkaproji waneyalutu genekanro.
Gi rixanu waneyalutu psoluko reneeko. Ruxolewnayegitanru. Ga wa waneyamigjetu, wane rixleko koniko.
Ga wa wayegrechri gike gapri migje maleka mapshagawaka giknokanru. Waneplu chiyaglu ga wa gashkaygitlu.’
“Wa noyaknu numuninipa Gita wa Yineru Wgenno ga wa pejnuruneko notowreneyma, natajiwniyawaka ntuplapijere ntuplatanu.
Gita getanu rapatjekaakona payinemnunanuka. Nkotspalatanna. Wa gowegane girukotachri pixka kotspalatna gowegane chiwo wgeneneyegiya.
Potuklesretate galikaka nutakanna gowegane. Kegnetesretate nutakanna chiwo wgenene.
“Giyagni Gita pogirchino wane nchinanna npotuklesretate gajene, ‘Ginanu, Nuru giglenshinikanutanune. Gyoptotanru pogirewatyawaka gixa chinanupa galpokotkaluru ma mutaakonuwa tye psolchijneko.
Gi rixanu nachinanno. Geneka nikletno. Nonunnagatewanata. Geneka giiretno. Pnu giyakatyachrino. Gyoptotno.
Mamkatno. Gmakatno. Nyayixa. Nsalwayegitno. Yoshmakjetikowakananno. Ginyegitno.’
“Giyagni poyagkakachine gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukaachi, ¿giklu wetyi pnachinatini ga wa woglutyi, waka gonunnagatewatachriyi ga wa weneka giiretyi?
¿Giklu wetyi pnu giyakatyachriyi ga wa wyoptotyi, waka mamkatyi ga wa wmakatyi?
¿Giklu wetyi pyayixanatini ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini pixa, ga wa wunyegityi pixa?’
“Wa Gita pogirchino gigitanna. Wane nchinanna, ‘Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta wa mturu potu wa nyi nomole wane gixini, wane gixno Gita.’
“Wanepnute wane nchinankoxna wa nkegnetesreta gwachine, ‘Gixrikinno, kamakpiratkalungi. Xirnachri gyanu gike rixiniko muwnakatu, tsru kamchi chinanu galpokotkaluru ga wa gitowrenenupa.
Gi rixanu nachi nixinina, gi geneka nikletanno. Nonunnagatewanatinina, gi geneka giiretanno.
Pnu nuyakatinina, gi wa gyoptotanno. Mamkatu nixini, gi wa gmakatanno. Nyayixinina ga wa yoshmakikowaka nwini, gi wa nsalwayegitanno.’
“Giyagni wanna koxa gigitanno. Wane chinannona, ‘Gitsrukachi, ¿giklu wetyi wa pnachinatini ga wa ponunnagatewatini ga wa pnu puyakatini, mamkatu, ga wa yayixachriyi ga wa yoshmakikowaka pwini, waneklu gi wa wupxakyi?’
“Gita gigitanna. Wane nchinanunna, ‘Galikaka wane nchingi, gi rixanu gi wane gixlu satu nyi mturpotune, gi wa Gita wane gixa.’
“Wane yanunna saletikowakapna gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu. Ga wa poyagkakachine wane yanna giwekikowaka gike rixiniko mnikawnakatu.”
Wane rixa. Rali ginkakletinitkalu Geso pejnuruko tyekakapirana, wane chinna yimaklene,
“Gixa gimatlu wa gepigogne giknoginpatka, waneplu Tsru Giknoglushgogne ga wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyooko, koroshishkita nutakikopatka.”
Giyagni tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yine tsrutene gapata. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupji rapatyana. Kaygwasu giwakni.
Jemanshinikankakna kashichyapluna Geso yokwireyna, ga wa ruylatyapluna.
Wane chinna, “Gi wa tsrugogneklupni. Ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
Wetani rawanata Geso, gijirgitutpachri Simopji.
Tapyegitlu sato suxo. Waneylo pastono klatalo, pgamlugalu yegi. Kwenuru potu. Nikawaka tuplanatini Geso, tuyokjiwutlu.
Wale retna yimaklene. Rumtuwnana. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa salewnaleta?
Gi rixanu tumkata gishankakotmaka tsru wenruya, renekikolupna kwamonurune.”
Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo twu suxo? Gi rixanu kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano.
Gi rixanu waneygognenanupgi wa kwamonurune gixayma, seyni Gita gi wa gimwagognenanutanutkagi.
Gi rixanu tuyokmanetno pgamlugalo, wa nkapnatikolupa tkamrutyano.
Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerupotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
Giyagni satu pamole gepi rixinri, Gota Giskaryote giwakatletachri tsrukakalune sasertotene yegi ya.
Wane chinna, “¿Klu galuka genekletno, gita samyokangi Wale?” Rupiratyaluna mapmoleproji.
Wanekluyakawa rujgalu ruglepoktapinri samyokyaplu.
Muchinangogne jimaprojpa gisekachri myapjetkotugognekaka yimaklene ginyegitlu Geso. Wane chinruna, “¿Ginaka paluka galpoklejixwu wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne pnikyawakapa?”
Wale wane china, “Pokchi gyanu wale jeji yegi. Wane nchinanru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “Nogognestsitkani. Pixa yegi Tsru Giknoglushgogne nkamrutinri nyimamkleneyma” ’ ”
Ga wa yimaklene Geso chinyawakna kamrutna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu.
Kayimnu chininitka nikawaka tuplatatka pamole gepi yimakleneyma.
Wa nikanatinna, Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, satu gixate rixinri samyokanutkano.”
Wamonuwnapotutna. Yinuwaka wane chinretna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni, Gitsrukaachi?”
Giyagni rugitna Wale. Wane chinna, “Girpaktanwa Gitayma gigakachri kolpetoya gimyoya, walepni wa samyokanno.
Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakannimka.”
Giyagni rugita Gota wa samyokjeru. Wane chinru, “¿Gitgetkoni, Rawi?” Wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
Nikanatinna wanna, Geso kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Renekna yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gyoptotanru. Gnikanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
Kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutyegitlo. Renekna. Wane chinna, “Giranu walaya pejnurunekgi.
Gi rixanu tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru, wa mukochri kaspukikolupa.
Ga wa wane nchingi, xaniyakawa gi wa nuranutkalo twu gowajga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
Wa wanna shikaletinitkalu gimalwuru, rushpakamtatkana. Goliwa Magkate yana.
Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Tye yechno pejnurunekgi gixapni gitspeekaakona Gita chinanu. Gi rixanu kayongalutkani: Nuylakanru girukotapratachri, ga wa gowegane gapatyawaka gajene kotspalkaakona.
Wa nyotunotinpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
Petro gigita. Wane chinru, “Pejnurunekmaka gitspetanu Pixa chinanu, gike nixiniko nutspetanu gita.”
Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane chinyi, tye yechno ma yanumatkanugnapuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno.”
Petro wane chinru, “Numkata gipnaletankoxmaka Pixayma, gi nnutatanyi.” Ga wa pejnuruneko yimaklene wane china.
Giyagni sana ya Geso wannayma. Getsemani chinikowaka sana yana. Wane chinna yimaklene, “Gewi ntuplatanu, nagjigognetapinikopshini.”
Ranikna Petro ga wa gepi Sewereyo wgenene. Yinuwaka wamonuwnaleta. Ga wa kojwakanshinikanutka.
Giyagni wane chinna, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixka potuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu Gitayma.”
Wane rajrinya psotsotaaji. Yoptsojita. Yonoogojpotuta. Ragjigogneta. Wane china, “Nuru, rumkatini wane gixletikolupa, ruknoganu tye salewakchi Gitaya, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
Yimaklene yegi ya. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “Giyagni ¿gi gimkata giyokletge Gitayma pshinitsonu?
Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma yantaletikotupa. Wa jmerenshinikanurungi galikakni, seyni gimane muchkotni.”
Rumepe wane yaletatnaka. Ragjigognetapa salewnalepirana. Wane china, “Nuru, nma murkanuwalo gi tumkata giknogletini Gitaya wa twu girapistono, wane gixkalurupni palukyawaka.”
Rumepe yayegletatnakna. Retamtna gimkanatachine, gi rixanu ruxapnewlena chinanu gi rumkata gimrekaygaletna.
Rajrinatnaka. Ragjigognetapa mapa kata rixinri. Waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka.
Wanepnute yimaklene yegi yatnaka. Wane chinna, “Gimkapanuchi. Gapnanutanutka. Nopapkostsitkani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookotka kmukochirerunemyoya.
Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
Wa yanumsanatiniwa, runatka Gota satu wa pamole gepi rixinrina. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Runna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrunekoxasreta gajene.
Wa samyokjerupa genekna saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane china, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru.”
Rapyegitinitkalu Geso, waneklu wane chinru, “¡Rawi!” Ralukatkalu ga wa ramlutlu.
Geso wane chinru, “Nomole, ¿klu chinanu puna?” Giyagni rapyegitluna. Geso. Kashichatkaluna.
Ga wa satu Gesoymalutu koshpaklu yoglolewapre. Rustaklu sasertotene gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
Giyagni Geso wane chinru, “Pumretanru pyoglolewapre. Rawyawaka putakanru. Gi rixanu pejnuruneko yoglolewapi koschekachri, yoglolewapiko ruylatiko.
¿Waka gkagwakluge gi numkata gagjiretlu Nuru; Walemka gitakyegitanutkano yokgipimole waragka pnute solalone gitowrene?
¿Seyni gi rixpoko poyagkaakotanmaka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru wane chinachri rumkata wane gixleta?”
Waneklu Geso wane chinna wa gixolune yine, “¿Ginyegitno gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge? Pagognemnunanuka gixayma ntuplanata. Nunkaklewata kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano.
Seyni pejnuruko tyekaka wane gixkaluru poyagkakikolupa wa yonchi, Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine yonga.” Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko yimaklene. Rasukatkana.
Ga wa Geso kashichachine ganiklu. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu Kaygwasu yegi ranikatkaluna, rapatyawakatkana yonchikgapine ga wa tsrune.
Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertotene gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Gitoko jigloka. Tuplanata towrechineyma retyaplu rushinityawakapa.
Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipujtalewlusha galikaka migje Geso chinanu ruylajixyapluna.
Gimka gepikna gipgujtalewashatachine gapokachine, seyni gi rukshikluna. Gapkatamtachine gepi gapoka,
wane chinachine, “Wale wane china, ‘Numkata jijrolekletlu kpashiwaka potu Goyakalunu, ga wa mapgogne nkamrupjitanutnaklu.’ ”
Palna sasertotene gitsrukate potu. Wane chinru, “¿Gike pugita? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wa nyi?”
Seyni Geso pochkeru. Sasertotene gitsrukate potu wane chinru, “Goyakalu giwekachri kawchinanu nkoschekjixyi. Punkakanwu, ¿Pixlege wa Kristo, Goyakalu Wgenyi?”
Geso wane chinru, “Pixa chinyawaka. Seyni wane nchinyi, Xaniyakawa gixa getanno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno tuplatyawakapa giyaklu potuklesretate, nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogne.”
Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskamkata. Wane china, “Mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine? Getanu wa xani. Gyijnakotatkalu ma mupashiregnuya. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?”
Rugitna. Wane chinna, “Ruklukanuwna rupninripa.”
Giyagni rutskagjegojitluna. Yotmutluna. Pimrine giptagojitlu.
Wane chinna, “Kristo, Goyakalu chinanu punkakanwu: ¿Katu giylakyi?”
Malekputu tuplanata Petro. Wane tapyegityalu sato wayegrechro. Wane china, “Pixa koxa Geso Kalile gajeruymananyi.”
Seyni pejnuruneko getanuya nutata. Wane china, “Gi numata gikta pchina.”
Rushpaka. Maleka gajeru gipgyaptote ya. Satu getatnaklu. Wane chinna wa wane gwanatachine, “Tye koxa Geso Nasare gajeruymananu.”
Wale kawchinanu nutatatnaka. Wane china, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.”
Pshinitsonu rapyegitluna wane gwanatachine. Wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixa koxa wannaymananyi. Gi rixanu ptokanu pumatika wa wane pixinri.”
Giyagni yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta. Yinuwaka Wale kawchinanu chinreta, “Gi numatlu wa jeji.” Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka.
Rushinkaplu Petro wa Geso tokanu, wane chininri, “Ma yanumatkanuwa gaxawripa, mapa kata pnutatanno,” chinyalu. Rushpakamtatka. Maleka ya. Chiyampotuta.
Goyechnokawpotuko jemanshinikankakjetikowaka jiglokna tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa yine tsrutene Geso chinanu, wa ruylatyapluna.
Rostutluna. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato girukotlewatachri yegi samyokluna.
Giyagni Gota wa samyokjeru retatkalu wa ruklukanuwnayegjixikolutka, kashrijetanshinikanuta. Satkaklo wa mapamoleproji tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune yegi.
Wane china, “Gita mukochirewatatka. Nsamyoklu muklukanuwnakatugraga.” Wa wanna wane chinru, “¿Gi rixwu wixa? Petanru pixa.”
Ruknokamtlo sroschiproji kpashiwakaya. Ralimta. Rushriknojitnanatkawa.
Tsrukaklune sasertotene gwalo sroschi. Wane chinna, “Ginanshichkalurni tuknokikolu wa kpashiri gignantakikowaka, gi rixanu granchi wenroni.”
Jemanshinikankakna. Walaya ragjitluna kajpa kamgakleruchijne, pnu giyakatyachine kapnatikowakapa.
Giyagni wane chinkaluru Granchichijne xanigognenanu.
Waneklu poyagkakatkalu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri Geremiya wane chinyawaka: Rawlona mapmoleproji sroschi wa rutakwenutikolu wenru, wa pimrine Gisrayiliklopishane gitakwenutanru.
Reneklona kajpa kamgakleruchijne chinanu, Gitsrukaachi chinyawakno.
Girukotlewatachri getanu tunwata Geso. Ga wa girukotlewatachri gepomgalu. Wane china, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?” Geso wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
Wa jigyegitkoklunu tsrukakalune sasertoteneya ga wa tsruneya koxa, gike rugita.
Giyagni Pilato wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pjema gi pejnupiranananukta jigyegityayina Pixa?”
Gi satuna tokanchi rugityalu. Giyagni girukotlewatachri giglajpotuta.
Wa tsrugogneklu satu yineru rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ralukanruna.
Giyagni waneyananna gostutkaluru kpogiru, Warawasu giwakatletachri.
Giyagni rapatinitkana, Pilato wane chinna, “¿Giru galuka wa nkaspukyegityapgi? ¿Warawaslege waka Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?”
Gi rixanu wale gimata wa ranxalna chinanu samyokluna.
Gitakyagoklewatikowaka tuplanatini wale, ganunro yokantokanyegitlu. Wane chinru, “Petashatanru Wale poyagkakachri. Gi rixanu xawakni gixo nsalewna Wale chinanu nupnawleya.”
Ga wa tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa tsrune gishinikanutna gixolune yine wa Warawasu galikaka ragjitinripna, ga wa Geso ruylajixinripna.
Rugita girukotlewatachri. Wane china, “¿Giru galuka wa nyi gepi wa nkaspukyegityapgi?” Wanna wane china, “Warawasupni.”
Pilato wane chinna, “Giyagni ¿gi nixyaplu Geso wa Kristo chinkaluru?” Pejnuruneko wane china, “¡Koroshishkita gitaakalurupa!”
Girukotlewatachri wane china, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?” Wanepnute potu tsaplewatna. Wane chinna, “Koroshishkita gitaakalurupni.”
Giyagni Pilato getinri gike rumkata, seyni wanepnute galikaka rixa gejnugima, gonu koscheka. Reromyoga gixolune yine getanu. Wane china, “Muklukanuwnakatno tyegragaya. Gixa getanutkalu.”
Pejnuruneko yine gigita. Wane chinna, “Wixa chinanupni gigragaya, ga wa wwugenene chinanupni.”
Giyagni kaspukyegitna Pilato Warawasu. Rali kochipjetjixletinitkalu Geso, samyokatkalu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
Giyagni girukotlewatachri solalotene ganikatkalu Geso. Tsrupji Pretoryopji ranikluna. Pejnuruneko solalone gapatyegitlu.
Giyagni Waleko gimkalu komkagatkaluna. Pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri yoshmakatkaluna.
Kona kamgikaluru sagyeta yoshmakjiwutatkaluna. Katsluksu samyokluna, potuklemyo. Yoptsojityegitluna. Ruxpiranatluna. Wane chinruna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone pogire!”
Rutskagjetluna. Kashichluna katsluksu. Ruylajiwutluna.
Rali gixpiranatletinikaluna, komkagatkaluna mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatnakluna. Ranikatkaluna, koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
Rushpakamtinitkana. Retluna Surene gajeru, Simo giwakatletachri. Wale rutjijixlona Geso koroshishkitate.
Rapokluna Kolkota chinikowaka. Walenwa Gijiwuswaga yegi chinikowaka.
Reneka giiretmakluna winga shepichlega yapjetkaluro. Retumgamkalo. Gi raluka giiretlo.
Koroshishkita rutakatkaluna. Kotspaltamkatluna. Gipenoklu rutakluna gimkalu.
Tuplatna. Wane retanatyaluna.
Gijiwu gogwakate rutakyaluna jigyegitikolu yonga, wane chinachri: Tyenwa Geso Goteyone Pogire.
Giyagni Waleyma koroshshkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta.
Wa giknogachine mupashiregnuchi chinruna. Ruwnownojiwutna.
Wane chinruna, “Pixni wa kpashiwakapji jijrolekachripyi, mapagogne pkamrupjitanutnaklu. Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, koroshishkita pujrukini.”
Waneko pixka china gixpiranatletluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine, ga wa tsrune. Wane chinna,
“Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa. Goteyone Pogirmaka, koroshishkita rujrukini xani. Walixanmaklu.
Raponshinikanutkamkalu Ruru Goyakalu. Rushatkapanru xani ralukiniplu. Gi rixanu wane china, ‘Goyakalu Wgenno.’ ”
Waneko pixka rixa yangaletluna kachowgurune Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune.
Tumananutkani ruchpokatka tkachi psolchijnepotunanuyako. Kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko rumrekatka.
Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsru plaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Lama sawajtani?” Walenwa, “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?”
Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Pete. Wale tomgalu Giliya.”
Waneklu rasukamta satu wannate. Rawlo katsopi. Kachgalu shichponkaklu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneka giiretlu.
Pimrine wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya rognetkakapyaplu.”
Rumepe saplewletatnaka Geso. Tsru saple rixa. Kaspukatkalu ruwekinri.
Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka gajeru giskakamtatka. Gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina.
Ruyolikchijita. Sotlukaka gitspatjeta. Rutpukamta yomlechkaka. Gi gepika kpashirinni gapnanutachinnimane yotunota.
Wa yotunotinitka Wale, waneklu yomlechi rushpakyatkana. Kpashiri pokchi yatkana. Gixolune yegi rupgujewnayegitna.
Ga wa ksolaloteru ga wa waleymalune Geso girukotanatachine getlu wa giyolikchijru, ga wa wane gixkalurkaka. Tsru piklu rixanna. Wane chinna, “Galikakni Goyakalu Wgenni wa tye.”
Wane rawanatna gixo suxone gowuka getanatyachine. Kalile romkagityaluna Geso. Rupxakanatluna.
Wannaymana Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa Santiyako, Gosi ginro Mariya, ga wa Sewereyo wgenene ginro.
Kayi rixinitka runa satu jeji ponikolu, Garimate gajeru. Gosi giwakatletachri. Wa Geso yimaklerkoxni wale.
Wale yayegitlu Pilato. Gesnimane ragjita. Giyagni Pilato genekjixmanetlu.
Gosi gwamanetatkalu. Powrachratalu poyitatkalu.
Waleko giyomlepmaka gerotupna rutaklu, sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gakanokachri. Wane yiyatka.
Wane rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, ga wa sato Mariya. Tuplanatna yomlechi ginaple.
Waleprikgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgogne, Pilato yegi rapatyana tsrukakalune sasertotene ga wa Gwariseyone.
Wane chinna, “Gitsrukaachi, wushiniklu wa wale kyokwirewaklerni wane china, ‘Mapagogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.’
Giyagni pyokanrewatanu girukotayomletikolupa mapgogne rixinpotunanuko, ma chowgutapyapluna yimaklene goyechno, ma wane chinyanupna yine, ‘Yotunomtatka gipnachinetskalaya.’ Gapkatatachri pupjeru muchinanu pnute ma mixinitipa.”
Pilato wane chinna, “Waneygi girukowatachine. Gajewa. Gignantakanru gimatyawaka.”
Wane yatkana. Rugnantakluna yomlechi. Rupitluna sotlu, girukowatachineymananuko.
Ruknoginitka gapnanutikalurgogne, rumrerekamtinitka muchinangogne wa simana, wane yana Mariya Maktala gajero ga wa sato Mariya, yomlechi retapyapna.
Waneklu waneru tsru giyolikchijru. Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachitowreru gijruka tengogneya. Rapoka. Rakaprurutlu sotlu yomlechi gajeru. Wale gogo tuplanatatka.
Rawrakle pixka rixgojita. Gimkalu klataa rixpotuta giwru pixka.
Wale piklena chinanu wa girukowatachine giypiypitana. Gipnachine pixka rixanna.
Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinna suxone, “Gi mpikanu gixa. Gi rixanu numatgi Geso gijga, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru.
Gi wa gewitkalu. Yotunomtatka wa Wale chinyawaka. Ginanu. Getapanru rutakanatikowaka.
Gajewa. Nteyakawamtanu. Ginkakapanna wa yimaklene yotunomtinritka gipnachinetskalaya. Kosekatkagi. Kalile yatka. Wane getinitkalu. Nunkakatkagi.”
Giyagni wanna yomlechi teyakawamtyatkana. Pikachine ga wa gimuwatachine potu. Rasukamtna yimaklene runkakapyapna.
Makakta Gesokni wa yoptotapna. Wane chinna, “Kiglenshinikanupgi.” Rapyegitluna. Kashjixitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna.
Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gajewa. Ginkakapanna nomolene wa Kalile yinripatkana. Wane retinnona.”
Wane yakopshinna, pimrine girukowatachine pokchi yatkana. Tsrukakalune sasertotene runkakapna pejnuruko retanrutkana wane gixachritka.
Rapatjetna tsruneyma. Jemanshinikankakna. Gixo sroschi reneekana solalone.
Wane chinkana, “Wane nchinanu, ‘Yimaklene goyechno ginapa. Chowgutpatkaluna, wumkanatni wixni.’
Wale yijnakotinipa girukotlewatachri, wixa giglepokyegitangi. Mkojwakanshinikanutkane wixkakangi.”
Wanna yoptotlo sroschi. Wane rixna wa runkakikowakna. Giyagni poshalpiranatka Goteyone yegi xanigognenanu.
Giyagni pamole satupje yimaklene Kalile yatkana, satu magka yegi wa Geso chinyawakpotukna.
Retinitkaluna yoptsojityegitluna. Seyni pimrine nutanshinikanyegitlu.
Rapyegitinitkana Geso, ruynumsatna. Wane chinna, “Psolpotuko nutakika tengogne ga wa chiji.
Giyagni gyanu. Gyimakanna payinemnunanuka. Gkatanna Girchi giwakaya, ga wa Gituru giwakaya, ga wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri giwakaya.
Ginkakanna kamrutyapluna pejnuruko nyokanatyagi. Gjemanu: Gixayma nwanu psolgogneko yoptukgogneshatyawakpotunanuko.”
Tyenwa yinuwakikolu Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi Geso Kristopirana Goyakalu Wgene.
Wane rixa yokanatkaluru Gisayiya Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri. Wane china: Gita yokanatlu notowreru pixa penute. Wale galpokotanru patnugapote.
Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri wane china: Galpokotanru Gitsrukachi gatnugapote. Mpotukatanru gigapkaka.
Gwa katlewata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Wane runkakyana yine genshinikanutachinepa katinripna. Ga wa kaspukamukochiretikolupapirana runkakna.
Rushpakyegitluna pejnuruneko Gotesreta gajene ga wa Gerosale gajene koxa. Wanna ptowruneko katka Gorta gapgaya. Rupgujtamukochiretnawana.
Wa Gwa makatlu kameyopixi. Wa pamta gipchiji rushrika. Wale niklu tsetse ga wa wrolga gosha gajeru.
Runkaklewata. Wane china, “Runa najxigi Gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa Gita gimukluni nyomshokinri nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa.
Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Wa Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya.”
Wane gixlutkani walegognekaka. Nasare Kalilechijne runyatka Geso. Wane Gorta gapga Gwa katyalu Geso.
Waneklu wa gonu yotunotyatka. Retlu gitpukachri tengogne, wa Giwekikaluru motkoko pixka rixa, Wale gogwaka gijrukyachri.
Tengogne runya satu tokanchi wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
Waneklu wa Giwekikaluru ganiklu yineru mwiyawakanu.
Wane rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya gepkoxamkojemolgogne. Wane rumlukanutyalu Satanasyo. Wane rawanata kmatsurunetskala. Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene gipxaklu.
Waneklu kashichkoklunutka wa Gwa. Wanepnute Geso wane ya, Kalile ya. Runkaklewata Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pogirewatyawakapirana.
Wane china, “Gigogne poyagkakatka. Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka gi gowukatkalu. Genshinikanutanu. Galixanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi.”
Tsru wenustsi Kalile yapamta. Retlu Simo repuruyma Gantirishi, chalugjetachine tsru wenuya, wa kshimagaklerune.
Wane chinna Geso, “Ginanu gwagajxigitanno. Yine gwapjetachine nixkakanutkagi.”
Waneklutka ruknokamtatkaluna chalnena. Romkagitatkaluna.
Wane rajrinya. Retlu Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene repuruyma Gwa. Wanna koxa kanawa gwanata. Ramtatluna chalkaka.
Waneklutka tomgana Wale. Ruknokamtluna rurna Sereweyo kanawaya kamrurewakleruneyma. Wane yana. Rawgajxigitluna.
Kapernawo rapokinitkana, gapnanutikalurugognekaka jiglokjeta ginkaklewawakapji. Wane runkaklewlejetya.
Ruglajitna wa runkaklewleya. Gi rixanu runkakna tsru gitaakaluru pixkako rixa. Gi wa yonchikgapine pixka rixa.
Waneru runkaklewawaklepjiyna jeji wa kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. Wale saplewata.
Wane china, “¡Ya! ¿Gi pixannatkawu Geso Nasare gajeru? ¿Puna pumtukpotutapyapwu? Numatyi Kpashiryi Goyakalunu.”
Geso chigetjetlu. Wane china, “Pochkepyi. Pushpakanutka waleya.”
Wa kamchi puchotlewatachri shipchojtakakanru jejni. Saplewjetana tsruplaji. Rushpakamtatka wa waleya.
Pejnuruneko giglajita. Giyagni repomgakakna. Wane chinna, “¿Klunerni wa tye? ¿Klu gerotu ginkaklewlutkani wa tye? ¡Waleni wa tsru gitaakaluru pixka rixa! Wale yokanatna kamchine puchotlewatachine. Jemluna Wale.”
Waneklu pogiwata psolchijnepotunanuko Kalilesretaya.
Wanepnute rushpakamtinitkana ginkaklewawakapjiya, wanna wane yana Simo, Gantirishipji, Santiyakoyma, Gwa koxa.
Wa Simo gimajiro gikluga. Tpachwata. Giyagni walapirana runkakluna.
Giyagni rapokinitka kosemyotlo, yotunkaklo. Tupachwalgamtatka. Wala gipxakatkana.
Wa kayi rixinitka wa rumxikinitka tkachi ranikyegitluna pejnuruneko yayixachine, kamchichachine.
Wa pejnuruneko tsru pokchi gajene gapatjeta gipgyaptoya.
Geso gituukakna gixo yayixachine pnumnunanuka gixachri yayixluya. Wale giknokna maleka gixo kamchine. Gi ruchi yanumsaletna kamchine, gi rixanu rumatluna.
Yotunomta goyechnokawpotuko, ma mumrereekanuwa. Rushpakamta. Wane ya yineru mwiyawakanu. Wane ragjigognetya.
Simo, waleymalune gijgalu.
Rukshikluna. Wane chinruna, “Pejnuruneko gijgayi.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Wane gayanu papokchikaka gawastsitanune yegi. Wane koxa nunkaklewatini. Wale chinanukni nuna.”
Wane ya. Runkaklewananumta runkaklewawaklepjikakayna psoluko Kalileya. Ruknokyana maleka kamchine.
Satu gijirgitutachri ginyegitlu. Ragjipotutlu. Yoptsojityegitlu. Wane chinru, “Palukiniplu pumkata powratletno.”
Geso getwamonutlu. Romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu. Powra pixinripa.”
Waneklutka gijirgitlu gitukyegitatkalu. Powratkalu.
Rujretlu. Yokanatatkalu.
Wane chinru, “Gike punkakanu. Seyni pyanu. Sasertote pekakgitapinwa. Penekashatanru powranuya wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni gipgujtalewlu wanna chinanu.”
Wa wale gishpakamtatka. Yinuwaka ginkakletletlu gixo. Poshalpiranamtlu. Giyagni wa Geso gi wa gimkata gapokletlu gipgujewnaleta tsru pokchiya, seyni maleka rawanata yineru mwiyawakanuya. Runyegitluna Wale pnumnunanuka gajene.
Gi gixogogne giknoginiwa, Kapernawo rapokatka. Yijnakyegitinitka panchitkalu,
rapatjekakna gixolune. Gi wa gipgyaptoko poyagotatka. Geso ginkakna wa tokanchi.
Runna. Ranikyegitluna giktegachri. Ranikjene gepkoxamkoje.
Gi wa rumkata gapyegletluna gixo yine chinanu. Suswakluna wa washre Wale ginaple. Wane rixa kotpukleswatluna. Wane jijrukyaluna gijeko wa giktegachri giklugyawaka.
Geso getlu wanna galixle. Wane chinru giktegachri, “Wiwi, pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka.”
Wane koxa tuplanatna pimrine yonchikgapine. Wanna gishinikanuwata rajiyna.
Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane china yanumsaleta wa tye? Mupashiregnuchi china. Gike gimkata kaspukmukochirewleta. Satupjeru Goyakalupje.”
Giyagni rumata Geso Walenanuko wane rixanshinikanutinrina. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu wane gixanshinikanuta tyekaka wa gajiya?
¿Girni wa myapretu potu? Wane chinikolu giktegachri, ‘Wa pmukochirkaka pkaspukikatka,’ ga wa wane chinikolu, ‘Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekotanu. Pyanutka.’
Wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno tyechijneya gitaakalurno kaspukmukochiretjerupno,” wane chinru giktegachri,
“Pixa wane nchina, Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekomtanu. Pyanutka pupji.”
Yotunomtatka. Waneklutka koschekjekomtatka. Rushpakamtatka pejnuruneko getanu. Giyagni pejnuruneko giglajita. Rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Wane chinna wanna, “¡Gi pagogneko wane pixkalutu weta!”
Rumepe gishpakleta. Tsru wenu yatka. Pejnuruneko yine ginyegitlu. Wale ginkaklewyegitna.
Ruknogamta. Retlu Rewi Galgweyo wgene. Tuplanata girukotlewatachri wenutikowaka. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.” Palnamtatka. Romkagitatkalu.
Waneklu wane rawanatini Geso wa nikawakakwa Rewipji, gixna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune nikawakakwa koxa rawanatna Gesoyma, yimaklene koxa. Gi rixanu gixolunni yine. Romkagitluna.
Wanena yonchikgapine. Wannanwa Gwariseyone koxa. Retanatluna nikyawaka wannayma kmukochirerune ga wa gijgawenutachine. Wane chinkanna wa yimaklenni Gwariseyoneya ga wa yonchikgapineya, “¿Gi rixatka wa wannayma nika, rura, wanna gijgawenutachine ga wa kmukochirerune?”
Geso yijnakotlu. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa gichkolune gi galuklu kpinrewakleru, seyni yayixachine galuklu. Gi wa nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine, seyni wanna kmukochirerune ntomginripni.”
Wa Gwa yimaklene ga wa Gwariseyonenu gogajirewata. Runna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klu chinanu wanna Gwa yimaklene wa Gwariseyone yimaklene koxa gogajirewata, ga wa Pixa yimaklene gi wa gogajirewata?”
Wane chinna Geso, “Gi rumkata gogajirewletna wanna kashimyolu getachine gnunrowatachri wannaymalutuwa, Gita pixka nyimakleneymano. Wa wannayma rawanatini gnunrowatachri gi rumkata gogajirewletna, xani pixka wa Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene.
Runinpatka pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konikolgognepatka wannayegiya. Waneklu rogajirewatanna wanna.
“Gikena gamatlu wa muchkirgakatu mkachri gitsole. Wane rixkoklunu, waleko gerotu sama suskaklu gitsole. Wanepnuteyaka rixa giskakletanatka.
Gikena giyokgatlu winga gerotu, tsapkaka tsrutsoleji. Wane rixkoklunutka, winga suskakanru tsapkakni. Tuyokgata wino. Tsapkaka salewna. Seyni wa winga gerotu tsapa gerotu tutakgatka.”
Wane rixa. Sana yapanata gapnanutikalurgogne. Yimaklene yanananumta. Yinuwaka sustakagwuremtluna gitaklugwu.
Giyagni Gwariseyone wane chinru, “Petanu. ¿Klu chinanu wane rixna gapnanutikalurgogne wa ginanshichkalurgogne?”
Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongatlu wa gi rixpokota Tawi, magatini wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune?
Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu wa Goyakalupji, wa Gawiyatari walenwa sasertote gitsrukatpotu. Niklu jimaprokaka gekakgitkaluru. Wa walenwa ginanshichkaluru niklu. Sasertotenepje niklu. Reneekoxna rumotsane.”
Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Wa gapnanutikalurgogne yine chinanu kamrutka. Wa yine gi kamrutka gapnanutikalurgogne chinanu.
Giyagni wa gapnanutikalurgogne koxa gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
Jiglokatnaklu ginkaklewawakapji. Waneru satu jeji giprigamyotachri.
Giruktatluna Geso wa gapnanutikalurgogne rutuukaklewatinri wa jigyegityapluna.
Wane chinru wa jeji giprigamyotachri, “Pyotunotanu ganikajiya.”
Wane chinatnakna Geso, “¿Girni wa gapnanutikalurgogne muklukanutu kamrutkalurupa: waka kiglerge waka gektutlege? ¿Gognetkaklurge giweklu waka giylalu?” Ga wa wanna pochke.
Reknojtayegitna. Jigekanuwata. Wamonuwna wa shikgaji rixinrina. Wane chinru jeji, “Pomyokanu.” Romyoka. Ruglewamyotatka.
Rushpakamtna Gwariseyone. Waneklutka Giroreyoneyma jemanshinikankakyegitluna Wale ruylatyapluna.
Geso gitspalamta. Tsru wenu ya yimakleneyma. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine Kalile gajene Gote gajene koxa,
Gerosale gajene, Gitome gajene, ga wa pasreta Gorta gajene, Tirostsi gwachine, Sitostsi gwachine, gixolune yine. Jemyegitluna gi pixkalutukokta kamruta. Runyegitluna Wale.
Wane chinna Geso wa yimaklene galpokjixanutkalo kanawa gixolune yine chinanu ma machpakyanupluna.
Gi rixanu gi gepika rutuukaka. Giyagni rujirkojetna Wale gogo yayixachine pejnunanuka kamrukyapluna.
Ga wa kamchine puchotlewatachine getinri yoptsojityegitluna. Saplewatna. Wane chinna wanna, “Pixni wa Goyakalu Wgenyi.”
Geso gijretna gixo gi rupgujetanruna.
Kanika magka. Tomgana Wale gishinikanune. Runyegitluna.
Geso gitakna pamole gepi Waleyma gwachinepa, wa yokanatanunepa ginkaklewatachinepa,
wa kamchine maleka ruknokyapna.
Rutakna pamole gepi: Simo; wale rutakgiwakata Petro;
wa Santiyako, Sewereyo wgene; Gwa, wa Santiyako gepuru (Giwakatna Wowanerge; walenwa rutlogle pixkalune),
wa Gantirishi, wa Wilipi, wa Wartolo, wa Matiyo, wa Tomasu, wa Santiyako Galgweyo wgene, wa Tateyo, wa Simo Muchkopiranawatachri;
wa Gota Giskaryote samyokjerupa.
Panchi rapokinitkana, rapatjetatnakna yine. Giyagni wa wanna gi gimkata nikletna.
Wa jempiranyegitluna wa Wale gimwanune. Runna kashichyapmakluna. Wane chinna wanna, “Sepronachrinatkani.”
Gerosale yopikyana yonchikgapine. Wanna wane china wa waneylu Welsewo, wa tsru potu kamchiyma ruknokna kamchine maleka.
Wa tomginitkana Geso, wane china yapkakluya, “¿Gi rixpoko maleka giknokletinwa Satanasyokakluko?
Wa pogirewatikowaka gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka, gi rumkata gwagogneretna wa wale pogirewatikowaka gajene.
Panchi gajene wannakakluko kotspalanshinikankakmaka gi rumkata gwagognereta wa wale panchi gajene.
Wa Satanasyo yagotinmakwa walenanuko wa, kotspalanshinikanutinmakwa gi rumkata gwaleta seyni nikawnanu.
Gike gimkata jiglokletlu gipji gichkolu, chowgutyaplu rejnunkate ma mostutkanuwalu wa gichkolu. Waneklu chowgutyalu gipji gajeru.
Galikaka wane nchingi, kaspuukalurupni wanna yine wgenene pejnuruneko mukochirkakna, mupashiregnuchi girukokta mupashiregnuchi yanumatini.
Seyni girukokta wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiri mupashichkatu, gike rixiniko kaspukiko seyni giklukanuwnachri mukochri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa.”
Gi rixanu wanna wane china, “Waneylu kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
Tuna runro, repurune koxa. Maleka rawna. Repukmakluna.
Wa gixolune yine ruxiplatjene wane chinruna, “Petanu. Malekna punro, pepurune. Rujgayina.”
Wa Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Katni wa nunro, wa nepurune?”
Retjetna ruxiplatanune. Wane china, “Getanna nunro nepurune.
Wa girukokta kamrutlu Goyakalu galukanru, ga ga walenwa nepuru, nepuro, nunro.”
Rumepe yinuwaka ginkaklewleta tsru wenustsiya. Rapatyegitluna gixo potu yine. ¡Gi pejnunanukta! Giyagni ratskotatka kanawa. Wane tuplatatka tsru wenuya. Pejnuruneko yine chiji gwa, tsru wenuwnaga.
Runkaklewyegitna Geso yapkakluya gi gepikapirana. Wane chinna Geso runkaklewleya,
“Gjemanu. Satu kgitaklewakleru gishpakamta rutaklewtapanu.
Wane rixa kopalajreta. Pimriji gatnugapostsi gapokajita. Runna koshichine teno yapachine. Niklokajitluna.
Pimriji sotlu gwiyawaka gapokajita mawiyawakanu potu kajpa. Waneklu rupcheknimka gi rixanu gi wa tenru kajpa.
Ga wa rushpakini tkachi jimanatkalu. Ma matskinu chinanu rupriganatka.
Pimriji kona yegi gapokajita. Tseruwna konkaka. Kapotanatkalu. Gi kajinatkalu.
Pimriji kiglewaka chiji, gapokajita. Wane jiwatya. Tseruwna. Ruxolewna. Rawa satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
Walepje rixini repomgaluna rawastsitanune pamole gepiyma wa yapkaklupiranaya.
Wane chinna Geso, “Ga wa gixa geneeka gimatyaplu giyogimanatkaluru Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Wa maleka gajene ginkaaka yapkaklupjeya pejnurukopirana.
Retinna retanmakna, ma mumatinitipna. Jeminna, jemanmakna, ma mumata jeminitipna, ma kashrijetikotupna, ma kaspukmukochiretkanupna.”
Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimatlu tye yapkaklu? ¿Gi gixpoko gimatletanru ptowruko yapkaklu?
Wa kgitaklewakleru gitaklu tokanchi.
Ga ga wannanwa gatnugapostsi gwachine. Rutakikna tokanchi. Wa jeminitkana waneklu runa Satanasyo. Konyanna tokanchi rajna gitaakaluru.
Waneko pixka rixna wa gitaakalurune sotlu gwiyawaka. Wa jeminitkaluna tokanchi waneklu yoptotluna rumuwleyna.
Gi wa waneyna gitskina wanna. Wa pshinitsonu gwachinepa. Wa runini salewakchi, wa kojwawakchi tokanchi chinanu waneklu rutspekaakana.
Pimrine gitaakalune wannanwa konyegirune wa tokanchi jemachine.
Wa kojwakanshinikanrukaka tyegogneya ga wa ponikolewlu yokwire ga wa getsotanrewlu pagixankakaya jigloka. Kapotlu tokanchi. Gi wa jiwatanatka.
Wannanwa gitaakaluru kiglewaka chiji, wa jemachine tokanchi. Wanna yoptotlu. Jiwatna, satu mapamoleji, satu patsrujirmoleji, satu satu pachaji.”
Wane koxa chinna Geso, “¿Taniikege yochpikjetkalurompuko wa gimatumpuko ga wa shechimpuko tutakikolupa? ¿Gi ge katalo kgapiko tutakikolupni, wa tpokamlatinripa?
Gi rixanu maleshlu wa yogimatkaluru ma mupgujetikotupa. Gi wa pochkeruko mpogijetkotupni.
Girukokta kajnakopnalu wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
Wane koxa chinna Geso, “Xakoka gyijnakotanru. Wa yantapi gixa yantajetinro, walako yantatingina gixanuko. Gyognikyegitko gixapa.
Wa waneyalutu wanepnute reneeka. Waneyamigjetu wane rixle konikona.”
Wane china Geso, “Wane rixa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa satu jeji gitaklu giji chijiya.
Rumka, yotunota, goyechno ga wa gogi. Wa kajiruji gipcheka. Tseruwna. Gi rumata gi rixpokota.
Walenanuko jiwkaknawa wa chiji. Muchinanu yosnukapcheta; wanepnute gigwutka, wanepnute giji galixachri gigwuya.
Wa ralijitinitka waneklutka gistakapi rustajikatka gi rixanu rapokatka gipapko jirgikolupa.”
Wane china Geso, “¿Giru wutakanru wale pixkalutu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu? ¿Giru yapkaklu wutakanru?
Wa mostasaji pixka rixa. Wa chiji rutaakoklunu walenwa mtserutu ptowruko kajiruji giyagokolutu wa chijiya.
Wa rali gitakletkoklunutka. Rupcheka. Tseruwna tsru potu ptowru kshana gitaakaluru pnute. Tsruplukakni. Giyagni koshichine tengogne gajene gimkata gwaleta gichiklempuko.”
Gixo tye pixkalutu yapkakluya Wale ginkakna tokanchi wa rumkata jemletyawakna.
Ga wa yapkaklu migje gi wa runkakna Geso, seyni Waleko yimaklene wannapje rixini runkakpokowakatna ptowruko.
Wa walegogne wa kayi rixinitka wane chinna Geso, “Wakanu gayanu.”
Wa yokanatkatkana gixolune yine. Waneklu ranikatkaluna yimaklene kanawaya. Wane koxa yana pimro kanawkaka Waleyma.
Yopyoka tsru kannipgyalu. Tuygajetlo gishpurga kanawa. Giyagni katsepgatkalo kanawa.
Tostsi rawananumta. Rumkananumta rutspannojreya. Komyekluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿gikenna rixyi wa wupninripatka?”
Wa yotunotinitka chigetjetlu kannipgyalu. Wane chinru wa tsru wenu, “Pochke. Pushyanamatanu.” Rutuka wa kannipgyalu. Mayegixgataa rixanatka.
Wa wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu mpikatka? ¿Klu chinanu gi galixgognenatawa?”
Pikna tsru piklu. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katni wa Tye? Wa kannipgyalu wa tsru wenu jemyawaklu.”
Wakanu yana tsru wenuya Gerasenonesreta.
Wa ruptekinitka kanawaya, waneklutka yoptotaplu satu jeji yomlechi gajeru. Kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu.
Yomlechi yegi gwachrini wale. Gikeko gimkata gosturetatkalu, gi wa yowumatsayakoxapa.
Wa gi gepi kata wane rostutkamkatka supoya yowumatskoxaya. Wa yowumatsni rustonjemtana waleya. Wa supni tutskinjemtana. Gikena poyago gipuchkakletlu.
Psolyechnoko psolgogneko wane rixa saplewjenanumta magkaya yomlechkakaya. Rustajitnawa sotluya.
Wa retinitkalu wa Geso gowukayako rasukamta. Yoptsojityegitlu.
Saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “¿Gi pixanutkano Geso, Goyakalu teno potu Gajeru Wgene? Kachingagjire nixyi Goyakalu kawchinanu, gi wa psaletpotutanno.”
Gi rixanu Geso wane chinatkalu, “Pushpakyegitanru tye jeji, kamchi puchotlewatachri.”
Geso gepomgalu, “¿Klu giwakyi?” Rugitlu. Wane china, “Ngiwaka Gixoluru, wa gixolurunpotwu.”
Wa ragjitlu maleka ma yokanatyaplu tyesretaya.
Wanenanru magkastsi gixoluru kochi. Nikanatna.
Ragjitluna pejnuruneko kamchine. Wane chinna, “Kochi yegi pyokanatanunwu wa wanna wjiglokyapa.”
Geso gichichna. Rushpakamtatkana kamchine puchotlewatachine. Kochinni jiglokamtatkana. Gixolunni kochinni gipjita gijrukyanatka. Tsru wenu rapokanna. Wanegetkonna gepi waragka. Tsru wenu gagyekyachinena.
Wanna kochi girukotachine gasukamta. Runkaklewtapna tsru pokchiya, ga wa sana gajene koxa. Runatkana retapyapluna klunerukta wane gixkaluru.
Runyegitluna Geso. Retluna wa kamchitpachri wa gixoluru gwanatanru. Tuplanatatka. Kamkatkalu. Kanshinikanutkalu. Pikanna.
Retanatjene ginkakna gikta rixpokonatka wa kamchitpachri, wa kochinepirana.
Yinuwaka gagjiretluna Geso wa rushpakinripa wannasretaya.
Ratskota kanawa. Wa kamchitpachri gagjitlu wa Wale yegi rawinripatka.
Geso gi galuka ganikletlu. Wane chingonuklu, “Pupji pyanutka pumwanune yegi. Punkakanna gikta rixpokotatkayi Gitsrukaachi. Wale punkakanna retwamonutyayi.”
Ralimta. Yinuwaka ginkaklewletatka Ntekapoliya gikta rixpokotatkalu Geso. Pejnuruneko gimyeka.
Koprugatatnaka Geso kanawaya. Wakanu ya. Rapatyegitluna gixo yine. Tsru wenuwnaga rawa.
Runa satu wa tsru gitaakalurune ginkaklewawakapji gajenyegiya, Gayro giwakatletachri. Retinitkalu yoptsojityegitlu Gesojixistsiya.
Wane chinru, “Wuya wanepnawakla nshicho wgeneji. Petapanunro. Tupnakastsinatkani. Putakamyogogotanunro tutskalginripa. Tuwekanu.”
Geso waleymamnutka. Romkagimtluna gixolune yine. Rachpakluna.
Sato suxo gigragalewatachrona. Pamole gepi walapu gigragalewatachrona.
Gixo kpinrewaklerunyegimka tyanitka. Wanna chinanu tsalewna gixo. Tnikatlewatanatka ptowruko walanuko tixinri. Gikena gipxakanro. Seyni taalinanumtana.
Tjempiranyegitinitkalu Geso, tuna Wale gajxigiya wa gixolune yine yegi. Tkamrukamkatlu.
Wa wane china wala, “Nkamrukamkashatinri nutskalganu.”
Waneklutka tograga gitskikatka. Tumatnawa tomaneya tuglewatinritka wa tsalewnanatinri.
Waneklutka Geso gimatatka Walenanuko rushpakamtyatka giyaklu. Ruprotaka wa gixolune yine yegi. Wane china, “¿Katu kamrukamkatno?”
Wane chinruna wa yimaklene, “Gi ge petna wa gixolune yine gachpakyawakyi. Seyni wane pchina, ‘¿Katu kamrukno?’ ”
Wale geknojtata retyaplo katukta wane gixlu.
Wa suxo pika. Tutatata. Tumata wa wala gixyawaka. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu Wale. Tunkaklu ptowruko galikaka.
Wale wane chinro, “Wiwi, palixle gitskalakyi. Pyanu. Kiglenshinikanpatkayi. Kiglepatkayi wa psalewninrinanutka.”
Yanumsatiniwa Wale, ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukatepji runyana pimrine. Wane chinna, “Pshichni tupnanatka. ¿Klu chinanu pkojwakawalu Yimaklewatachri?”
Seyni Geso jemashatlu tye tokanchi wane chinkaluru. Wane chinru tsru gitaakaluru ginkaklewawakapji gajeru, “Gi pumyekanu. Palixashatanu.”
Gi wa ruchichlu wa satu gininripa Wale gajxigi ga wa Petro, wa Santiyako, wa Gwa, repuru wa Santiyako
Wane ya gipjiya ginkaklewawakapji gitsrukate. Retlu sejrechi, chiyagatachine, saplewjepotutachine.
Jiglokamta. Wane chinna Geso, “¿Klu chinanu nsejrewna nchiyaganata? Wa mturo gi tupna seyni tumkanata.”
Ruxpiranatluna. Wale maleka giknokna pejnuruneko. Ranikna wa mturni giru ga wa tunro, ga wa Waleymalune koxa. Jigloka mturni gwiyawaka.
Ga wa kosemyotinitkalo mturni, wane chinro, “Talita komi.” Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Mturo, pixa wane nchinyi, pyotunotanu.”
Waneklutka mturo yotunotatka. Tyanatka, gi rixanu waneyatkalo pamole gepi walapu. Waneklutka ruglajitna. Tsru giglajru rixna.
Wale gijretna gikena gimatanru. Wane china teneeko tnikanru.
Rushpakamta waneya. Rapoka gichijne. Romkagitluna yimaklene.
Rapokinitka, gapnanutikalurgogne yinuwaka ginkaklewleta wa ginkaklewawakapjiya. Gi gepika yijnakotlu. Ruglajitna. Wanna wane china, “¿Ginaka rumatyalu Wale tyekaka? ¿Klu gimatkalewlunwa tye renekikolu wa Wale? ¿Gi pixkalutunanni ruyaklekaka kamrutkalurni gimyoya?
¿Gi ge kyosokoklerukni tye, wa Mariya wgene, wanna Gosi, wa Gota, Simo wanna yegwaklu? ¿Gi wa gewna wixayma repurone?” Wale rutspenshinikanutyana.
Wa Geso wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine kagwakpiratkalunni, seyni gichijnepjeya, ga wa gimolenyegisretaya, ga wa gipjiya mkagwakpiratkotni.”
Gi wa rumkata kamruretlu waneya wa satu ruyakleya. Rutuukakna psotsotajiko yayixachine, walepje. Wanna gogo rutakamyota.
Ruglajita wa ma malixleyna. Sajrukamta papokchikaka walesreta. Runkaklewata.
Tomgana Geso wa pamole gepi. Wa yinuwaka yokanretna gepkaka. Tsru rutakna wa kamchine puchotlewatachine chinanu.
Yokanatatkana gikena ranikanna wa gatnugapoya, satupjeru kanojerna; gi wa nikanruna, gi wa tsapako, gi wa sroschiko tsapaneyna.
Wa rutakanrona yoshmakjixrechishpatapje. Gi wa gepimkalu rutakanna.
Wane chinna Wale, “Ginakakokta gjiglokanu satu panchi, wanepji gwanu gishpakamtinpotunanuko waneya.
Wa pejnuruneko wa gma yoptotjenepa, gma jemjenepa, gishpakamtinpatka wa waneya giplokjiximtanu gistapjixipagi wa rumatikolupa wanna chinanu.”
Rushpakamtatkana. Runkaklewatna wa yine genshinikanutanu.
Gixo kamchine maleka ruknokna. Ruyookana ringi gixo yayixachine. Rutukna.
Pogirchi Girore jemyegitlu. Gi rixanu rumatkatka Geso giwaka. Wane china, “Gwa wa katlewatachri yotunota gipnachineya. Giyagni kgiyaklewaklerni Wale.”
Pimrine wane china, “Giliyni.” Pimrine wane china, “Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachrini. Satu tokanchi geneklewatachri pixka rixa.”
Jeminitka Girore wane china, “Gwakni wale wa nustaknoojixanru. Yotunotatka.”
Gi rixanu muchikawako Girore towyegitanru. Kashijixlu Gwani. Rostujixlu wa yoshmakwaka wa Giroryana chinanu repuru gnunro Wilipi. Wa wala ganunrota Girore.
Gi rixanu wa Gwa wane chinatkalu Girore, “Ginanshichkalurni wa pepuru gnunro waneyyi pixinri.”
Giyagni Giroryana gayegixlu. Taluka giylajixletlu. Gi tumkatlu.
Gi rixanu wa Girore piklu wa Gwa. Rumatlu wa wale jeji poyagkakachrini wa kpashirni. Girukotlu. Giyagni jeminri gi rumatanshinikanuta. Yijnakotlu rumuwleya.
Runa pagogne ruglepoktapini wa Girore wa poyagkakawalaputetini. Meyiwlu nachnewlupa kamruta wa tsrukakalune, tsru gitaakalune, wa wanna potu Kalile gajene chinanu.
Tjiglokamta Giroryana nshicho. Tansata. Tmeyitlu Girore ga wa waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwa. Pogirchi wane chinro makloji, “Pagjitanno klunerukokta paluka. Gita genekanyi.”
Wale kawchinau wane chinro, “Pagjitanru pejnunanuka nenekanyi. Ganikajiko npogirewatyawakaya nenekanyi.”
Tushpakamta wala. Wane chinro tunro, “¿Klu nagjitanu?” Wala wane china, “Wa Gwa katlewatachrijiwu pagjitanu.”
Waneklutka giyampotu tjiglokyegitlu pogirchi. Tagjitlu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu xawakniko, penekyapno satu kotajipi Gwa Katlewaklerujiwu.”
Wa pogirchi wamonuwnapotuta, seyni Wale kawchinanu chinrekaka, waleyma gwanatachine nikawakakwaya chinanu, gi raluka giknokakletokanuta.
Waneklutka pogirchi yokanatlu satu girukotjeru. Yokanatlu ranikjiwutikolupa. Wa wale wane ya. Rustaknojitlu yoshmakawakaya.
Ranikjiwutatkalu kotajipiya. Reneklo makloji. Wa makloji geneklo tunro.
Jeminitkana wa yimaklene, runna. Ranikluna gimane. Yomlechi rutakluna.
Yokanatanune rapatjetna Geso yegi. Runkaklewyegitluna ptowruko klunerukta kamrutanrunapirana, wa runkaklewtapinrina.
Geso wane china, “Ginanu gixa mkoje yineru mwiyawakanuya. Gapnanutanu pshinitsonu.” Gi rixanu gi gepikna wane ginachine yachine. Gi wa kagognena nikinripna.
Ralimtna wanna mkoje sato kanawaya yineru mwiyawakanu.
Gixo geta yaletna. Rumatkana. Wane rasukyegitluna chijiya ptowruko tsru pokchikaka gajene. Wanna gapka gapoka. Rapatyegitluna Geso.
Ruptekamta Geso. Retna gixolune yine. Retwamonutna gi rixanu gowegane pixka rixna gi waneyna girukotjerna. Yinuwaka ginkaklewyegitna gixopirana.
Wa kayi rixinitka yimaklene gapyegitlu. Wane chinna, “Gewni yineru mwiyawakanu. Wa kayitkani.
Pyokanatanna yine wa sana yinripna, wa pokchikaka tyesretaya wa ragjityapluna nikanrupna.”
Rugita Wale. Wane china, “Gixa genekanna nikanropna.” Wane chinruna, “¿Wanerge gayanu? ¿Wagjitanro jimapro gepi pachproji wenroloto, wenekyapna nikinropna?”
Wale wane china, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi? Getapanro.” Rumatinitkana. Wane chinna wanna, “Pamyo. Gepi shima.”
Towutna wanna tuplatinripna pejnuruneko paptogkaka peklomta poleru.
Tuplatna paptogkaka satu pachkaka ga wa pamyomolkaka koxa.
Geso kashichlo pamyo jimapro ga wa gepi shima. Tengogne yigata. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Wa jiknajrotlu jimapro. Renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Raneksatkana wa pejnuruneko wa gepiroto shima koxa.
Nikatkana pejnuruneko. Jinanutkana.
Koschekluna psojkaka pamole gepi kojita katsepo, ga wa shima koxa.
Wa nikachine pamyo waragka jejine.
Waneklutka kanawa ratskojixatkana yimaklene wa Wetsayta gapka yinripna wakanu. Wane yakopshinna yokanatna gixolune yine.
Rali gingaletinitkana wane ya magka. Ragjigognetapa.
Wa kayi rixinitka wa kanawa ganikajgatkalo tsru wenuya. Walepje chiji gwatka.
Retna kegeknanuwatna ranikgatyawakna. Wa kannipgyalu satkakanna. Wa goyechnokawpotuko Geso ginyegitna. Tsru wenumta yapananumta. Raluka giknoglemtna.
Retinitkaluna wa tsru wenumta yanamtyawaka. Kagwakluna pagixanu. Saplewatanna.
Gi rixanu pejnuruneko getlu. Rumyekanna. Waneklutka Geso giynumatna. Wane china, “Kiglenshinikanupgi. Gitni. Gi wa mpikanu.”
Ratskota kanawa wanna yegi. Rutukamta kannipgyalu. Ruglajpotutanna.
Gi rixanu gi rumata jemluna wa jimaprokakapirana. Shikowgajitna wane rixinrina.
Wa koprugatinitkana, wane yana Genesarchijne. Rutspakatkana.
Ruptekinitkana wa kanawaya, waneklutka rumatkatka Geso.
Rasuktatna psoluko walesretaya. Yinuwaka gwapletkana pnumnu gajene yayixachine gijekoyna ginakakta jemyegityawakluna.
Ginakakokta rapoka pokchikaka, tsru pokchikaka, sana, rutaakana giputkaka yayixachine. Ragjitluna wa kamrukashatyapluna gimkaluptostsiya. Wa pejnuruneko wa kamrukachine wanna gitskalgatka.
Rapatyegitluna Gwariseyone, pimrine koxa yonchikgapine wa Gerosale giyakatyachine.
Wanna getinna wa pimrine Wale yimaklene nikyawakna gimyoyna gimuteru, walenwa merkakotu yangakanna.
(Wa Gwariseyone, pejnuruneko Gote gajene waneyna giykolu rutsrukateynina wa gixo kata ma meromyogkanna ma merkakanotkanna gi wa nikanna.
Giputu ruyakatyana ma powratkannuwana gi nikanna. Gixo pimripirana wa yoptotanruna kamrutanruna, wa gerkikaluro wa girapkaka, gashgajkaka, yowumaswagkaka.)
Repomgaluna Gwariseyone ga wa yonchikgapine, “¿Klu chinanu wa pyimaklene gi wa wane rixna wa gitsrukaachinni giykole, seyni nikna wa gimyoyna gimuteru?”
Geso wane china, “Sanowashatachingi. Goyakalu tokanu kigle reneklewata Gisayiya gixapirana. Wane rixa yonatkaluru: Nyi yine gispuyna kagwakpiratno seyni rajiyna wajra yanna Gitaya.
Magijeru yonogleyegitnona. Runkaklewatna wa Goyakalu tokanu pixkalutu wa yokanrekakna wa yine.
Wa gixa giknoklu Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi. Waneygi wa yine giykole.”
Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Kigle giknokle gixlu wa Goyakalu yokanatanru tokanchi wa gomkagityaplu wa gixako giykole.
Wa Moysisi wane china, ‘Pkagwakpiratanru puru punro.’ Wane koxa china, ‘Girukta gogimtukaklu ruru, runro walepni wa gipnanu.’
Ga wa gixa wane china, ‘Wa satu jeji wane chininri wa ruru ga wa runro, “Ptowruko gitanu wa wale gipxakyapmakyi, korwani” ’ (Walenwa genekashlu Goyakalunupa).
Gixa gi gichichanutkalu pagixanu kamrutinripa ruru, runro chinanu.
Gixa kaspuklu wa Goyakalu tokanu wa giykole chinanu wa gixako genekanru. Gixo wale pixkalutu gkamruta.”
Wa tomgatnakna gixolune yine. Wane chinna Geso, “Gyijnakotanno pejnurunekgi. Gimata jemanu.
Gike wane wa yineru malekate wa jiglokinripa rumkata puchotletyaplu, seyni wa yineruyako gishpakyachri walenwa puchotlu wa yineru.
Girukokta kajnakopnapa wa yijnakotinripa, yijnakotanu.”
Rutspalamtinitka wa gixolune yine yegi, jiglokinitka panchi, repomgaluna yimaklene wa yapkaklupiranaya.
Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gixa koxa wane gixa mumatjemkangi? ¿Gi ge gimata jemlu wa pejnuruko maleka gwachri wa jigloklu yineru gi rumkata puchotletlu?
Gi rixanu gi wa jigloklu wa raji seyni ginanwakapje. Rushpaka gichkajetyawaka.” Wale powratlu ptowruko niikaluru.
Wane china, “Wa yineruya gishpakyachri, ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.
Wa gitoko rajiyna yine rushpakya gektutu shinikanchi, gimopatlewlu, gapoklewlu, giylalewlu,
chowguchkaka, gimkapnuglu, muglenchi, yokwikaklu, mpogijpatnuchi, sotanugnuchiygale, mupashiregnuchi, tserpiranawlu walenanuko, sepronchi.
Ptowruko wa tye muglenchi gishpaka gitokoya. Ga ga walenwa puchotlu yineru.”
Wane yiyatka Geso. Tirosreta ga wa Sitoya yatka. Jiglokamta panchi. Wale galuklu gike ma mumatyanupa, seyni gi rumkata yogimleta.
Seyni waneklutka tjemyegitlu sato suxo. Tshicho wgenejni waneyanro kamchi puchotlewatachri. Tuna. Tyoptsojityegitlu gijixistsi.
Wa suxni Kriyko, Sirogwenisanemole. Tagjitlu ruknokyaplu maleka kamchi tshichoya.
Geso wane chinro, “Petashgapkatanna jinanu rixinripna yine wgenene. Gi kigleru kashichikolupa wa nikanruna wgenchine, ruknokikolupa kewene yegi.”
Tugitlu wala. Wane chinru, “Gigi, Gitsrukaachi, seyni wa wanna keweneko nikawakakwa rapukote nikyaluna wa mturune gipopejre.”
Wale wane chinro, “Tye tokanchi chinanu pyanutka. Wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo wa pshicho.”
Talimta topji. Tetamtatkalo tshicho tukluganatatka tojeko, wa kamchi gishpakyatkalo.
Wane yiyatnaka wa Tirosretaya. Sito yapamta. Tsru wenu Kalile ya, Ntekapoli ganikajite.
Ranikyegitluna satu majnakotu, myanumatkatu. Ragjitluna rutakamyogogotyaplu.
Geso ganiklu yine mwiyawakanu Walepje. Yoshmakamyojita gijnakopnakakaya. Rutskagata. Kamrukannutlu.
Tengogne yigata. Kosennipgyapotuta. Wane chinru, “Gegwata.” (Walenwa: Putpukanu.)
Rutpukajnakopnatatka. Waneklutka rushpirokatka wa kashinatjeru wa ginnu. Yanumpotutatka.
Yokanatatkana Geso gikena runkakanna, seyni gixkatmaka wane china wanepnuteko runkaklewamtna.
Tsru giglajru rixna. Wane chinna wanna, “Kiglepotlu ptowruko kamruta. Jemkakna majnakone. Wa myanumatkane yanumkaka.”
Wa walegognekaka wanetnakna gixolune yine. Gi wa waneyanna nikanruna. Geso tomgana yimaklene. Wane chinna,
“Netwamonutna gixolune yine, gi rixanu waneyatkana mapgogne Gitayma. Maleshayna nikanruna.
Wa nyokanatinnatkana ma niikanna wa gipjina, rujxipakgapotanunna. Wa pimrinni gowuka giyakatyana.”
Rugitluna yimaklene, “¿Ginaka giyakatyachro jimapro wa satu gimkata ginanuwkakletanunna gewi yineru mwiyawakanuya?”
Geso gepomgana. Wane chinna, “¿Gi pejnu jimapro waneygi?” Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre.”
Yokanatna wa gixolune yine tuplatinripna chiji. Kashichlu wa payokgiprerutu jimapro. Poyagnutatka. Jiknajrotlu. Wa renekna yimaklene rutspamtinripna. Reneksatna gixolune yine.
Waneyna psotsotaji shima wgenkaka. Wale giglenshinikanyegitlo. Wa yokanatna rutspamtinripna. Rutspamtna gixolune yine yegi.
Nikatkana. Jinanna. Koschekluna wa gixetachri psojkaka payokgipre kojitaya.
Wanegetkona gepkoxamkoje waragka yine. Yokanatatkana.
Waneklutka ratskota wa kanawa yimakleneyma. Wane ya Talmanutasreta.
Runna Gwariseyone. Yinuwaka yoptopiiretluna. Rujgaluna Waleya getkaluru tengogne gajeru. Yantaletluna.
Wamonuwnalenshinikanuya kosennipgyapotuta. Wane china, “¿Klu chinanu rujgaluna getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine? Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa reneekona getkaluru tye gimuweekakgognenatachine.”
Kaspukatkana. Kanawa ratskotatnaka. Wakanu ya.
Ramtaka gwalemtluna nikanruna. Maleshayna. Satupje jimapro waneyna wa kanawa.
Yokanatna Geso. Wane china, “Xako. Ggirukotinwa wa gisekachriya wa Gwariseyonenu, wa gisekachri koxa Girorenenu.”
Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinkakna, “Jimapro maleshaywu.”
