Geso gimatlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakya wa maleshaygi jimapro? ¿Gi ge gishinikanuwatawa? ¿Gi ge gimata jemanatawa? ¿Waneygi shikolu gaji?
Kaygalmakgi ¿gi ge geta? Kajnakmakgi ¿gi ge gjema? ¿Gi ge gishinika? Wa njiknajrotinitkalu pamyo jimapro wa pamyo waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?”
Wanna wane chinru, “Pamole gepi kojita.”
“Wa payokgipre jimapro wa gepkoxamkoje waragkaneya ¿gi pejnu kojita katsepo wa psojkaka gkoschekyatkalu gixa?” Wanna wane china, “Payokgipre kojita.”
Wane chinna Geso, “¿Gi ge gimata jemawalu?”
Rapokna Wetsayta. Rawapluna Wale yegi satu maygaletu. Ragjitluna kamrukyaplu.
Geso kanjimtlu wa maygaletu. Raniklu pokchi kegneteya. Gitskaga sagaygaletlu. Rogwaka rutakamyoyegitlu. Repomgalu, “¿Gi ge petlu pa gixanu?”
Rumrekgata. Wane china, “Netna yine, wa yanachine wa gagmuna pixka gixachine neta.”
Rumepe gitakamyoyegletatnaklu wa giygale. Waneklu retatka. Ruglewatatka. Retashpotutatka gowuka ptowrupotuko.
Geso yokanatatkalu gipji. Wane chinru, “Gi wa pokchiko pyanu.”
Yatkana Geso wa yimakleneyma. Pokchikaka ya Susari Wiliponu yegi. Wa gatnugapoya repomgiyna wa yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Wa yine ¿katu wane chinna Gita nixinri?”
Wanna gigitlu. Wane chinruna, “ ‘Gwa Katlewakleru;’ pimrine, ‘Giliya;’ pimrine, ‘Satu Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine.’ ”
Wa Wale gepomgana, “¿Ga wa gixa katu wane chinno?” Rugita Petro. Wane chinru, “Pixni Kristoyi.”
Rujretna ma yanumsatinitipna Walepirana gikena.
Yinuwaka ginkakletna wa Yineru Wgene salewninripa gixo, ma yoptotikotupa tsruneya, tsrukakalune sasertoteneya, ga wa yonchikgapineya. Ruylatikolupa. Yotunotanu mapgogne chininri. Wane chinru tye tokanchi gipgujetkaluru.
Wa Petro ganiklu. Yinuwaka chigetjeretlu.
Geso giprotakyegitna. Retjetna yimaklene. Chigetjetlu Petro. Wane chinru, “Najxigi pyanutka, Satanasyo. Gi rixanu gi pushiniklu wa Goyakalupirana, seyni wa yinepirana galikaka pushinika.”
Tomgana Geso wa gixolune yine yimakleneyma. Wane china, “Katukokta galuka gwagajxigletno raalixinwa walenanuko. Rawanro koroshishkitate. Romkagitanno.
Girukokta galuka gishatkapletlu wa ruwekinri, ruwekinri ramginina. Girukokta gamtakanru ruwekinri Gita chinanu, Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu, rushatkapanru ruwekinri.
Gi rixanu ¿klu kigleyanaplu wa yinerupni psolchijnekmaka waneyapmaklu wane rixle, seyni ruwekinri ramgapotutinina?
Gi rixanu ¿klu rupekotanru yineru ruwekinripa?
Katukokta gipatewatanno ga wa ntokanuya koxa wa nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine yegi, kgimopataklerune ga wa kmukochirerunni, Gita wa Yineru Wgenno koxa gipatewatanru wale, wa nuninipa Nuru goyaknuya, wanna kpashirine Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene numuninipa.”
Wane chinkoxna Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, pimrine gewi gwachine gi wa getumganru gipnalu ma metkanuwalunachi Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka ginachripa giyakluyma.”
Patsrujirgogne rixinri, Geso ganikna Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Ranikna wannapje satu magka tenolu. Wanna getanu satuko kogetkogatka.
Ga wa gimkalu yochigatatka klatpotlu. Wa giwru pixka rixa. Giyagni gi satuna kgerkakleru tye chiji gwachri gimkata klataa gixkakletlu tye pixka.
Wanna yegi rupgujewniyna Giliya ga wa Moysisi, Geso giynumsatachine.
Petro, wane chinru Geso, “Yimaklewatachri, poyagnu gewi gawinri. Gewi wkamrutanru mapa gimajechri. Pixanupa satu, Moysisinupa satu, wa Giliyanupa satu.”
Gi rumata yanumatana, ga wa pikanna.
Runa kyachgapererumko. Wale chikletyegitna. Waneylu tokanchi kyachgapererumkoya, wane chinachri, “Tyenwa Noturu nalukanru. Wale gyijnakotanu.”
Pshinitsonu potu retanatinna, gikena retatkana wannayma. Gesopjetkani.
Magka yopikyatkana. Yokanatna Geso gike runkakinripna wa retanruna, ma yotunotkanuwa wa Yineru Wgene gipnachineya.
Rushinikluna wa tokanu. Rugjekakna wannakakluko, “¿Klunerni wa tye, wa gipnachinyegiya yotunotini?”
Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna, “¿Klunerni wa yonchikgapine chinanru wa Giliya gapkamka ginanu?”
Rugitna Wale. Wane china, “Giliya galikakni rungapkatanu rugletyaplu ptowruko. ¿Gi chinpiranata koxa wa yonchi wa Gita Yineru Wgenno gixo nsalewninripa, ga wa gi nkagwakpiratko?
Seyni wane nchingi Giliya ginpatka. Wane rixluna klunerukokta ralukyawakna chinyawaka yonchi walepirana.”
Runinitkana wa yimaklene yegi. Retna gixolune yine wanna yegi. Wa yonchikgapine yoptopiratna wanna.
Waneklutka pejnuruneko gixolune yine getlu. Ruglajitna. Rasukyegitluna. Ralukluna.
Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopiratyana wanna?”
Gixolune satute gigitlu. Wane china, “Yimaklewatachri, nanikyegityi noturu. Waneyanru kamchi myanumatkatu rixkakjeru.
Ginakakokta kashichyanru shipchojtakakjetanru. Soliwanamjetana. Raskereygitana. Ruprigananumtana. Wane nchinna pyimaklene ruknokyapluna maleka, seyni gi rumkatluna.”
Rugita. Wane chinna Wale, “¡Ya nyi gimuweekakgognenatachine malixkane! ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta numwanutkagi? ¿Gi pejnugognenanukta nakotangi? Ganikyegitanno.”
Ranikyegitluna. Retinitkalu waneklutka wa kamchi shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Chiji rapokamtana. Ruprurutana. Rushpaksolnamatana.
Geso gepomgalu ruru, “¿Gipshini wane gixlenatkalu?” Wale wane china, “Mturuyakawa rixini.
Gixo kata ruknoklu xirnachri, wa gonga koxa ruylatyapmaklu, seyni pumkatiniplu pupxakanunwu. Petwamonutanunwu.”
Geso wane chinru, “Pumkata galixletinipa, ptowruko gimkata gixkota wa galixachri chinanu.”
Waneklutka mturu giru saplewata. Wane china, “Nalixa. Pupxakanno nma malixlenuya.”
Geso getna gixolune yine. Rasukamtna. Potowurutna. Chigetjetlu kamchi. Wane chinru, “Kamchi myanumatkatu majnakotu, Gita yokanatyi pushpakyegitanru wale. Gi wanepnuteko pjiglokanutkalu.”
Saplewatana. Shipchojtakakpotutanru mturni. Rushpakamtatka. Walenitka gipnachri pixka rixanatka. Giyagni gixo wane china, “Rupnanatka.”
Seyni Geso kosemyotlu. Tunwakaklu. Yotunota.
Wa jiglokinitka wa panchi yimaklene gepomgalu wannapje rixini, “¿Klu chinanu wixa gi wumkata giknokletlu maleka?”
Wane chinna Geso, “Wa tye pixkalutu gi gimkata gishpakleta seyni gagjigognerupjeya.”
Wa rushpakinitkana waneya, Kalile yapamtna. Gi raluka gimatkota.
Wa runkaklewyegitna Geso yimaklene. Wane chinna, “Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookalurupno yinemyoya. Ruylatannona. Nupnanu. Nyotunotanu mapgogne rixinri.”
Seyni wanna gi gimata jemlu wa tokanu. Pika gepomgaletluna.
Rapokna Kapernawo. Panchi rawinitka, Geso gepomgana, “¿Klu gyoptopirkakananumtya gatnugapoya?”
Wa pochkena. Wannakakluko yoptopirkakananumtna wa gatnugapoya katni wa tsru potu.
Tuplata Geso. Tomgana pamole gepi. Wane chinna Wale, “Girukokta galuka muchinanu gixleta, walepni wa gapkatpotutachri pejnuruneyapa. Pejnuruneko gipxakjetachrinapni.”
Koscheklu mturu. Wanna ganikajite rutaklu. Kampuklu. Wane chinna Wale,
“Girukta yoptotlu satu tye pixkalutu mturu Gita giwakaya, Gita yoptota. Girukta yoptotno, gi Gita yoptota seyni wa nyokanatjeru galikaka.”
Wane chinru Gwa, “Yimaklewatachri, wetlu satu wa pgiwakaya ruknokyana maleka kamchine. Wale gi gomkagitwu. Wujretlu gi rixanu gi romkagitwu.”
Geso wane china, “Gi wa gijretanru. Wa gikena wane gixa giyakleta ngiwakaya wa rumkata pshinitsonu gektuchinretno.
Wa wma kamnixjetni wixasretni wale.
Girukokta genekangi sato girapistonoya gonu ngiwakaya gi rixanu Kristonungi, galikaka wane nchingi gi ramgini wenutikolupa.
“Girukokta gitspeekaklu wa satu wa nyi mturune wa nalixjene Gita, kiglemkalu waleya rushriknojitikolupa wa tsru sotlu ginripiya, tsru wenu ruknokikolupa.
Wa pumyo gitspeekakinipyi pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri mastsi, wanepnute gepimyoyi pixinipa wane pyanuna Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa.
Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
Wa pujixi gitspeekakinipyi, pustakanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa wa puwekinri yokmatachriyi, wanepnute gepijixyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena wa xirnachri muwnakatupa.
Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
Wa puygale gitspeekakinipyi, puknokanru. Kigleyyi wa pjiglokinripa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka paygalepjeya wanepnute gepiygaleyi pixinipa puknookona Gigena.
Wanna tsomne ma mupniyawaka. Wa xirnachri gike rixini ruwnanu.
“Wa pejnuruneko tuwutkalurupa xirnachriya.
Kiglerni wa tuwu, seyni wa tuwu mushi rixinitka ¿klu gmorotanu? Waneyapgi gixnanuko tuwu. Kigle gimwakaklepgi.”
Wane yiyatka. Gotesreta ya, Gorta wakanute. Rapatyegitatnakluna gixolune yine. Rumepe ginkaklewyegitatnakna wa rixjetyawaka.
Rapyegitluna Gwariseyone. Repomgaluna wa muklukanutlege giknokagnunrolu wa gnurchi. Rumlukanatluna.
Wale gigitna. Wane china, “¿Klu yokanyegitgi Moysisi?”
Wane chinruna, “Moysisi gichichlu kiruka yonatyapa ma ganunrotyanpatkalo. Ruknokanrotka.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Nshiknu gaji chinanu yonyegitgi wa tye Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru.
Seyni yinuwakyawaka giyaklewlu, jeji, suxo kamrutna Goyakalu.
Giyagni jeji giknokanna ruru, runro. Rupxaletanrotkani ganunro.
Wa gepinanna pamanepje rixanutkana. Giyagni gi gepimanetkana, seyni pamanepjetkana.
Giyagni wa Goyakalu gapatanru ma mutspalkakinitipa wa yineru.”
Wa panchiya repomgatnakluna yimaklene walekotnaka.
Wane chinna Geso, “Girukokta giknoklo wa ganunro, sato ganunrotinitnaka rumopatlewata wala chinanu.
Wa suxo giknokinri tganuru wa satu tganurutini, tumopatlewata.”
Ranikyegitluna mturune wa kamrukyapna. Wa yimaklene chigetjetna wa ranikjerna.
Retinri Geso jigekanuwata. Wane chinna Wale, “Getashatanna mturune runyegitannona. Gi gimaletanna. Gi rixanu wanna pixkalune wannanni wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
Galikakni wane nchingi, girukokta gi yoptotanru Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka mturu pixka gi wa jiglokanruna.”
Kampukna. Wanna gogo rutakamyota. Ruglenshinikanyegitna.
Gatnugapo yapananumtini, runyegitlu satu gasukamtachri. Yoptsojityegitlu. Repomgalu, “Yimaklewatachri kigleru ¿Klu nkamrutanu nyoptotyaplu wa nuwekinri gike rixiniko mnikawnakatupa?”
Geso wane chinru, “¿Klu chinanu wane pchinno kigleru? Gi satuna waneru kigleru. Satupjeru, Goyakalupje.
Wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru pumata: Gi pumopatlewatanu. Gi puylalewatanu. Gi pchowguwatanu. Gi wa maleshawaka pupgujtalewashatanu. Gi pyokwirewatanu. Pkagwakpiratanru puru ga wa punro.”
Rugitlu. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, pejnuruko tyekaka nkamrutatka nmaklutinyakawa.”
Geso yopukgatlu. Raluklu. Wane chinru, “Satupje pmagatya. Pyanu. Pushankanru ptowruko wane pixle. Penekanna wa kwamonurune. Waneyapyi ponikolewlu tengogneyapa. Punanu. Pomkagitanno. Panikanru pkoroshishkitate.”
Seyni wale yanshinikanpotutana tye tokanchiya. Ralimta wamonuwatachri gi rixanu waneyanru ponikowle gixo wane rixle.
Geso geknokyegitna. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Kyaprepotlu jiglokinripna Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wa ponikolune.”
Wa yimaklene giglajita wa tokanuya, seyni Geso gigitatnaka. Wane chinna Wale, “Wiwine, ¡gi payaprenanutkalu wa jiglokyapluna wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka wanna serojiproji gaponshinikanutachine!
Myapretmakni kameyo tsapujripna tjiglokinripa wa ponikolu pnute jiglokyaplu Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.”
Wanna giglajpotuta. Wane chinkakna wannakakluko, “¿Katu gimkata gognetkaakotanu?”
Geso yopukgatna. Wane china, “Wa yineru mumkatanutu, wale rumkata Goyakalu. Wa ptowruko rumkata Goyakalu.”
Petro yinuwaka wane chinretlu, “Petanu. Wixa giknokamtlu ptowruko. Womkagitatkayi.”
Giyagni Geso wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, girukokta giknokapjimta, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, wa ruru, runro, wugenene, wa rusanatkaka giknokachri Gita chinanu, wa Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi chinanu,
wale geneeko satu pacha kata pnute xani tyegognekaka, panchikaka, yegwakane, repurune, repurone, runrone, wugenene, rusanatkaka, kojwawakchi koxa. Pagognesha ginachripa reneeko ruwekinri mnikawnakatupa.
Seyni gixo muchichachine gapkatpotutanu. Gapkatpotutachine wannapni wa muchichachinpatka.”
Wanena gatnugapo. Gerosale kanikna. Kosekamtna Geso. Ruglajitna. Romkagitluna pikachineko. Ranikatnakna wa pamole gepine. Yinuwaka Wale wane chinretna wane rixikolpatka:
“Xani Gerosale wkanika. Wa Gita Yineru Wgenno samyookotka wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikapine yegi. Ruklukanuwnayegjixannona nupninripa. Samyokannona payinyegiko.
Rapnokatannona. Kochipjetannona. Rutskagjetannona. Ruylatannona. Wa mapgogne giknoginpatka nyotunotanu.”
Wa Santiyako Gwa, Sewereyo wgenene, rapyegitluna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, waluklu klunerukokta wagjityayi wane pixanwu.”
Wane chinna Geso, “¿Kluneru galuka wa nixyapgi?”
Wanna wane chinru, “Penekanwu Pixa wuxiplatanyi poyaknu yegi, satu potuklesretate, satu pkegnetesretate.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Gi gimata wa gixa gagjitanru. ¿Gimkatge giiretyalo wa girapistono wa Gita girinro? ¿Gimkatge gkatletikolu wa katlu wa Gita katikolu?”
Wanna wane chinru, “Wumkatlu.” Wane chinna Geso, “Wa girapistono nurapre girini. Wa katlu wa Gita katikolu wale koxa gkatikolupa.
Seyni tuplalu npotuklesretate, wa nkegnetesretate gi wa Gitanni nenekyaplu, ga wa wannanupni galpokyegitkalunepni.”
Wa jeminitkaluna, wa pamole yinuwaka gimtuwnaleta Santiyakoya ga wa Gwaya
Geso tomgana. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimata wa tsrukakalune kagwakikalune payinetskalaya towutlewpotutna. Wanna gitsrukatene tsru gitaaka wanna chinanu.
Seyni gi wane gixkakanu, seyni girukokta galuka tsru gixletnachriwa gixayegkakluko walepni wa gipxakjerupa.
Girukokta gixayegkakluko galuka muchinanu gixletnawa, walepni pejnurune wayegreru.
Gi rixanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno gi nuna nupxakikolupa, seyni nuna nupxaklewatinripa, nenekyaplu nuwekinri nwenutyaplu rushpakinripna gixolune yine.”
Geriko yana. Geriko yiyatka Wale, ga wa yimaklene, ga wa gixolune yine. Wartimeyo wa maygaletu, Timeyo wgene, tuplanata wa gatnugapostsi, ragjigognenatlo sroschi.
Jemyegitlu Walenwa Geso Nasare gajeru. Yinuwaka saplewleta. Wane china, “Geso, Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
Gixolune yine chigetjetlu pochke rixinripa, seyni wanepnuteyaka saplewjeta, “Tawiklopisha, petwamonutanno.”
Geso tunwata. Wane china, “Ntomganru.” Tomgaluna wa maygaletu. Wane chinruna, “Kiglenshinikanupyi. Palnanu. Tomgayi.”
Ruknoksapowlechratamta. Rupteka palnaleta. Yayegitatkalu Geso.
Geso gepomgalu. Wane chinru, “¿Klu palukatka wa nixyapyi?” Maygaletu wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, netinripa.”
Geso wane chinru, “Pyanu. Palixle gitskalakyi.” Waneklutka retatka. Romkagitatkalu Geso wa gatnugapoya.
Goliwa Magkatetkana. Gi gowukatkana Gerosalestsi, ga wa Wetpage ga wa Wetani. Wane yokanatyana gepi yimaklene.
Wane chinna Wale, “Gyanu tujra pokchi gixa ginaple gajeru. Pokchipotuko gapokinpatka wane gikshikinri mporo wgene tsatkaluru, gi satuna yineru mtuplatjitanutuwa. Gkoshrikanru. Ganikanru.
Girukokta wane chininipgi, ‘¿Klu chinanugkoshpiroklu?’ wane nchinanu, ‘Gitsrukaachi galuklu. Waneklutka yokanatanutnaklu gewi.’ ”
Wane yana. Rukshikluna mporo wgene tsatkaluru gipgyapto maleka rutspalgapotyawaka. Koshpirokluna.
Pimrine wane gwanatachine wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gkoshpirjetlu mporo wgene?”
Wanna wane china Geso chinyawakna. Retashatkatkana.
Ranikatkaluna mporo wgene Geso yegi. Gimkalna sapwakatjitluna. Wale gogo tuplamtatka Geso.
Gi gepikna gikwekamkatachine gatnugapo. Pimrine gagmunasurkaka gistakamta. Rukwekamtluna gatnugapo.
Kosekamtachine ga wa kaptomtachine saplewjenanumtna. Wane china sapletna: ¡Wuya! ¡Gimalwutkaluru ginachri Gitsrukaachi giwakaya!
¡Gimalwutkaluru wutsrukatni Tawi pogirewtapyawakni! Waneplu pogirewatyawaka. ¡Wuya tengognepotuya!
Geso gapokamtatkalu Gerosale. Kpashiwakapji ya. Retjetinitkalu ptowrunanuka, kayi rixinitka rushpaka. Wa Wetani ya wa pamole gepiymananuko.
Waleprika Wetani yamtyatkana. Nachlu.
Retlu gowukaya gikera kasureru. Yayegimtlu, wane getko rukshikinri pagixanu. Rapyegitinri gike rukshika. Gisurepjeni. Gi gipapkoni wa sagiwatinri wa gikera.
Geso wane chinanru gikerni, “Gikena niksagitanutkayi gike pixiniko.” Jemluna yimaklene.
Wane yana Gerosale. Jiglokamta kpashiwakapji. Yinuwaka maleka giknokletna kgishanrewaklerunni ga wa gagjijetachinni wa kpashiwakapjiya. Yawnajkaklo kwalkaka gipekoserojiprojitachineni, motkoko gishanretachinni tuplapijere koxa.
Gi ruchichna Wale wa satuna ganikyalo kastonolo wa kpashiwakapji.
Runkaklewyegitna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Gi ge yonatkaluru: Wa nopji gagjigognewakapji chinkalurupni ptowruko payinerumnunanuko yegi? Ga wa gixa wane gixatkalu gitawakapna kachowgurune gwiyawaka pixka.”
Yijnakotluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene wa yonchikgapine. Rujgaluna gi rixpoko giylaletanruna gi rixanu pikluna. Wa ptowruko yine giglajita runkaklewleya.
Wa kayi rixinitka tsru pokchiya yiyatka Geso.
Ruknoginna goyechnokawa, retluna gikera rupriganatka gitskiymananuko.
Petro gishinkapatka. Wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, petanru gikera pkamakpiratanruna rupriganatka.”
Geso, wane chinna, “Galixanru Goyakalu.
Galikaka wane nchingi, katukokta wane chinru tye magka, ‘Puxrikanu. Wa tsru wenu puknokinwa.’ Gi wa shikpokwakgajitachriko, seyni ralixa wane rixanu chinyawaka, wanepotuko rixanu wale chinanupa.
Giyagni wane nchingi, ptowruko girukokta gagjitanu gagjigognetini, galixinri gyoptotanru, waneyapgi gixinripa.
Wa ntunwa gagjigogneretini, gkaspukinri wa waneygi gixinipa pnu gixjeru, wa gixa Giru tengogne gajeru koxa kaspukmukochiretyapgi wa gmukochirkaka.
Ga wa gixa gma kaspukinri, wa Giru koxa tengogne gajeru gi wa kaspukmukochiretanungi.”
Satokna Gerosale. Yotaljeta kpashiwakapjiya. Runyegitluna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa yonchikgapine, wa tsrune.
Wane chinruna, “¿Klu putakika pixa tyekaka pkamrutinri? ¿Katu gitakyi tyekaka pkamrutinri?”
Wane chinna Geso, “Nepomgangi gixa satu tokanchi. Gigitanno. Wanepnute nunkakyapatkagi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.
Wa Gwa katlewle, ¿tengogne giyakatyachrirge? ¿waka yinenukla? Gigitanno.”
Yoptopirkakna wannakakluko. Wane chinna, “Wane wchininipmaka tengogne giyakatyachrini, Wale wane chinanunwu, ‘¿Klu chinanu koxa gi galixlu?’
Ga wa wane wchiniplu, ‘Yinenni’ ”—wanna pikna gixolune yine, gi rixanu pejnuruneko kagwaklu wa Gwa walenwa Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachri.
Rugitluna Geso. Wane chinruna, “Gi wumata.” Wane chinna Geso, “Gita koxa gi ginkakangi klu nutakika tyekaka nkamrutinri.”
Yinuwaka Geso yanumsayegletna yapkakluya: “Satu jeji gitaklu sana gowasha. Pirijeretjetlo. Tapgatyawakapa jitota. Tenopjiru kamruta. Renekamtna sana girukotachine. Pnu yatka. Wajra ya.
Talixinipapko yokanatlu wayegrechri sana girukotachine yegi rawapyaplo wa sana girukotachinyegiya wa gwachrotka gowashaya.
Kashichluna. Kochipjetluna. Yokanatanruna maleshalni.
Rumepe yokanreyegitna satu wayegrechri. Ruylajiwutanruna. Rektutetluna.
Rumepe yokanretatnaklu satu. Waleni ruylatna. Pimrinnikoxni gixni. Kochipjetkanna pimrinni. Ruylatkanna pimrinni.
“Waneyawalu satu gituru ralukanru potu. Yokanyegitna waleni koxa gapkatpotutachritka. Wane china, ‘Kagwakpiratanruna noturu.’
“Wa sana girukotachine wane chinna wannakakluko, ‘Tyenwa yoptotachripatka. Ginanu. Wuylaganru. Yoptotanrupmaka wixanpatkani.’
Kashichluna. Ruylatluna. Ruknokluna maleka gowashaya.
“¿Gi rixpokotanu wa kgowashateru? Runanu. Ruylatanunna wa sana girukotachinepni. Renekanna gowasha pimrine.
¿Gi ge tye yonchiga getyongata? Wa sotlu myoptotkotu kamrupjitachineya, Wale gitaaka yoptowaka gitsejita.
Gitsrukaachi chinanu kamrutka wa tye. Rakaglajiygaletwu.”
Raluka kashretluna. Wanna tsrukakalune pikna gixolune yine. Rumata jemluna wa wannapirana wa yapkaklu. Kaspukluna. Yatkana.
Yokanyegitluna pimrine Gwariseyone ga wa Giroreyone wa kashtokanutyapluna.
Runna wanna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, wumatyi Pixni mayrokletyi. Gike pkagwakpirata. Gi petlu wa yinermanewle giglenu, seyni galikaka potu punkakwu Goyakalu gatnugapotepirana ¿Wa munanshichkotnige renekikolupa wenrukaka wa Susa waka gike? ¿Wenekerge waka gi wa wenekanru?”
Wa Wale gimatlu rixashleyna. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Klu chinanu gimlukanutno? Ganikinno sroschiproji netyaplo.”
Wanna ganikyegitlu. Wane chinna Wale, “¿Katu yaglunwa tye, ga wa katunni toyonga?” Wanna wane chinru, “Susanni.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Genekanru Susa wa Susanuko, ga wa Goyakalu genekanru wa Goyakalunu.” Ruglajitna Waleya.
Runyegitluna Sariseyone. Wanna wane china maleshaplu gipnachine yotunre. Repomgaluna. Wane chinruna,
“Yimaklewatachri, Moysisi yonyegitwu wa satu yegwakluko gipnini, ruknokagnunrotana, gi ruknokawgenetana wa repuru gwanro wale gnunronanni, ruxolewkakinripa giklopishapa yegwakluni chinanu.
Wanenannina payokgiprerune moletkakachine. Muchinanu tsru gnunrowata. Rupnana. Gi ruknokawgenetana.
Gapkatatachri gwatnaklo. Rupnana koxa waleni. Gi waleniko giknokawgenetana. Mapa rixinrini waneko pixka rixana.
Payokgipre gwalo. Gi wannaniko giknokawgenetana. Suxni gapkata potu gipnaletanatka.
Yotunruklupa yotunotinipna, ¿katu gnunropni wa wannaya? Gi rixanu payokgipreni gnunronitka wa wala.”
Rugitna Geso. Wane china, “¿Gi ge mpupjeta gi rixanu gi gimatlu wa Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, gi wa Goyakalu giyaklewleko?
Wa yotunotinipna wa gipnachineya gi ganunrowatanutkana, gi kashimyokaakotkana, seyni wa Goyakalutowrerune tengogne gajene wannako pixka rixanutkana.
Wa yotunotachinepa gipnachinepirana, ¿gi ge getyongatlo wa Moysisi kirukate, wa Goyakalu giynumatyawaklu kawshipiriya? Wane china: Gitni wa Gawra Goyakalute, Gisaaka koxa Goyakalute, ga wa Gakowo koxa Goyakalutno.
Gi wa gipnachine Goyakalutni, seyni giwekachine Goyakalute. Giyagni gixni gamtakanshinikanpotutana.”
Rapoka satu yonchikgapri koxa. Yijnakotna rugjekakyawakna. Rumata kigle gigle Geso gixna. Repomgalu, “¿Girni wa tsru potu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi pejnuruko pnute?”
Geso gigitlu, “Wa muchinanu walenwa: Pjemanu, Gisrayili. Wa Gitsrukaachi Woyakalute, wa Gitsrukaachi satupjeru.
Pushinikanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute psolpotuyako pajiya, psolpotuyako punshinikanuya, psolpotuyako pmuchkonuya. Ga ga walenwa muchinanu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi.
Gepi chininri tye pixka rixa: Pushinikanru pumole pixnanuko pixka. Maleshlu satu Yokanatkaluru Tokanchi tyekaka pnute tsru.”
Wa yonchikgapri wane chinru, “Kigleru, Yimaklewatachri. Galikaka wane pchina, Satupjeru Goyakalu. Maleshlu satu. Walepjeni.
Wushinikanru psolpotuyako wajiya, psolpotuyako wunshinikanuya, psolpotuyako wmuchkonuya. Wushinikanru wumole wixnanuko pixka, tyekaka ptowruko genekashlu yoxiikalurupa wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa pnute tsru.”
Geso getinri wa yonchikgapri gigitlu rumatleya, wane chinru, “Gi wa gowukyi pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu.” Gi satuna tserpiranawanshinikanyegitlu repomgiyatkalu.
Kpashiwakapji runkaklewatya. Geso wane china, “¿Gi chinna wa yonchikgapine wa Tawiklopisha rixinri wa Kristo?
Wa waleko Tawi wane china wa Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya: Gitsrukaachi wane chinru Nutsrukate, Ptuplatanu npotuklesretate, Wa nutakinpotukna pkamnixjene pujixipta rapukote.
Waleko Tawi wane chinru Gitsrukaachi. ¿Gi rixpokotyawaka giklopishayapni?” Gixolune yine rumuwleyna yijnakotluna.
Wane china Geso wa runkaklewleya, “Ggirukotinwa wanna yonchikgapineya, galuka yanretachine gowuukalkaka gimkaluyna. Ralukluna ralukikolupna giputuya.
Ralukluna wa tsrukakalune tuplapijere ginkaklewawakapjikakaya, muchinanu tuplapijkaka koxa nikjetikowakaya.
Konapjijetkanna gipnagnurutachronni. Rixashleyna gogagjirgognerkakna. Tsru potu ruklukanuwnayegjixikolupna.”
Tuplanata Geso tugnantakikowaka genekashlukaka ginaple. Retjetna yine gi rixpoko gitakletyaplona sroschi gignantakikowaka. Gixna ponikolune gitaklo gixo.
Tuna sato suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro. Tutaklo gepi mturomchataaji. Walanwa satopje sintawo.
Tomgana Geso wa yimaklene. Wane china, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa twu suxo gipnagnurutachro kwamonuro wala gitaklo pejnurune pnute gitakachine gignantakikowaka.
Pejnuruneko gitaklo ruxetanrona. Wa twu suxo twamonnupoga tutaklo pejnuroko walanu, pejnuruko tuwekinripa.”
Wa rushpakamtini kpashiwakapjiya, satu yimakleru wane chinru, “Yimaklewatachri, ¡petanru gi pixka sotlerutkakananni, ga wa gi pixkapjirutunanni!”
Geso wane chinru, “¿Petlu tyekaka tsru panchikaka? Gi wa rutukanu sotlu rogotkakinripa, gi wa mujrolekatunpakni.”
Tuplatini wa Goliwa Magkateya kpashiwakapji ginaple, repomgaluna wanna mkoje rixinna, Petro, Santiyako, Gwa, Gantirishi,
“Punkakanwu. ¿Giklupni wa tyekakapa? ¿Klu getkaluru wanepa wa tye pejnuruko wa poyagkakinpatka?”
Yinuwaka Geso wane chinretna, “Xako gi satunako yokwitangi.
Gi rixanu runanna gixo ngiwakaya, wane chinachinepa, ‘Gitni wa Kristono.’ Yokwitanunna gixopni.
“Seyni wa gixa jeminiplu wa giylalupirana ga wa pogiwlesha giylalupirana, gi gkegeknanuwatanu. Rumkata wane gixleta, seyni gi wa yoptukyawakapnichi.
Gi rixanu ruylakakanna pachijne gajene ga wa pachijne gajeneyma, ga wa pogirewatyawaka giylakakanu pogirewatyawakayma. Waneplu giyolikchijrukaka pachijnemnunanukaya. Waneplu nachlukaka. Tyekakapni muchichachripa wa kachinolkakapa.
“Gixako getinwa gixnanuko. Wa samyokangina jemanshinikankakyawakapna. Ginkaklewawakapjikakaya gkochipjetiko. Gitsrukaachine, pogirchine getanu gixapni tunwatanuna Gita chinanupa gipgujtalewlu waneyapna.
Muchinanu ptowruneko payinerumnunanuka runkakikolupna Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchiya.
Wa ganiikoklunpatka gixa wa nsamyookoklunupa gma mapookanupachi gi gkojwakinwa wa gixa chinyawakapa. Gi waleko gyanshinikanutanu, seyni wa genekikolupa gixa walepapkopa, wane nchinyawakapa. Gi wa gixni yanumsatachinepgi seyni Giwekikaluru Kpashiripni.
“Gimole samyokanru rupninripa gimoleko ga wa ruru samyokanru gituru rupninripa. Wa wugenenna gimtuwnayegitanuna rurunepnina. Ruylajixanunna rurunepni.
Gayegixkalunepgi pejnuruneyako Gita giwaka chinanu, seyni wa kashnantakanshinikanutachripa yoptukyawakpotunanukopa walepni wa gognetkaako.
“Wa getyongatachripa gimata jemanru: Wa getiniplu gagnanutkaluru gimtukpotlewatachri wane rawinri mawiyawakanupmaka, waneklu Gote gwachine gasukanu. Magkakaka yanna.
Panchi gogo gwanatachri wa rujrukanmaka, gi jiglokapjitanu ranikyaplu gipji gajeru.
Wa sana gwanatachri gi wa satkapanu rawapyaplu gimkalu.
¡Gi waneni wa kamshironepni ga wa gashichakachinepni walegognekakpatka!
Gagjigognetanu gi waneyapgi ginapuklu gasuktatinripa.
Wa walegognekakapa waneplu salewakchi wa mwajejetkatu wa muchi giyakletinitkalu wa Goyakalu giyakle, ga wa xanigognenanu. Gi wane rixanu.
Wa Gitsrukaachi ma sustakanmaklu walegognekaka gi pamanenapnikmaka gognetkaakona seyni tsomitkalune chinanu wa Wale tsomitanune sustaklu walegognekaka.
Giyagni satu wane chininipgi, ‘¡Gewru Kristo!’ ga wa wane chiningi, ‘¡Getanru. Waneru!’ gi wa galixanu.
Rupgujewnanna wale migje Kristone, wa wanna migje Goyakalu tokanu geneklewatachine. Kamrutanruna getkalurkakapa ga wa koglajrukakapa, yokwitikolupmakna tsomitkalune wa rumkatmaka wane gixleta.
Xako gixa. Nunkakatkagi psoluko ma mapookanuwa.
“Seyni walegognekakpatka ruknoginpatka wale salewakchi, wa tkachi gichpokanu. Wa ksuru gi wa pokamlatanu.
Wa katagirkaka gijirotanu tengogneyapa. Wa gichkolkaka tengogne gajeru kowshiwshitko.
Wanepnute retannona Gita wa Yineru Wgenno kyachgapererumkoya ginachripno. Tsru nuyakle ga wa noyaknu numunanu.
Waneklu nyokanatanna notowrene tengogne gajene rapatjetikolupna ntsomitanune. Wa gepkoxamkojesretkakayako yoptukyawakpotuko chiji, yoptukyawakpotuko tengogne rapatjerewatinna.
“Gimatanru yapkaklu gikerapiranaya. Wa tyosnuygalejiplutinitka, tupcheksuretinpatka, gimatanutkalu wa walapustsitkani.
Waneko pixka gixa getinpatkalu wane gixlutkani tyekaka, gimatanutkalu gi gowukpatkalu. Gipgyaptostsitkalu.
Galikaka wane nchingi, gi ruknoganu tye gimuweekakgognenatachinesha wa ptowruko tyekaka ma mixkanuwa.
Wa tengogne ga wa chiji giknoganu, seyni wa ntokanu gi giknoganu.
“Seyni walegogne, wale gipapko gike gimata, gi wa Goyakalu towreruneko tengogne gajene, gi wa Gituruko, ga wa Girchipje galikaka gimata.
Giyagni giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu. Gi gimatlu giklupaktani gipapkopa.
Waneko pixka rixa wa jeji wajra yachri. Ruknokamtlu gipji. Rutakamtna wayegrene. Satkaka renekamta kamrure. Gipgyapto gwachri towutamta ruyokinripa.
“Giyagni gixa giyokanu. Gi rixanu gi gimata giklu runanu wa kwangixlerupji, patako kayi, patako ganikajyechno, patako gaxawripa yanumatini, patako goyechnokawpotuko.
Wa rawraka ginretinipa ma mukshiikyanupgi gimkanatachingi.
Wa gixa nchinyagi wane koxa nchinna pejnuruneko: Giyokanu.”
Gepigogne magatiniwa Tsru Giknoglushgogne wa Tsrugogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu, rujgaluna tsrukakalune sasertotene, ga wa yonchikgapine gi rixpoko kashichyapluna gayroklewluya ruylatyapluna.
Wane chinna wanna, “Gi wa tsrugogne wkashichanru, ma mejnugimalewatinitipna yine.”
Wetani rawanata Geso Simopji gijirgitutpachri. Tuplanata nikjetikowakaya. Tuna sato suxo. Waneylo pastono pgamlugalo nartogapje kwenuru potu. Tupokastonotlo. Tuyokjiwutlu.
Wanena pimrine gimtuwnachine wannananuko. Wane chinna wanna, “¿Klu chinanu wane tixa saletletatkalo pgamlugalo?
Wa tumkata gishankakotmaka wa twu pgamlugalo, wa mapa pachaproji pnute. Walamka kwamonurunni geneeko.”
Geso wane china, “Getashatanro. ¿Klu chinanu nsalewnakaklo? Kigleru kamrurchi tkamrutyano.
Gi rixanu waneygognenangi wa kwamonurune gixayma. Wa galukiniplu gimkata kigleru kamruyegletna, seyni gi waneygognenanupgi Gita.
Wa wala kamrutlu tumkatyawaka. Tuyokagnaputlo pgamlugalo nomane wa nkapnatikolupa.
Galikaka wane nchingi, ginakakokta runkakletiko Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi wa psolchijneko wa tye koxa tkamrutanru wala wane chinkalurupa wa tushinikikolupa wala.”
Gota Giskaryote satu pamole gepi rixinri yayegitna tsrukakalune sasertotene samyokyaplu Geso wanna yegi.
Wanna jeminitkalu, rumuwatna. Rupiratyaluna renekyapluna sroschiproji. Rujgaluna ruglepoktapinri gi rixpoko samyokletyapluna.
Muchinangogne jimapro gisekachri myapjetkotu wa renekashatinrina giylatkalurupa wa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanu, yimaklene wane chinru, “¿Ginaka paluka yokanretwu wa walpokotyaplu wa pnikanrupa Tsru Giknoglushgogne chinanupa?”
Yokanatna gepi yimaklene. Wane chinna Wale, “Tsru pokchi gyanu. Wane yoptotingi satu jeji wa gashgaji gonu gwanru ganikachri. Gomkagitanru.
Ginakakta jigloka wane nchinanru wa kapjiru, ‘Yimaklewatachri wane china, “¿Ginaklu wa napokagrukowakle wa nnikyawakapa Tsru Giknoglushgogne nyimakleneyma?” china.’
Wale gekakgitangi satu teno gajeru tsrugruko gali galpokletkalurutka. Wane galpokotinri wixanupa.”
Wane yatkana yimaklene. Tsru pokchi yatkana. Rukshikluna Wale chinyawakpotukna. Ralpokotluna Tsru Giknoglushgognenupa.
Wa kayi chininitka wane ya wa pamole gepiyma.
Wa tuplatinitkana nikawakakwa, nikna. Wane china Geso, “Galikaka wane nchingi, wa satu gixate numnikjeru, wale samyokanno.”
Wa wanna yinuwaka wamonuwleta. Wane chinna wanna satkaka, “¿Gitgetkopni?” Satu koxa, “¿Gitgetkopni?”
Wane chinna Geso, “Wa satu pamole gepi rixinri, wa gigakachri Gitayma kolpetoya.
Galikaka Gita wa Yineru Wgenno wane nyanu chinyawaka wa yonchi Gitapiranaya. ¡Gi waneni wa tye jeji, wale chinanu Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyooko! Kiglemkalu tye jeji chinanu ma mushpaakanmaka.”
Wa nikanatinna wanna, Wale kashichlu jimapro. Ruglenshinikanyegitlu. Jiknaglu. Wane gixachri renekna. Wane china, “Gyoptotanru. Tyenwa nomane.”
Wale kashichlo girapistono. Poyagnutatkalo. Renekna. Rurna walaya pejnuruneko.
Wane chinna Wale, “Tyenwa nograga wa gerotu tokanchi gipiratkaluru chinanu, gixoluru yineru chinanu giyookaluru.
Galikaka wane nchingi, gi wa nuranutkalo gowajiga wa walegognepotuko wa nuranro geroto wa Goyakalu pogirewatyawakaya.”
Wa wanna shikaletlu gimalwuru. Rali shikaletinitkaluna, Goliwa Magkate yana.
Wane chinna Geso, “Pejnurunepnikgi gixapni gitspeekaakona. Yonatkalurutkani: Nuylakanru wa girukotapratachri. Rupalatanna wa gowegane.
Nyotunotanu. Nali yotunkakletkoklunpatka, Gita gapka kosekanu gixaya. Kalile nyanu.”
Petro wane chinru, “Wa pejnurunekmaka gitspeekaako, ga wa gita gike.”
Geso wane chinru, “Galikaka wane nchinyi, wa pixa xani tye yechno ma yanumatkanu gnapu wa gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.”
Seyni wale psolmuchkonuko tokanuwna. Wane china, “Wa nupnanmaka koxa Pixayma, gi wa nnutatanyi.” Pejnuruneko waneko pixka china.
Wane yana Getsemani giwakatletyawaka. Wane chinna Wale wa yimaklene, “Ntuplatanu gewi. Nagjigognetkakopshini.”
Ranikna Waleyma Petro, Santiyako, Gwa. Yinuwaka giglajreta, wamonuwnaleta.
Wane chinna Wale, “Nonshinikanu nwamonuwnapotutya gipukchi pixkapotuko. Gkagwakanu gewi. Giyokanu.”
Psotsotaaji wajrayaka ya. Wane yoptsojita chijiya. Ragjigogneta wa rumkata wane gixletikolupmaka, ruknoganu Waleya wale salewakchi.
Wane china, “Gagwa, Nuru, ptowru gimkatachriyi Pixa. Pkoshripatinno twu girapistono, seyni gi wa Gita galukyawakapni, seyni Pixa galukyawakapni.”
Runa. Retamtna gimkanatachine. Wane chinru Petro, “¿Simo, pumkanatge? ¿Gi ge pumkata giyokleta pshinitsonu?
Giyokanu. Gagjigognetanu gma jiglokinitipa yantaletikowakapa. Wa ginshinikanu galikakni jmererni, seyni manchi muchkotni.”
Rumepe yaletinitnaka ragjigognetyawaka, waneko pixka chintokanutatnaka.
Satokatnaka. Retamtatnakna gimkanatachine. Ruxapnewatna. Gi rumata gigretluna.
Runa mapa kata rixinritka. Wane chinna Wale, “Gimkanutka. Gapnanutanu. Wanekotka. Nopapko gapokatka. Xani Gita wa Yineru Wgenno samyookatka kmukochirerunemyoya.
Gyotunotanutka. Gayanutka. Gi gowukatkalu nsamyokjerupa.”
Waneklutka yanumsanatiniwa Geso, runatka Gota. Walenwa pamole gepi rixinri. Waleymana gixolune yine kyoglolewaprerune, kgagajererune. Wannanwa tsrukakalune sasertotene gayinerutene, yonchikgapineyegirune koxa, tsrunyegirune koxa. Gotaymamnutkana.
Wa samyokjeru genekagnaputatkana saturutu gimaxiklechi. Wane chinna wale, “Girukta namlutanu gita, Walepakni. Gkashichanru. Ganikanru. Ggirukotpotumtanru.”
Runinitka, waneklutka runyegitlu. Wane chinru, “¡Yimaklewatachri! ¡Yimaklewatachri!” Ramlutlu.
Romyokyegimtluna. Kashichluna.
Wa satu wane gwanatachri koshpakyoglolewapreta. Rustaklu wa sasertote gitsrukate potu wayegreru. Yostakjepitlu.
Geso wane china, “¿Gishpakamta gixa yoglolewapiyma gagajeyma, kachowguru pixka gixa kashretnoge?
Pagognemnunanuka gixayma nwanata, nunkaklewanata wa kpashiwakapjiya. Gi wa wane gkashichyano, seyni wa poyagkakikolupa wa yonatkalurkaka, wane gixyatkano.”
Ruknokamtluna pejnuruneko. Rasukatkana.
Satu jeji gomkagitlu sapwakmanetachri gichrataya. Jejine kashichlu.
Wa wale ruknokachratamtlu. Rasukyana mamkatni.
Ranikluna Geso sasertotene gitsrukate potu yegi. Rapatna Walyegiya pejnuruneko tsrukakalune sasertotene, tsrune, yonchikgapine.
Wa Petro gomkagitlu gogajxigiyako. Sasertote gitsrukatpotupjipotunanuko romkagitlu. Tuplanata towrechineyma. Rolkanata chichpawa.
Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, pejnuruneko jemanshinikankakjetikowakaya rujgaluna gipgujtalewlumka Gesoya rupninripa, seyni gi rukshikluna.
Gi rixanu gixo gipgujtatlu maleshawaka, seyni wa rupgujtalewlena gi wa pixkakakluni.
Pimrine gapoka. Rupgujtatluna maleshawaka. Wane chinna wanna,
“Wixa jemlu wane chininri, ‘Gita yotkakanunru wa tye kpashiwakapji myochi kamrutikaluru. Wa mapagogne chininri satu nkamrutanu myochi mkamrutikotpatka.’ ”
Seyni rupgujtalna wanna koxa gi pixkakakluni.
Wa sasertote gitsrukate potu tunwata ganikajitskalaya. Repomgalu wa Geso. Wane chinru, “¿Gikeko pugityano? ¿Klu rupgujtatyayina wanna nyi Pixaya?”
Seyni Wale pochkeru. Gike rugita. Sasertote gitsrukate potu rumepe gepomgaletatnaklu. Wane chinru, “¿Pixlege wa Kristoyi Gimalwutkaluru Wgenyi?”
Geso wane china, “Gitakni. Gixa getanno Gita, Yineru Wgenno, tuplatyawakapa potuklesreta ruyakle Goyakalu, nuninkoxapa kyachgapererumkoya tengogneya.”
Giyagni wa sasertote gitsrukate potu suskakamkata. Wane china, “¿Klu wanepnute magatyawu gipgujtalewatachine?
Gjematkalu wa mupashiregnuchi china. ¿Gi pixka getle gixlu?” Wa wanna pejnuruneko wane chinyegitluna wa Wale giklukanuwna rupninripa.
Pimrine yinuwaka gitskagjeretanru, rushyagojitanruna, yotmutanruna. Wane chinruna, “Goyakalu tokanu peneklewatkoxewa.” Towrechine giptagojitlu.
Rapuko rawanata Petro panchiya. Tuna sato rupxakjero wa sasertote gitsrukate potu.
Wa tetinri wa Petro rolkanatini, tyopukgatlu. Wane china, “Pixni Waleymalutyi, Geso Nasare gajeru.”
Seyni wale nutata. Wane china, “Gi numatlu. Gi koxa numatjemlu wa pchinyawaka.” Rushpaka. Maleka ya. Yanumatatka gaxawripa.
Wa gipxaklewatachro getinri, tyinuwaka wane chinretatnakna wane gwanatachine, “Tyenwa satu wannate.”
Seyni wale nutatatnaka. Gowukshini wane gwanatachine wane chinruna Petro, “Galikakni pixni satu wannatyi. Gi rixanu Kalile gajeryi.”
Yinuwaka kamakpiirewleta, wane chinreta Wale kawchinanu, “Gi numatpotunatlu wa tye jeji wa Walepirana gyanumsatinri.”
Waneklu gaxawripa yanumatatka gepi kata chininri. Petro gishiniklu wa tokanu Geso chinyawaklu, “Ma yanumatkanugnapu gaxawripa gepi kata, pnutatanno mapa kata.” Yanshinikanunatlu wa wale, chiyagatatka.
Waneklutka wa goyechnokawa jemanshinikankakatkana wa tsrukakalune sasertotene, wa tsruneyma, wa yonchikgapineyma, wa ptowruneko jemanshinikankakachineyma. Rostutluna Geso. Ranikatkaluna. Pilato samyokatkaluna.
Pilato gepomgalu, “¿Pixlege wa Goteyone Pogiryi?” Rugitlu. Wane china, “Pixa chinyawaka.”
Wa tsrukakalune sasertotene jigyegitlu gixo.
Repomgatnaklu Pilato. Wane chinru, “¿Gi ge pugita? Petanu. ¡Gi pajigyeglenanukta rixyegityina!”
Ga wa Geso gi wa waleko rugitya. Giyagni ruglajita Pilato.
Wa tsrugogneklu rushyegjetna gostutkaluru girukokta ragjitna.
Wane rawanata satu Warawasu giwakatletachri gostutkaluru yagotkakachineyma, giylalewatachine yagotkakluya.
Runna gixolune yine. Yinuwaka gagjiretluna rixjetyawakna.
Pilato gigitna. Wane china, “¿Gi ge galuklu gita gishyegityapgi wa Pogirna Goteyone?”
Rumata ranxalna chinanu samyokluna tsrukakalune sasertotene.
Seyni wa tsrukakalune sasertotene komyekanshinikanutna gixolune yine rushyegityapna Warawasu galikakapni.
Rugitatnakna Pilato. Wane china, “¿Klu nixyalu galuka wa gixa giwakatyalu Goteyone Pogire?”
Wanna saplewatatnaka, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
Wane chinna Pilato, “¿Klu gektutu kamruta?” Wanna saplewpotuta, “¡Koroshishkita putakjixaganru!”
Pilato galuka giglenshinikanretna yine. Giyagni rushyegitna Warawasu. Kochipjetka Geso. Rali kochipjeretkoklunutka, samyoklu koroshishkita rutakikolupa.
Wa solalone ganiklu wa tsru panchi gitokote. Walenwa Pretoryo. Tomgana ptowruneko wa solalone.
Yoshmakluna pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Yoshmakluna sagyeta kona kamgikolu.
Yinuwaka galukletluna, “¡Wuya, Goteyone Pogire!”
Ruylakjiwutluna katsluksuya. Rutskagjetluna. Yonogyegitluna. Yoptsojityegitluna.
Wa rali gapnokatletinitkaluna, komkagatkaluna wa pakni yoshmookaluru pixkalutu mkachri. Waleko gimkalu yoshmakatkaluna. Ranikatkaluna koroshishkita rutakyapatkaluna.
Rutjikakluna satu giknogamtachri, Simo, Surene gajeru, Galegantro, Rogwo giru, wa sana ginyachri wa ranikyaplo wa Geso koroshishkitate.
Kolkota chinikowaka ranikatkaluna. Walenwa yokaakaluru, Jiwchiswaga yegi.
Renekluna winga smurna yapjetkalurga, seyni gi wa yoptotlo.
Koroshishkita rutakluna. Kotspaltamkatluna. Rutakluna rupenookaklena ranikyapluna satkaka.
Wa goyechnokawasreta koroshishkita rutakatkaluna.
Wa tokanu rogwaka gwachri yonatkaluru wa jigyegitikolu, wane china, “Wa Goteyone Pogire.”
Waleyma koroshishkita rutaakana gepi kachowgurune, satu potuklesreta, satu kegnetesreta.
Poyagkaakatka Tokanchi Yonatkaluru, wane chinachri: Mugleneyma kagwakikolupa Wale koxa.
Mupashiregnuchi chinruna giknogachine. Ruwnownojiwutna. Wane chinna, “¡Gaga! Wa Pixni wa kpashiwakapji yotkakachripyi, mapgogne chininri pkamrupjitanru.
Pixnanuko gognetkakinwa. Pujrukanu wa koroshishkitaya.”
Waneko pixka rixna wa tsrukakalune sasertotene gapnokatletlu. Wane chinkakna yonchikgapineyma, “Pimrine rognetkaka. Walenanuko gi rumkata gognetkakletnawa.
Kristo, Gisrayiline Pogire gijrukanu wa xani wa koroshishkitaya. Wetyaplu. Walixyaplu.” Wa Waleyma koroshishkita gitaakalune koxa yangalu.
Tumananutkani ruchpokatka psolchijnepotunanuyako kayinwakasreta rapokinpotunanuko.
Kayinwakpapko Geso saplewata. Tsruplaji rixa. Wane china, “Geloyi, Geloyi, ¿Glama sawajtani?” Walenwa yokaakaluru: “Noyakalute, Noyakalute, ¿klu chinanu puknokatkano?”
Jeminrina pimrine wane gwanatachine, wane chinna wanna, “Gjemanru. Tomgalu Giliya.”
Rasukamta satu. Katsopi kotsgatapyaluna kachgalu. Katsluksu rutaklu. Reneklu ruranrupa. Wane china, “Getashatanru. Wetkoxewa gikta runanu Giliya koshpakapyaplu.”
Geso tsruplaji rixa. Rupnanatka.
Waneklutka mkachrichrata gimaletanatachri kpashiwaka potu gajeru giskakamtatka gepichratatkalu. Teno rumuyaka giskakletyatka chijiina.
Wale ginaple tunwanata satu ksolaloteru. Retanata wane rixa gipnaletinri. Wane china, “Galikakpotunanni tye jejni Goyakalu Wgenni.”
Wane koxa tunwanatna suxone. Retanatna gowukayako. Wa wannatskala rawanatna Mariya Maktala gajero, Mariya Santiyako mturu wa Gosi ginro, ga wa Salome koxa.
Wa wanna Kalile rawanatiniwa romkagjenatluna. Rupxakjenatluna. Wa pimrone gixo waneklu koxa, Waleyma kanikachine wa Gerosale.
Wa kayi rixinitka wa galpokotikolgogne, walenwa gapnanutikalurgognestsi.
Gosi Garimate gajeru, jemanshinikankakjetikowaka gajeru kagwakpiratkaluru. Wale koxa kagwaklu pogirewatyawaka Goyakalu. Wane ya. Mpiikatu jiglokyegitlu Pilato. Ragjitlu Gesnimane.
Wa Pilato giglajita wa rupninrinatka. Repuklu ksolaloteru. Repomgalu wa muchikawako rupninrinatka.
Runkaklu wa ksolaloteru. Reneklu gimanetka Gosi.
Wale gagjitlu mkachrichrata. Jijrukatkalu. Poyitatkalu mkachrichrata. Rutaklu yomlechi wa sotlu jitotikalurupna. Rakaprurjixlu sotlu wa giyomle gipgyaptote.
Wa Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Gosi ginro, getanatna ginakakta rutakanunruna.
Wa ruknoginitka wa gapnanutikalurgogne, Mariya Maktala gajero, wa Mariya Santiyako ginro, wa Salome, ragjitlona pgamlugalo wa ruyogatyapluna.
Goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne simana wane yana yomlechi yegi. Tkachi gishpakatka.
Wane chinkakananumtna wannakakluko, “¿Katmakla gakaprurutyanwure sotlu yomlechi gipgyaptote gajeru?”
Wa retinitkaluna, retluna wa sotlu gajritkalurutka. Gi rixanu tsrupotunanu sotlu.
Jiglokatkana yomlechi. Retluna jeji tuplanatachri potuklesreta, gimkalu gowukalu gitakachri klatalu. Ruglajpotutna.
Wane chinna wale, “Gi wa giglajitanu. Gijgalu Geso, Nasare gajeru, wa koroshishkita gitakanatkaluru. Yotunomtatka. Gi gewitkalu. Getanru rutakikowaka.
Seyni gyanutka. Ginkakanna wa yimaklene, Petro koxa, Wale gapka wane kosekingi. Kalile yanu. Wane getinitkalu chinyawakpotukgi.”
Wane yiyatkana. Rasukamtna yomlechiya. Wa rutatatna. Ruglajitna. Giketsotaji runkakna, piklena chinanu.
Wa yotunotinitka wa goyechnokawpotuko muchinangogne wa simanatka, rupgujewnayegitlo muchinanu wa Mariya Maktala gajero. Walanwa ruknokakamchitetanro payokgipre kamchine.
Tyinitka wala. Tunkakna wa Waleymalunenanu, wa wamonuwnanatachine, chiyaganatachine.
Wa wanna jemyegitinitkalu ruwekinritka, wa retikolutka walaya, gi ralixna.
Wanepnute gepi wa wanna yanananumta sana yachine. Geso wane gipgujewnayegitna. Satuko kogetkogatka.
Wane yiyatkana. Runkakna pimrine. Gi wannako ralixna.
Ralipretka rupgujewnayegitna Geso pamole satupjene wa tuplanatinna nikawakakwaya. Chigetjetanna wa ma malixleyna shikowgajitinriyna, gi rixanu gi ralixkana retjene yotunomtinritka.
Wane chinna Wale, “Psolchijneko gyanu. Ginkakletanru Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi pejnurunenanuko giyakotkalune yegi.
Wa galixachripa katko wale gognetkaako, seyni wa malixakletu giklukanuwnayegjixko.
Tyekaka getkalurkaka kamrujetanna wa galixachine. Gita giwakaya ruknokinrina kamchine. Gerotu patokanchikaka yanumatinna.
Koschekanruna gimnukaka. Rurinrina kamakalu gi wa rumtukanna. Wa yayixachine gogo rutakamyotanna. Ruglewatanna.”
Wa Gitsrukaachi gali yanumsayegletinitkana, tengogne yoptotikatka. Tuplatatka Goyakalu potuklesretate.
Wanna gishpakamtatka. Runkaklewatna pasretamnunanukaya. Wa Gitsrukaachi gikamrurewatna. Wannaya Goyakalu kamrujetlu getkalurkaka. Gitsrukaachi poyegitlu tokanu wa getkalurkakayma. Wane gixkalurupa.
Wane rixa. Gi gepika yagota yonretlu wixa yegi kamrutikalurutkapirana. Yagota ginkakpokwakletluna.
Waneko pixka rixna reyinuwaklewayakawa getachine. Wannanwa tokanchi kamruklerune. Ga wa wanna samyokwu tyekakapirana.
Giyagni kigle getle nixlu gita koxa nyonyegityi, kshinikanuru potu Teyogwilo. Rixpokotyawaka nunkakyi. Gi rixanu reyinuwakayakawa nomkaginshinikanpiranpotutlu,
pumatpotutyaplu koxa pixa poyegitkalurni wa tokanchi punkakikolu.
Gotechijne pogire Giroreklunanu, waneru satu sasertote, Sakariya giwakatletachri, Gawiyaklopishaneyma gitaakaluru. Ganunronwa Gaaroklopisha. Gilisawetinwa tgiwaka.
Ga wa gepiko poyagkakachinni Goyakalu getanuya. Muklukanuwnakane. Romkagitluna pejnuruko Gitsrukaachi yokanatanru, Wale gitakanru.
Gi kwugenna gi rixanu migatni Gilisaweti, ga wa gepiko gi gepika walapu waneyanatkana.
Wa gipapko gapokinpatka sasertote kamrure kamrutinri Goyakalu getanu, wane rixa.
Sasertotene gixjetyawaka, wale gitaaka yochpikyaplu pgamlupagiri. Kpashiwaka potu Gitsrukaachinu jigloka.
Pejnuruneko gixolune yine maleka gagjigognenatya yochpiikakopshini pgamlupagiri.
Gitsrukaachitowreru gipgujewnayegitlu. Pgamlupagiri yochpikjetikowakakwa potuklesretate tunwata.
Wa retinitkalu Sakariya, kojwakanshinikanutnanwa. Tsru piklu rixa.
Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinru, “Sakariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu pagjigognere jemka. Ga wa pganunro Gilisaweti gishpaakakanru puturu. Gwa pgiwakatanru.
Pumuwatanu. Pumjikanu. Gixo yine gimuwatanu rushpakinri chinanupa.
Gi rixanu tsrupni Goyakalu getanu. Gi wa wingako ruranu. Gi wa kapsagaluko ruranu. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu rixanu, runronanwakyakawa.
Gixo Gisrayiliklopishane satkakanu puturupa Gitsrukaachi Royakalutna yegi.
Giwekikaluruya, Giliya pixka, ga wa ruyakleya runanu. Ma mapookanuwa Gitsrukaachi, wale gapka kosekanu. Wale satkakgajinshinikanutanna girchine wugenenna yegi; ga wa kaalirerune satkakyapa kanshinikanurune rixinripna poyagkakachine pixka. Yine galpokotachripni Gitsrukaachi chinanu giglepokotkalunepa.”
Sakariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi nixpoko gimatletanru? Gi rixanu tsrutsolejinatkano. Ga wa nganunro koxa gi gepika walapu waneyatkalo.”
Goyakalutowreru gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitni Kawrilno. Goyakalustsi tunwatachrino. Gitni yokanatkalurno nuynumsatyapyi, ga wa nunkakyapyi tye kiglerupirana.
Ga wa xani myanumatkatupyi. Gi pumkata yanumletannuna wale wane gixkoklugognepotunanukopa, pma malixtokanutkalchinanno. Gigogne poyagkaakalurupni ntokanu.”
Ga wa yine kagwakanatlu Sakariya. Ruglajitna wa kpashiwaka ramginritka chinanu.
Ga wa rushpakamtinitka, gi rumkata yanumletanatka. Rumatna wa pagixanu retinrinatka getkaluru kpashiwakaya. Rutsejrigjeyegishatatkana. Myanumatkatunannatkani.
Wane rixa. Poyagkaklu wa sasertote kamrure. Rali poyagkakletinitkalu, gipji yatka.
Ruknoginitka walegognekaka, kamshirotkani ganunro Gilisaweti. Pamyo ksuru tyogimatnawa. Wane china,
“Giyagni wane rixno Gitsrukaachi, wa walegogne retyano konpatetyapatkano yine getanuya.”
Patsrujire ksuru chininri Goyakalu yokanatlu gitowreru Kawrili. Satu pokchi Nasare giwakatletachri, Kalilesreta, yokanatlu.
Makloji jeji metkatowa yegi yokanatlu. Satu jeji gipiratanrotka, Gosi giwakatletachri, Tawiklopisha. Wala makloji giwaka Mariyni.
Wala yegi jigloka Goyakalutowreru. Wane china, “Mariya, gimutkalurpotyi. Pixaymalu Gitsrukaachi.”
Tkojwakanshinikanutnanwa wale tokanu chinanu. Tnutanshinikanuta gi pixkalutuknige wa tye galuklewlu.
Giyagni wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinro, “Mariya, gi pikanu. Gi rixanu Goyakalu gimutatkayi.
Xani pmushiwatanu. Pushpaakakanru puturu. Pgiwakatanru Geso.
Tyepni wa tsru. Teno potu Gajeru Wgene chinko. Gitsrukaachi Goyakalu genekanru rutsrukatni Tawi pogirewatyawaka.
Gakowniklopishane yegi pogirewgognenatini. Pogirewatyawaka gike rixiniko nikawnanu.”
Giyagni Mariya wane chinru Goyakalutowreru, “¿Gi rixpokotanu wa tye? Gi rixanu gi jeji numatawa.”
Goyakalutowreru gigita. Wane chinro, “Giwekikaluru Kpashiri ginyegitanyi. Teno potu Gajeru giyakle chikletyegitanyi. Giyagkoxni kpashiripni gishpakachripa wane chinko Goyakalu Wgene.
Ga wa petanro. Pumole koxa Gilisaweti wala koxa tutsroginiko tmushiwata. Toturupni. Patsrujire ksuryegitkalo wa migato chinkaluronanu.
Gi rixanu Goyakalu gi satuna ma mumkatanutni.”
Giyagni Mariya wane china, “Gitsrukaachi wayegrerno. Wane nixikolupa pixa chinyawakpotuko.” Wala yegi yiyatka Goyakalutowreru.
Walegognekaka tpalnamta Mariya. Kmagkatewaka tya. Teyakawamta. Gotechijne gajeru pokchi tya.
Sakariyapji tjiglokamta. Taluklo Gilisaweti.
Wane tixatka. Wa Gilisaweti yijnaka galukletinitkalo wa Mariya, wa mturu tonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa. Wa Gilisaweti Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanro potu gixachrotkani.
Tsru saple tixa. Wane china sapleta, “Giglenshinikanyegitkaluryi pixje suxonyegiya. Giglenshinikanyegitkaluru punanwaka gishpakyachripa.
¿Gi nixge gita wa tye giknogyapno, wa Nutsrukate ginro ginyegityawakno?
Gi rixanu neyijnako galukletiniyakawayi, wa mturu nonanwaka gajeru ruptekapa rumuwle chinanu.
Giglenshinikanyegitkaluro galixachro, gi rixanu poyagkakikolupa wa tunkakikolupirana, wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyalo.”
Mariya wane china, Numalwutlu Gitsrukaachi nonshinikanuya.
Ga wa numuwyegitlu Goyakalu, Nognetkakjeru.
Gi rixanu mpogireto retyano wayegrerno. Xaniyakawa giglenshinikanyegitkalurno Wane chinannona pejnurune gimuweekakgognenatachinepa gapkatatachineshaklumnunanukapa.
Gi rixanu wa Kgiyaklewakleru tsrupirana kamruyegitno. Kpashiri giwakni.
Retwamonunanumtna pagwashlukaka gimuweekakgognenatachinmnunanuka wa pikjene.
Muchkowamyota. Galixkotnachinewa rajiyna ga wa ginshinikanuyna kopalatna.
Pogirewatyawakna tsrukakalune ruknokya. Mpogirene tsrune rutaka.
Kiglerkakaya jinanu rixkakna nachichachine. Ga wa ponikolune maleshayalune yokanatna.
Rupxaklu wayegreru Gisrayili, gi rixanu rushiniklu retwamonrewle,
Chinyawakpotukna wutsrukatenni, Gawra ga wa giklopishane rushinityawakpotuko.
Mapa ksuru Gilisawetiyma wane twa Mariya. Wanepnute topji tsatokatnaka.
Ga wa Gilisaweti poyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka, rushpakatka toturu.
Yijnakotinitkana tumwastsitanune ga wa tomolene wa tsru getwamonre rixyalo Gitsrukaachi, rumuwatna walayma.
Wane rixatka. Yokgipgogne chininri runna wa sajruka gistakletyapatkaluna wa mturu. Ruru giwakmaka rutakluna, Sakariya.
Tugita runro. Wane china, “Gike. Seyni Gwa giwakatko.”
Wane chinrona, “Gi satuna pumole wane tye giwaka giwakatletachri.”
Rutsejrigjeyegitluna ruru klu giwaka ralukyalu wale.
Ragjitlu pamta. Yonatlu. Wane china, “Gwanwa giwaka.” Pejnuruneko giglajita.
Waneklu Sakariya kotpuknamatka ga wa ginnu. Yanumatatka. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu.
Tsru piklu rixanna pejnuruneko rumwastsitanune. Ga wa psoluko Gotechijne gajeru kmagkatewaka pogiwatya pejnuruko tyepirankaka.
Pejnuruneko yijnakotachine gimretpiranatlu rajiyna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachrini: xani tye mturu? Gi rixanu waleymalu Goyakalu.”
Ga wa Sakariyni ruru, Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanru potu. Goyakalu tokanu reneklewata. Wane china:
Gimalwutkalurni Gitsrukaachi, Gisrayiline Goyakalute. Salwayegitna rayinerutene koshpakapna.
Wixa yegi rupgujewnakakyalu Gognetkaklewatachri potu, satu wayegrerni Tawniklopisha.
Reyinuwakleyakawa wane chinjetyawakpotuko pejnurunniko kpashirinni tokanchi geneklewatachinniya,
Gognewatikalurupapirana, wkamnixjeneyegiya, ga wa pejnuruneko wayegixjeneyegiya.
Gi rixanu retwamonutna wutsrukatenni ga wa rushiniklu kpashiri tokanu rupiratanru.
Wutsrukatni Gawrani rupiratya Wale kawchinanu renekyapwu
Mpiikonepwu wushatkapko wkamnixjenyegiya, Wale yegi wkamrurewatinripa,
Kpashirinepwu, poyagkakachinepwu Goyakalu getanu psolgogneko wugogne.
Ga wa pixa, mturu, teno potu Gajeru tokanu geneklewatachri pchinko Gi rixanu Gitsrukaachi kosekachripyi palpokgapotyaplu.
Rayinerutene pumatkakanu gognewatikalurupirana kaspukmukochiretikolupna,
Woyakalute gishiniklewle ga wa retwamonrewle chinanu, Wa wale chinanu salwayegitwu pokamlatachri tengogne potu gishpakyachri.
Wane rixa pokamlatyegityapna mapshagwaka gwachine, ga wa gipnalchikle tuplanatachinena, wkosekikolupa, giglewanshinikanrugapo gayinripa.
Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Muchkowata Giwekikaluruya. Yineru mwiyawakanu rawanata walegognepotunanuko wa Gisrayiline yegi rupgujewnini.
Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Susa Gakosto yokanrewata psolchijne gajeneko gitakgiwakatikolupa. Walepirana pogiwata.
Tye muchinanu gapka gitakgiwakatikolu wane gixka wa Surchijne girukotlewatyachri rixini Surino.
Satkaka waleko gipokchi ya, rutakgiwakatikolupna pejnuruneko.
Giyagni Kalilchijne gajeru pokchi Nasare yiyatka Gosi. Gotchijne kanika. Tawi pokchi ya Wele chinikowaka. Tawiklopishni wale. Tawnineru.
Wa rutakgiwakatikolupa Mariyayma rupiratanro. Kamshirni wala.
Wane rixatka. Wane rawanatinna tpoyagkakatkalu togogne tushpakawgenetinripatka.
Tushpaakakatkalu muchinanu toturu. Mkachrichrata tpoyitatkalu. Prachine wakane nikjetyawaka tuklukakatkalu, gi rixanu maleshayna pagruko pnu giyakatyachine gwajetyawaka.
Walesretako wanena girukotapratachine, maleka gwachine, girukotaprayechnotachine.
Goyakalutowreru gapyegitna wanna. Gitsrukaachi gatajiwnale yochigyegitna. Pikpotutna. Tsru piklu rixna.
Ga wa Goyakalutowreru wane chinna, “Gi mpikanu. Gi rixanu kigleru tokanchi nunkakapgi, tsru gimuwlupirana, pejnuruneko yinenupni.
Tawi pokchi rushpakya xani gixa chinanu Gognetkaklewatachri. Walenwa Kristo Gitsrukaachi.
Waleko rumatikolupa: Gikshikanru mturu mkachrichrata poyitkaluru; prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachri.”
Walegnapunanu Goyakalutowreruymatkana gixolune solalone tengogne gajene. Goyakalu gimalwutachine. Wane chinachine:
Goyakalu gimalwutkaluru teno potu Gajeru. Ga wa tyechijne gajene yinenupa giglewanshinikanrewlu, wa giglenshinikanutachinenupa.
Wane rixatka. Wanna yegi yiyatkana Goyakalutowrerune. Tengogne yatkana. Ga wa girukotapratachine wane chinkakna, “Wele gayanu xani. Wetapanru tyepirana wa giknogachri wa Gitsrukaachi ginkakjixyawu.”
Giyampotu wane yatkana. Rukshiklona Mariya, ga wa Gosi, ga wa mturu prachine nikjetyawaka giklugachritka.
Wa retinitkaluna, pogitatkaluna wa mturupirana, wa chinikowakna.
Ga wa pejnuruneko yijnakotachine giglajita wa girukotapratachine chinyawakna.
Ga wa Mariya pejnuruko tyekakapirana tumreta tajiya. Tyanshinikanpiranatlu.
Satokatkana girukotapratachine. Ralixkotluna Goyakalu ga wa rumalwutluna pejnurukopiranaya, wa yijnakotanruna ga wa retanruna, wa chinikowakpotukna.
Yokgipgogne chininitka wa sajruka gistakletikolpatka wa mturu, giwakatka Geso, wa Goyakalutowreru giwakatyawaklu, ma nanwakchi mawakanuwa giwakatlu.
Wa poyagkakgognetkatka powralu rutakikolupna, wa Moysisi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawakpotuko, Gerosale ranikatkaluna, wa Gitsrukaachi renekyapatkaluna.
Wa rixyongatyawaka Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru: Pejnuruneko jejine kotpukawugenewlemapatini kpashirine chinkalunepni Gitsrukaachi chinanupa.
Wa genekashlu giylatkalurupa renekanna wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka: Gepirine kamowane, waka gepi motkoko wgenene.
Gerosale waneru satu jeji, Simo giwakatletachri. Walenwa jeji poyagkakachri ga wa kgipashiregolu. Wale kagwaklu rumnanukikolupna Gisrayiline. Waleymalu Giwekikaluru Kpashiri.
Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya runkaaka gichi rupnanu ma metkanuwalu Gitsrukaachi Kristote.
Giwekikaluruya kpashiwakapji yatka. Wa kpashiwakapji ranikinitkaluna rurune wa mturu Geso, wane rixyapatkaluna wa rixjetyawakna wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru chinanu.
Giyagni wale kampukatkalu. Rumalwutlu Goyakalu. Wane china:
“Xani, Gitsrukaachi, petasha yaletanutkalu pwayegreru giglewanshinikanutachri pchintokanutyawaka.
Gi rixanu noygalpotuko netyatkalu gognewatikaluru Pixanu,
Wa pejnuruneko yine getanu palpokotanru.
Pokamlatachripni payinyegiya gipgujewnakakachripa. Ga wa payinerutene Gisrayiline yochigyegitachripni.”
Ga wa ruru, runro giglajita wa wale wane chinikowaka.
Simo giglenshinikanyegitna. Wane chinro runro Mariya, “Pjemanu. Wa Tye gitaaka rujrukinripna, ga wa yotunomtinripna gixolune Gisrayiline. Rutaaka rumatikolupa rixinripa. Gapatkalurupni Wale,
rupgujewninripa gixolunenshinikangaji. Ga wa yoglolewapi yoglonshinikanutanyi pixako.”
Wane koxa twanata Gana, tokanchi geneklewatachro, Panwuri nshicho. Gaseriklopishni. Gixo potu walapu waneyatkalo. Talixinitka, payokgipre walapu tganuru yegi twanata.
Gipnagnurutachrotkani, ga wa yokgipimole gepkoxamkoje walapu waneyatkalo. Goyechno ga wa gogi gi tushpaka kpashiwakapjiya. Togajirewatinri ga wa tagjigognetinri Gitsrukaachi yegi tkamrurewatya.
Walepapko tapoka. Wala koxa gipgujtatlu Goyakalu. Walepirana tunkakleta pejnuruneko kagwakachinyegiya, gognewatikaluru Gerosale chinanu kagwakachine.
Wa poyagkakinitkaluna wa pejnurkakakopirana wa Gitsrukaachi Tokanu Yokanatkaluru chinyawaka, satokatkana. Kalilechijne gajeru pokchi, Nasare, yatkana.
Ga wa mturu tseruwna. Ga wa muchkowananumta. Kgimatkaleru potu rixinri. Ga wa Goyakalu gimutlewle waneylutni.
Pawalapkaka Gerosale yana rurune, wa meyiwlu yegi, Tsru Giknoglushgogne.
Wa pamole gepi walapu chininitka, Gerosale kanikna meyiwlugogneklu, rixjetyawakna.
Nikawnagognetinitka, satokatkana. Ga wa mturu Geso Gerosale rutukatka. Gi rumatna rurune rutukinritka.
Kagwakluna rumotsananumtjene yegi rawamtinri. Pagogne yanru yinitkana, rujgatkaluna gimolenna yegi ga wa rumatanunna yegi.
Wa ma mukshiikanutkaluna, Gerosale satokna. Rujgananumtluna.
Wane rixatka. Mapgogne giknoginitka, kpashiwakapji rukshikyatkaluna. Kgimatkalerune ganikajite tuplanata. Jemanatna, ga wa repomgana.
Pejnuruneko wa yijnakotjene giglajita rushinikanuwleya ga wa Wale gigityawakna.
Wa retinitkaluna, ruglajitna. Runro wane chinru, “Noturu, ¿klu chinanu wane pixwu? Gi rixanu, gita ga wa puru gijgayi. Kachingajpotwu.”
Giyagni Wale wane chinna, “¿Klu chinanu gijgano? ¿Gi ge gimata wa Nuru kamrure numkata kamruretatka?”
Gi rumata jemluna wale tokanu wa chinyawakna.
Wannayma yopikatka. Nasare yatka. Yijnakotna. Runro taji gimretpiranatlu pejnuruko tyijnakotanru ga wa tetanrupirana.
Ga wa Geso tseruwnagimatkalewleta. Ya tseruwnaleta. Pnuteyaka Goyakalu gigleretyawaka kamruta, ga wa yine gigleretyawaka koxa.
Pamole pamyo walapu girukotlewwatinitka Tiweryo Susa, Ponsyo Pilato girukotlewata Gotesretaya. Ga wa Girore girukotlewata Kalilesretaya. Ga wa repuru Wilipi girukotlewata Gitorisretaya ga wa Trakonitesretaya. Ga wa Lisani girukotlewata Gawilinisretaya.
Sasertotene gitsrukatene potu rixanatinna Ganasu ga wa Kaygwasu, Goyakalu tokanu ginyegitlu Gwa, Sakariya wgene, yineru mwiyawakanuya.
Psoluko Gorta Gapgasretchijne yamta. Runkakletananumtlu katlupirana renshinikanutinripna yine, ga wa kaspukmukochiretikolupna.
Wane rixa chinyongatyawaka Gisayiya tokanchi geneklewatachri kirukate: Yineru mwiyawakanu saplewatyachri tokanu: Galpokotanru Gitsrukaachi gatnugapote. Mpotukatanru gigapkaka.
Pejnuruko magkachpalkaka tsepotkalurupni. Pejnuruko magkamriji ga wa mturu magka patenkaklutkalurupni. Ga wa katpagapkakalu potukatgapotkalurupni. Ga wa kamlojgapolu pgayamta rixgapotko.
Ga wa pejnuruko yineru getanru gognewatikaluru Goyakalunu.
Ga wa Gwa wane chinna gixolune yine gishpakamtachine wale katyapna, “Gimnu pixkalungi. ¿Katu ginkakgi gasukyegityawaklu Goyakalu jgekanupa?
Giyagni gkamrutanru genshinikanrewlu gimuknu kamrure. Gi wa gyinuwaka wane chinkakletanu, ‘Waneywu wutsrukatni Gawrani.’ Gi rixanu gita wane chingi, Goyakalu gimkata gipgujewnakakletanna Gawraklopishanemka tyekaka sotlukakaya.
Xani koxa gagmunasko rapokatka gepchi. Pejnuruko gagmuna kiglejiru mwanutu kayiikalurni. Xirnachri ruknookona. Waneko pixka rixko yineru kigleru kamrurchi ma kamrutkanupa.”
Ga wa gixolune yine gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “Giyagni ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
Rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Wa gepi mkachri waneyalutu, renekanru waneyamigjetu. Ga wa nikchi waneyalutu waneko pixka rixanu.”
Runkoxna gijgawenutachine katikolupna. Wane chinruna, “Yimaklewatachri, ¿klu wkamrutanu?”
Wale wane chinna, “Gi wa gitaakaluru pnute gijganu.”
Solalone koxa gepomgalu. Wane chinruna, “¿Ga wa wixa klu wkamrutanu?” Wane chinna wanna, “Gi satuna mpiikakanu sroschi gijginriya. Gi koxa gapatlewatanu. Mpoyagnutanru gwenutikolu.”
Kagwakanatna yine. Pejnuruneko rajiyna gishinikanuwyegitlu Gwa, gikta Kristoni.
Pejnuruneko rugita Gwa. Wane chinna, “Gita galikakni katgi gonuya. Ga wa runa gita pnute muchkonurutu. Gi wa gita gimuluni nkoshpirokyaplu yoshmaklejixitsa. Wale katangi Giwekikaluru Kpashiriya ga wa xirnachriya.
Ruplokapre gimyo gwa. Triko powratpotutanru giylakaajetikowaka. Rapatjetanru trikneji rumretyawakaplu, ga wa yoxikanru gichicha xirniywaka gike rixiniko muwnakatupa. Waneko pixka rixanunna yinepni. Genshinikanutachine rumretanu, ga wa menshinikanutkane xirnachri ruknokanu.”
Giyagni gixo giykolu ga wa pimripirana giykolu kigleru galikakni runkakletna yine.
Giyagni Gwa gijretlu Girore pasreta girukotlewatyachri wa Giroryana repuru Wilipi gnunro chinanu, ga wa pejnuruko mugletu kamrutanru Girore chinanu.
Pejnuruko tyekaka pnute potu rixyatka. Yoshmakikowaka rushyayegitlu Gwa.
Ma yoshmaakonuwa Gwa wane rixatka. Pejnuruneko yine katkatka, ga wa Geso koxa katkatka. Ga wa ragjigognetini tengogne kotpuuka.
Wale yegi Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gijrukatka, kamanemnuru. Motkoko pixka rixmanemta. Waneylu tokanchi tengogneya wane chinachri, “Pixni Noturyi nalukanruyi. Pixa gigletanshinikanutno.”
Waleko Geso mapamole walapustsitka. Gosi wgene kagwakikaluru.
Ga wa Gosni wa Gili wgene. Walenwa Mata wgene. Walenwa Rewi wgene. Walenwa Melchi wgene. Walenwa Ganasu wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene.
Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Gamo wgene. Walenwa Nawomo wgene. Walenwa Gesli wgene. Walenwa Naaka wgene.
Walenwa Mati wgene. Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Simi wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
Walenwa Gowana wgene. Walenwa Resa wgene. Walenwa Sorowawil wgene. Walenwa Salatili wgene. Walenwa Neri wgene.
Walenwa Melchi wgene. Walenwa Gawti wgene. Walenwa Kosami wgene. Walenwa Gelmotami wgene. Walenwa Geri wgene.
Walenwa Geso wgene. Walenwa Giliyase wgene. Walenwa Goreyi wgene. Walenwa Matati wgene. Walenwa Rewi wgene.
Walenwa Simo wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene. Walenwa Gosi wgene. Walenwa Gonani wgene. Walenwa Giliyachi wgene.
Walenwa Meleya wgene. Walenwa Maynani wgene. Walenwa Nata wgene. Walenwa Tawi wgene.
Walenwa Gesi wgene. Walenwa Gowe wgene. Walenwa Poosi wgene. Walenwa Salmo wgene. Walenwa Naasoni wgene.
Walenwa Gaminata wgene. Walenwa Gatni wgene. Walenwa Pare wgene. Walenwa Gota wgene.
Walenwa Gakowo wgene. Walenwa Gisaaka wgene. Walenwa Gawra wgene. Walenwa Tara wgene. Walenwa Nachori wgene.
Walenwa Sarochi wgene. Walenwa Rakawo wgene. Walenwa Paleka wgene. Walenwa Gewre wgene. Walenwa Sala wgene.
Walenwa Kaanani wgene. Walenwa Garpaksa wgene. Walenwa Seme wgene. Walenwa Nowe wgene. Walenwa Lamechi wgene.
Walenwa Matosala wgene. Walenwa Genochi wgene. Walenwa Gare wgene. Walenwa Malereri wgene. Walenwa Kaanani wgene.
Walenwa Genoso wgene. Walenwa Seti wgene. Walenwa Gata wgene. Walenwa Goyakalu wgene.
Ga wa Geso Gorta satokyatka. Giwekikaluru Kpashiri gwagajitanrupotni. Yineru mwiyawakanu raniika Giwekikaluru chinanu.
Gepkoxamkojmolgogne tsru kamchi yantaletlu. Gike nika walegognekaka. Ruknoogognetinitka, nachneru.
Giyagni tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pixinipa, wane pchinanru tye sotlu jimapro rixinwa.”
Geso gigitlu, “Wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gi wa niikalurupje ruwekya yineru.”
Tenolu potu magka raniklu. Pshinitsonuji rekakgitlu pejnuruko pogirewatyawaakaka psolchijiko.
Tsru kamchi wane chinru, “Nutakanyi tye ptowruko chinanu. Ptowruko pogirewle nenekanyi. Gi rixanu gita samyookalurni, ga wa katukta naluka nenekanru.
Wa pyoptsojityegitinipno pejnuruko pixanpatkani.”
Geso gigitlu, wane chinru, “Yonatkalurutkani: Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute pyoptsojityegitanu. Walepje pkamrurewyegitanu.”
Giyagni Gerosale raniklu. Kpashiwakapji gwachri tenoptaji potu rutaklu. Wane chinru, “Goyakalu Wgene pchininipa, gewi pakaxikamtini.
Gi rixanu wane chinyongayegitkalurutkani: Gitowrene towutyegitanyi wanna girukotyapyi.
Ga wa: Kashichanyina gimyoyna, gi pagogneko sotlu putspejixitinripa.”
Geso gigita. Wane chinru, “Kapiranalutkani: Gi pyantaletanru Gitsrukaachi Poyakalute.”
Rali yantaletletinitkalu pejnuruko yantaletlewluya, Wale yegi yiyatka tsru kamchi. Wanepshini retashatlu.
Ga wa Giwekikaluru giyakleyma satokatka Geso. Kalile yatka. Psolchijiko walesreta pogiwapiranatyatka.
Wanna ginkaklewawaklepjikaka runkaklewatya. Gimalwutkalurni pejnuruneyako.
Nasare yatka, wa tseruwakikwaka. Rixjetyawaka gapnanutikalurgogne jiglokjetlu ginkaklewawakapji. Palna. Retyongata.
Tokanchi geneklewatachri Gisayiya kirukate reneeka. Koprakatkalo kiruka. Rukshiklu wane china yongatyawaka:
Gita rawa Gitsrukaachinu Giwekikaluru. Gi rixanu Wale tsomitno Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi nenekyapna kwamonurune. Wale yokanatno kashikanotkalune yegi nunkakletyaplu gishpakikolupirana. Ga wa maygalene yegi, gimrekgalupirana. Nkoshpakyapna kapsakletkalune.
Nunkakletyaplu Gitsrukaachi gimutlewle walapute.
Saprurutatkalo kiruka. Kamrurewatachri renekatkalo. Tuplatatka. Pejnuruneko ginkaklewawakapji gwanatachine yopukgapotutlu.
Yinuwaka wane chinretna, “Xawakni poyagkaakatka tye Tokanchi Yonatkaluru gixa jemanu.”
Pejnuruneko pogitlu. Ruglajyegitluna rumutlewle tokanuya, wa yanumatinri. Wanna wane china, “¿Gi ge Gosi wgenekni wa Tye?”
Wane chinna Geso, “Pejnurunekgi gixa tye yapkaklu nchinanno, ‘Kpinrewakleru, putuukakinwa pixnanuko. Klunerukta wyijnakpiranyegitanru Kapernawo kamrutikaluruya, gewi koxa puchijneya pkamrutinri.’ ”
Wane china, “Galikakni wane nchingi, gi satuna tokanchi geneklewatachri galuukalurni gichijneya.
Galikakni wane nchingi, Giliyaklunanu tengogne gishyatkalurunanni. Mapa walapu ga wa patsrujire ksuru rushyanatka, ga wa tsru nachinanni psolchijneko. Waleklu gi gepikananna gipnagnurutachrone Gisrayilichijneya.
Seyni gi satona wanna yegi yokanatka Giliya, seyni Sarepta Pokchi, Sitosreta yokanatka, sato suxo gipnagnurutachro yegi.
Giliseyo tokanchi geneklewatachriklunanu gi gepikananna gijirgitutachine Gisrayilchijne gwachine. Seyni gi satuna wa nyi powratka. Ga wa Naama galikakni Suri gajeru powratka.”
Giyagni pejnuruneko ginkaklewawakapji gwachine ramewnapotutna, tyepirana yijnakotinna.
Palnamtna. Pokchi malekate ranikluna. Pokchi magkatetajgapotuko ranikluna, yotkakyapmakluna gitskata.
Seyni Wale wanna ganikajite yapamta. Yatka.
Yopikamtatka. Kapernawo yatka, Kalilesreta gajeru pokchi. Gapnanutikalurgognekaka runkakaklewjeta.
Runkaklewle koglajejetna, gi rixanu tsru gitaakaluru tokanni.
Ginkaklewawakapji waneru satu jeji kamchi puchotlewatachri waneyalutu. Wale tsru saple gixa.
Wane china, “¡Ya! ¿Gi pixannatkawu Geso Nasare gajeru? ¿Puna pumtukpotutapyapwu? Numatyi katyi Pixa Kpashiryi Goyakalunu.”
Geso chigetjetlu. Wane china, “Pochkepyi. Pushpakanutka waleya.” Giyagni wa kamchi ganikajitskalaya yawnakaklu. Wale rushpakamtyatka. Gi wa rumtukamtlu.
Tsru giglajru rixna pejnuruneko. Wannakakluko giynumsakaka. Wane chinkakna, “¿Klu tokanchinwa tye, gi rixanu tsru gitaakaluru ga wa kgiyaklewaklerni rixa yokanretna kamchine puchotlewatachine? Rushpakamtna.”
Pogita piranamtkatka psoluko walesreta sajrukleya.
Palnamta Geso. Ginkaklewawakapji yiyatka. Simopji jigloka. Simo gimajirni tsru pachwalu kashichanro. Wala chinanu ragjitluna.
Walastsi tunwata. Chigetjetlu pachwalu. Kaspukatkalo pachwalu. Waneklu tpalnamtatka. Tupxakatkana.
Wa rumxikinitka tkachi, pejnuruneko yayixmoletachine ga wa pimrine yayixachine waneyalune, satumnunanuka gagijewnalkakaya ranikyegitluna. Satkaka rutakamyogogota. Rutuukakna.
Kamchi gishpakyegitna gi gepiko koxa. Saplewamtachine wane china saplemtna, “Pixni Goyakalu Wgenyi.” Seyni rujretna. Gi retasha yanumsaletanna tyepirankakaya, gi rixanu rumatluna Walenwa Kristo.
Gogi rixinitka rushpakamta. Yineru mwiyawakanu ya. Ga wa gixolune yine gijgalu. Yayegitluna. Chipetmakluna wa wanna yegi ma yinitipachi.
Seyni Wale wane chinna, “Numkata papokchikaka Kiglerpotunanu Tokanchi ginkaklewletya, Goyakalu pogirewatyawakapirana. Gi rixanu wale chinanukni nyokanatka.”
Ginkaklewawakapjikakaya runkaklewananumtya Gotechijneya.
Wane rixatka. Genesare Powgawnaga rawanata. Gixolune yine gachpaklu, Goyakalu tokanu yijnakotinripna.
Retlo gepi kanawa, gipowgawnaga gwanatachro. Chalugjetachine gitspakamtanrotka. Rerkachalnetna.
Sato kanawa rupteka, Simo kanawate. Simo ragjita ganikajgayaka ranikyaplu. Kanawa tuplata. Runkaklewyegitna gixolune yine.
Rutuka ginkaklewletinitka, wane chinru Simo, “Tengawaka gyanu. Giknokchalnetanu shima gkashichinripa.”
Simo gigitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, psolyechnoko wkamrurewpotuta. Giketsotaaji wkashichana. Seyni Pixa tokanu chinanu, wuknokanru chalu.”
Wane rixinitkana gixo potu shimni sajikna. Ruskatana chalnenina.
Rupxaalunna repnomyoyegitna wa sato kanawa gwanatachine wa rupxakapyapna. Runna. Gepi kanawa tsepotna. Wane tixa gimxiklepotutana kanawni.
Wa Simo Petro getinitkalu, Gesosoji rapokamta Petro. Wane china, “Puxrikyegitanno, Gitsrukaachi. Gi rixanu gitni jejno kmukochirerno.”
Gi rixanu ruglajpotutana ga wa pejnuruneko waleymalune gixoluro shima chinanu wa kashichanrona.
Waneko pixka rixna Gakowo ga wa Gwa, Sewereyo wgenene, wa Simo gipxaalune. Ga wa Geso wane chinru Simo, “Gi pikanu. Xaniyakawa kyinegaklerpatkayi.”
Chiji kosepowamtatkalona kanawkaka. Pejnuruko ruknokamtatkana. Romkagitatkaluna.
Wane rixatka. Satu pokchi rawanatini, waneru satu jeji gijirgitutachripotuna. Geso reta. Yoptsojityegitlu. Chiji yonogita. Ragjitlu. Wane chinru, “Gitsrukaachi, palukiniplu pumkata powratletanunno.”
Giyagni romyokyegitlu. Kamruklu. Wane chinru, “Naluklu. Powrapatkayi.” Wanekluyakawa gijirgitlu gitukyegitatkalu wale.
Ga wa Geso gijretatkalu gi satuna runkakinripa, seyni, “Pyanu,” chinru. “Sasertote pekakgitapinwa. Penekashatanru powranuya wa Moysisi yokanatanru. Walepni nupgujtatjeru wanna chinanu.”
Seyni pnute pogitka Walepirana. Giyagni gixolune yine gapatyegitlu wa yijnakotyapluna, wa rutuukakikolupna yayixleyna.
Seyni Wale gixrikamta. Yineru mwiyawakanu ya. Wane ragjigognetya.
Pagogne wane rixatka. Wale ginkaklewanata. Wane tuplanatna Gwariseyone ga wa Tokanchi Yokanatkaluru yimaklewatachine. Wanna papokchimnunanuka ruyakatyana, Kalilesreta, Gotesreta, ga wa Gerosale koxa. Waneru Gitsrukaachi giyakle rutuukakyapna.
Giyagni pimrine jejine ganiklu satu jeji gijekoya. Walenwa giktegachri. Rujgaluna wa gitoko yoshmakletanruna, Gesostsi rutakyapluna.
Gi rukshikluna gi rixpoko yoshmakletluna gixolune yine chinanu. Panchi gogo ratskotatkana. Washreswa jijrukyaluna gijekoya. Ganikaji Gesostsi rutakluna.
Geso getlu wanna galixle. Wane china, “Jeji, pmukochirkaka kaspuukatkayi.”
Giyagni wa yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone yinuwaka yanshinikanretna. Wane chinna, “¿Gi gixachrinwa Tye wa mupashiregnuchi china yanumsaleta? ¿Katu gimkata kaspukmukochiirewleta? Satupjeru, Goyakalupje.”
Giyagni Geso gimata wane rixanshinikanutinrina. Rugita. Wane chinna,
“¿Klu chinanu wane gixanshinikanuta tyekaka wa gajiya? ¿Girni wa myapretpotu, wane chinyalu giktegachri, ‘Wa pmukochirkaka kaspuukatkayi,’ ga wa wane chinyalu, ‘Pyotunotanu. Pyanutka?’
Wa gimatyaplu wa Gita Yineru Wgenno gitaakalurno tye chijiya kaspukmukochirewletachripa,” wane chinru giktegachri, “Pixa wane nchina, Pyotunotanu. Pkoschekjekomtanu. Pyanutka pupji.”
Waneklu yotunomtatka wa pejnurune wanna getanu. Koscheklu rukluganatyawakamta. Gipji yatka. Rumalwumtlu Goyakalu.
Pejnurunniko giglajitana, ga wa rumalwutluna Goyakalu. Tsru piklu rixna. Wane chinna, “Koglajlewatachri weta xawakni.”
Wanepnute rushpakamta. Retlu satu gijgawenutachri. Rewi giwakatletachri, gijgawenutikwaka tuplanatachri. Wane chinru, “Pomkagitanno.”
Ruknokamtlu pejnurkakako. Palnamta. Romkagitatkalu.
Rewi tsru nachnewlu kamruta gipjiya. Gi gepikna wane gijgawenutachine ga wa pimrine koxa wannayma tuplanatachine nikikowakaya.
Gwariseyone ga wa yonchikgaprenna kegemgana Geso yimaklenyegiya. Wane chinna, “¿Gi rixatka wa wannayma nika, rura, wanna gijgawenutachine, wanna kmukochirerune?”
Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “Wa gichkolune gi galuklu kpinrewakleru, seyni yayixachine galuklu.
Gi wa nuna ntomgiyapna poyagkakachine seyni wanna kmukochirerune ntomginripni renshinikanutinripna.”
Giyagni wanna wane chinru, “Wa Gwa yimaklene gogajirewata gixo kata ga wa ragjigognetkoxna. Waneko pixka rixna wa Gwariseyone yimaklene. Ga wa Pixa yimaklene nikna ga wa rurna.”
Wane chinna Geso, “Gi rumkata gogajirewletna kashimyolu getachine, wanna yegi rawinikopshini gnunrowatachri, xani pixka Gita gimwakopshinna nyimaklene.
Runinpatka pagogne wa gnunrowatachri konikolgognepatka wannaya. Waneklugogne rogajirewatanna wanna.”
Yapkaklu koxa runkakna. Wane china, “Gikena gamatlu gerotsama wa mkachritsole. Wane rixkoklunu wa gerotsama suskaktsoletlu. Gi koxa pixkakakluni gitsole ga wa gerotsamayma.
Gikena giyokgatlu winga gerotu tsapkaka tsrutsoleji. Wane rixkoklunutka winga gerotu suskakanru tsapkakni. Tuyokgata wino. Tsapkaka salewna.
Seyni wa winga gerotu tsapa gerotu tuyokgatka.
Gi satuna kapokotga girachri galuklu gerotga. Gi rixanu wane china, ‘Kapokotga galikaka kiglepotlu.’ ”
Wane rixatka. Sana yapanatna Gesoyma gapnanutikalurgogne. Ga wa yimaklene sustakagwumtluna gitaklugwu. Gimyoyna jipekamtluna. Nikamtluna.
Pimrine Gwariseyone wane china, “¿Klu chinanu wane rixna gapnanutikalurgogne wa ginanshichkalurgogne?”
Rugita Geso. Wane chinna, “¿Gi ge pagogne getyongapiranyegitlu Tawi kamrutanru wa nachichini wale ga wa waleymalune koxa?
Gi rixpoko jiglokletlu Goyakalupji. Jimaprokaka gekakgitkalurkaka koscheka. Niklu. Ga wa waleymalune koxa reneka. Walenwa ginanshichkaluru niklu. Sasertotenepje nikanruni.”
Wane chinna, “Gapnanutikalurgogne koxa Gitsrukatno Gita wa Yineru Wgenno.”
Wane rixa koxa satu gapnanutikalurgogne. Ginkaklewwakapji jigloka. Wane runkaklewatya. Wane rawanata satu jeji potuklemyo giprigamyotyachri.
Giruktatluna yonchikgapine ga wa Gwariseyone, wa gapnanutikalurgogne rutuukaklewjetinri. Rujgaluna wa jigyegityapluna.
Seyni Wale gimatlu yanshinikanutanruna. Wane chinru wa jeji giprigamyotachri, “Pyotunotanu. Ganikaji ptunwatanu.” Giyagni yotunomtatka. Ganikaji tunwata.
Giyagni Geso wane chinna, “Nepomgangi, ¿girni wa gapnanutikalurgogne muklukanutu kamrutkalurupa, waka kiglerge waka gektutlege? ¿Gognetkaklurge giweklu waka giylalu?”
Geso geknokyegitna pejnuruneko. Wane chinru, “Pomyokanu.” Wane rixa. Ruglewamyotatka.
Seprolokpotutatkana. Yanumsayegkakna wannakakluko gi rixpokotanruna Geso.
Wane rixatka walegognekaka. Magka ya. Ragjigognetapa. Psolu yechnoko ruynumatlu Goyakalu.
Gogi rixinitka, tomgana yimaklene. Tsomitna pamole gepi wanna. Yokanatanune chinkoxna.
Wa Simo. Wale rutakgiwakata Petro. Ga wa repuru Gantirishi, ga wa Santiyako, ga wa Gwa, ga wa Wilipi, ga wa Wartolo.
Ga wa Matiyo, ga wa Tomasu, ga wa Santiyako, Galgweyo wgene, ga wa Simo wa Muchkopiranawatachri chinkaluru.
Ga wa Gota, Santiyako wgene. Ga wa Gota Giskaryote. Walenwa samyokjerupa.
Wannayma yopikatka. Wa gimta chiji rawna ga wa gixolune yimaklene ga wa gixolune potu yine, psoluko Gotesreta gajene, ga wa Gerosale gajene, ga wa tsru wenustsi Tiro ga wa Sitosreta gajene.
Runna yijnakotyapluna, ga wa ragijewnalna rutuukakikolupna. Ga wa kamchine puchotlewatachine kojwakanunena gituukaakalunetkani.
Pejnuruneko gixolune yine galuka kamrukletlu Geso, gi rixanu Waleya rushpaka giyaklu. Pejnuruneko rutuukaka.
Tunogyegitna yimaklene. Wane china: Giglenshinikanyegitkalungi kwamonurungi, gi rixanu gixanni Goyakalu pogirewatyawaka.
Giglenshinikanyegitkalungi xani nachichachingi, gi rixanu jinanurunepgi. Giglenshinikanyegitkalungi chiyagatachingi xani, gi rixanu gitsolguwatachinepgi.
“Giglenshinikanyegitkalunepgi wa yine gayegixinipgi, ga wa ruxrikyegitinipgina, ga wa yanginipgina, ga wa ma maluka yijnaklegiwakatinipgina wa mugletu pixka, Gita wa Yineru Wgenno chinanupa.
“Walgogne gimuwatachinepgi. Giptetanu gimuwleya. Gi rixanu tsrupotni gapnutikolupa tengogneya. Gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachine wane gixka rutsrukatenniyna.
Seyni ¡gi wanengi gixa ponikolungi! gi rixanu waneyatkagi psoluko gimnanukikolu.
¡Gi wanengi gixa jinanurungi xani! gi rixanu nachichachinepgi. ¡Gi wanengi gixa xawakni gitsolguwatachingi! gi rixanu wamonuwatachinepgi, chiyagatachinepgi.
“¡Gi wanengi gixa wa pejnuruneko yine kiglerune chinanungi! gi rixanu tokanchi geneklewatachine migjene wane gixka rutsrukatenniyna.
“Seyni wane nchingi gixa, yijnakotachingi, gishinikanna gkamnixjene. Kigle getle gixanna gayegixjene.
Gagjitanru Goyakalu ruglenshinikanyegitanna gkamakpiratjene. Gagjigogneyegitanna gektutetjene.
Ga wa puptagojitjeru pasretgoji koxa penekanru. Ga wa pkonpatatjeru gi wa pumkalu koxa pchipetinri.
Katukta gagjitinipyi, penekanru. Ga wa wane pixle konachripa, gi wa psatkakjixanru.
Gikta gixpoko galuka gixkota gixa wa yineya, waneko pixka pixanna wanna.
“Gi rixanu wa gishinikjene gishinikinipa, ¿kluneruya mpoyagnutiko? Gi rixanu kmukochirewaklerune koxa gishinikna wa rushinikjenna.
Ga wa kigle getle gixinipna wa kigle getle gixjene, ¿kluneruya mpoyagnutiko? Gi rixanu kmukochirewaklerune waneko pixka gixa.
Wa nserojiprojite genekinna wa gkagwaka nsatkakletjenepa wane pejnupotuko, ¿kluneruya mpoyagnutiko? Wa kmukochirewaklerune koxa sroschi genekjetna wa wane pejnu kagwaka satkakjenepa.
Seyni gishinikanna gkamnixjene. Kigle getle gixanna. Nserojiprojite genekanu mkagwaka satkakletkoto. Tsru potu gapnutikolupa. Teno potu Gajeru wgenenepgi. Gi rixanu retwamonutna wa poyagnu mchinkane ga wa muglene.
Kgetwamonuklerunepgi, Giru pixka kgetwamonuklerni Wale.
“Gi gitakyagoklewatanu, gma mutakyagokikotkoxapgi gixa. Gi wa kgiklukanuru nchinanru satu, wa gixa koxa kgiklukanurune gma chinikotkoxapa gixa. Gkaspukinna pimrine, gixa koxa kaspukikalunepgi.
Geneklewashatanu, ga wa gixa koxa genekashatko. Yagotkaluru pnute, salyatkaluru, yoshkishkitkaluru, yomitachrinatka yine genekangi. Wa yantapi gixa yantajetinri, walako gyantatiko.”
Satu yapkaklu runkakna. “¿Rumkatge maygaletu kosekletlu maygaletu? ¿Gi ge kapna rumujruukakanna?
Yimaklechi gi wa tsrunwa yimaklewatachri pnute. Seyni galpokotkaluru yimakjeruko pixka rixanu.
“¿Klu chinanu petlu kapopejiru pumoleygale gwachri, ga wa puygaleko gwachri kaknalu gi peta?
¿Gi pchinru pumole, ‘Gichikaka. Nwanruchi puygale gajeru kapopejiru’? Gi petlu wa puygale gwaknatachri. Sanowashatachriyi. Muchinanu gapka puknokanruchi kaknalu puygale gajeru. Waneklu petpotutanutkalu puknokyaplu pumoleygale gwachri kapopejiru.
“Gi rixanu maleshlu kigleru gagmuna muglejiwletu. Maleshkoxlu mugletu gagmuna kiglejiwleru.
Gi rixanu gijiya rumatika satkaka gagmuna. Gi rixanu gi wa kawshipiri tjirgika gikersagi. Gi koxa kawshiri tjirgika gowaji.
Kigleru yineru raji ponikowle kigleru, kiglekakalu koshpakya. Mugletu yineru ponikowle mugletu mugletkaka koshpakya. Gi rixanu gixo potu rajgajeru yanumsatya ginamaya.
“¿Klu chinanu wane nchinno, ‘Gitsrukaachi, Gitsrukaachi,’ Ga wa gi wa nchinyawakgi gkamruta?
Girukokta nunyegitjeru, wa ntokanu yijnakotachri ga wa wane rixlu, nekakgitangi giru pixka rixa.
Jeji pixkalutni kamrupjitachri. Wale jitotlu. Teno rixlu. Sotlumta gogo ruglepokotlu. Rapompotutini wenu, yoshkigamtlu walepji. Gi rumkata kowjewjeretlu, gi rixanu giglepokotikwaka rutaaka.
Giyagni girukokta yijnakotlu gi wane rixa, jeji pixkalutu kamrupjitachri. Mshikowakanu chiji rutaklu muglepokotikowakanu chiji. Yoshkigamtlu gonu. Waneklu yawnamtanatka. Tsru yawnalu rixana walepji.”
Wa rali ginkakletinitka pejnuruko tokanu ga wa yine yijnakotlu. Giyagni Kapernawo yatka.
Satu ksolaloteru wayegreru ralukanru potu yayixyana. Rupnakastsinatkani.
Yijnakpiranyegitlu Geso. Goteyone tsrutene yokanata Wale yegi. Ragjijixlu rutskalatyaplu wayegreru.
Rapyegitinitkaluna Geso, ragjipotutluna. Wane chinruna, “Rumukluni wale wane rixikolupa.
Gi rixanu rushinikanerutwu. Wale kamrupjijixlu wunkaklewawaklepji.”
Geso wannayma wane ya. Seyni gi gowukatkalu gipji, ksolaloteru yokanyegitlu rumatletanune. Wane chinruna, “Gi pkojwakinwa, Gitsrukaachi. Gi rixanu gi numukluyi wa nopji washrempuko pjiglokinripa.
Tye chinanu koxa gi wa numukluyi netyayi wa nyayegityapyi. Seyni wane pchintokanushatanu. Nwayegreru gitukanutka.
Gi rixanu gita koxa jejno tsru gitaakalune rapukote gwachrino. Gita koxa solalone gitakika. Wane nchinru wa tye, ‘Pyanutka.’ Yatka. Satu wane nchina, ‘Punanu,’ Runa. Wane nchinru nwayegreru, ‘Pkamrutanru wa tye,’ Kamrutlu.”
Geso yijnakotinri, ruglajita waleya. Ruprotakyegitna. Wane chinna gixolune yine romkagitjene, “Galikaka wane nchingi, gi satuna Gisrayiline yegi nukshikyalu tye pixkalutu galixlewlu.”
Panchi satokinitkana wa yokanatkalune, retatkaluna wayegrechri gitukachritka.
Wanepnute wane rixatka. Pokchi yatka Nayi chinikowaka. Waleymamnuna yimaklene ga wa gixolune yine.
Pokchi gipgyaptotestsi rapokinitkana, maleka koshpaaka satu gipnachri satupjerutu toturu runro. Gipnagnurutachroni wala. Gixolune yine pokchi gajene gimotsatlo.
Wa Gitsrukaachi getinro, retwamonutlo. Wane chinro, “Gi pchiyagatanu.”
